Title: Curried Stew with Lamb
Ingredients: ['1 cup yogurt', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 pounds lamb sirloin, cut into cubes', '2 cups water', '1 cup uncooked rice', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, grated', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '¾ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '3 tablespoons curry powder', '⅔ cup slivered almonds, toasted', '1 cup currants', '8 cups vegetable broth']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, combine yogurt and garlic.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the lamb cubes until coated.
', 'Step 3: Cover, and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 4: In a saucepan bring water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Add rice and stir.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat, and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
', 'Step 9: Saute onions until tender.
', 'Step 10: Stir in marinated lamb mixture.
', 'Step 11: Season with cloves, ginger, cumin, cayenne and curry powder.
', 'Step 12: Stir in raisins, reduce heat, and simmer for 2 hours.
', 'Step 13: Stir in cooked rice and vegetable stock.
', 'Step 14: return to a simmer, and cook 5 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '622.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '44.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '85.8 mg', 'fatContent': '38.1 g', 'fiberContent': '4.8 g', 'proteinContent': '26.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '550.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '18.7 g'}

Title: Spinach and Halloumi Gozleme
Ingredients: ['11 ounces Greek yogurt', '1 pinch salt', '3 cups self-rising flour', '1 drizzle extra-virgin olive oil', '¾ (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '9 ounces grated halloumi cheese', '2 medium scallions, finely chopped', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 tablespoon salted butter, melted', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium lemon, cut into wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place yogurt in a large bowl and stir in salt.
', 'Step 2: Gradually add flour, a few tablespoons at a time, until you have a stiff dough.
', 'Step 3: Turn dough out onto a floured work surface and knead with your hands until soft and slightly tacky.
', 'Step 4: Place the dough in a lightly floured bowl, cover with a clean tea towel, and allow to stand for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, warm a frying pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add a drizzle of oil, then add spinach, garlic, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Take off of the heat and allow to cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in halloumi, scallions, and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 10: Divide the dough into 4 equal balls.
', 'Step 11: Roll out each ball into a 10- to 12-inch circle on a floured surface.
', 'Step 12: Place some spinach filling on one side of each circle and fold the dough over.
', 'Step 13: Seal the edges with a fork.
', 'Step 14: Heat a large frying pan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 15: Combine melted butter and 1 tablespoon oil in a bowl, and brush onto both sides of the gozleme.
', 'Step 16: Cook each gozleme in the hot pan until golden, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 17: Cut each gozleme into 4 slices and finish with several squeezes of lemon juice.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '724.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '80.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '73 mg', 'fatContent': '32.6 g', 'fiberContent': '5.5 g', 'proteinContent': '30 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '2043.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.9 g'}

Title: Lamb, Carrot, and White Bean Curry Stew
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground lamb', '1 onion, grated', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons minced fresh dill', '¼ cup minced fresh cilantro', '2 teaspoons coarse salt', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 (8 ounce) package baby carrots', '2 (15.5 ounce) cans cannellini beans', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon sour cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix together the ground lamb, onion, egg, dill, cilantro, salt, cumin, turmeric, cinnamon, and pepper in a bowl until evenly incorporated.
', 'Step 2: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Crumble the lamb mixture into the skillet and cook until no longer pink, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add the carrots to the mixture; reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 5: Pour in the contents of the 2 cans of beans and the water; stir.
', 'Step 6: Simmer mixture 25 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir the sour cream through the mixture; cook until the liquid thickens, 5 to 10 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '457 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '27.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '105.5 mg', 'fatContent': '26.1 g', 'fiberContent': '7.7 g', 'proteinContent': '26.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1185.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.5 g'}

Title: Strudel Roll Cookies
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '7 tablespoons butter', '⅞ cup sour cream', '¼ teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons any flavor fruit jam', '⅝ cup raisins', '1 ⅛ cups flaked coconut', '¾ cup chopped walnuts', '1 cup sesame seeds', "⅓ cup confectioners' sugar for decoration"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter or margarine, and sour cream into a soft dough.
', 'Step 2: Chill one hour.
', 'Step 3: To Make Filling: Combine the raisins, coconut, chopped nuts, and sesame seeds.
', 'Step 4: Roll out one third of the dough to a thin sheet.
', 'Step 5: Spread with one third of the jam.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle one third of the filling on the jam.
', 'Step 7: Roll into a log jellyroll-fashion.
', 'Step 8: Repeat two more times.
', 'Step 9: Cut rolls into 1 - 2 inch cookies and place on greased cookie sheets.
', 'Step 10: Place cookies on a greased cookie sheet.
', 'Step 11: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 20 minutes.
', "Step 12: Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar while still warm.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '277.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '31.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '16.8 mg', 'fatContent': '15.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.5 g', 'proteinContent': '5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '86.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.8 g'}

Title: Spicy Beef Stew with Moroccan Spice Rub
Ingredients: ['1 pound beef stew meat, cut into 2-inch pieces', '1 tablespoon ras el hanout, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 leek, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced crosswise', '1 small onion, cut in half and thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tomato, diced', '1 cup diced pumpkin', '2 tablespoons tomato paste, or more to taste', '1 cup rose wine', '2 cups beef stock', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 sprig fresh mint', '1 bay leaf', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 parsnip, halved lengthwise and thickly sliced', '1 carrot, halved lengthwise and thickly sliced', '2 teaspoons lemon juice, or to taste', '2 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place beef in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add ras el hanout and rub until beef is completely coated.
', 'Step 3: Let sit for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a stew pot over high heat until shimmering.
', "Step 5: Add meat, making sure it's not overcrowded, and sear to seal in the juices, stirring occasionally, until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 6: Transfer meat to a plate.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium and add leek and onion to the pot.
', 'Step 8: Saute until leeks turn golden and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Add tomatoes and saute until they begin to soften, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add cooked meat back to the pot, along with diced pumpkin and tomato paste.
', 'Step 12: Cook and stir for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Pour wine into the pot and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 14: Cook until wine reduces by half, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Add beef stock, rosemary, mint, bay leaf, salt, and pepper and return to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Add parsnip and carrot, cover, and simmer until beef is tender, about 40 minutes longer.
', 'Step 18: Taste sauce and add lemon juice and sugar, if needed.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '430 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24 g', 'cholesterolContent': '62.5 mg', 'fatContent': '23.2 g', 'fiberContent': '4.7 g', 'proteinContent': '23 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '218.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '10.1 g'}

Title: Aunt Zaneb's Semolina Cake
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons tahini, divided', '3 cups semolina flour', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup unsweetened shredded coconut', '¼ cup butter', '2 cups plain yogurt', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '2 ½ cups water', '2 cups white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Smooth 1 teaspoon of tahini over the bottom of an 8-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Mix semolina flour, 1 cup sugar, coconut, and butter together in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix yogurt, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl; stir until bubbly.
', 'Step 5: Pour into the semolina mixture; combine batter well using your hands.
', 'Step 6: Pour batter into the prepared pan; dab the remaining 1 teaspoon tahini on top.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until cake is set, 30 to 35 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Combine water and 2 cups sugar in a saucepan over high heat.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil; stir to dissolve sugar.
', 'Step 10: Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 11: Pour 1/2 cup of syrup over the baked cake.
']

Title: Fattet Betenjan (Eggplant and Yogurt Salad)
Ingredients: ['5 cups water, or as needed', '2 tablespoons salt', '3 medium eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '4 (6 inch) pita bread rounds', '1 cup vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', '3 ¼ cups plain yogurt', '¼ cup mayonnaise', '½ medium lemon, juiced', '3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons oil', '¼ cup sliced almonds', '1 head romaine lettuce, thinly sliced', '1 (29 ounce) can chickpeas, drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour water and 2 tablespoons salt into a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add cubed eggplant and let sit for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and place on paper towel-lines plates until completely dry, about 30 more minutes.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Chop pita bread into 1-inch cubes and place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 6: Roast in the preheated oven, stirring occasionally, until golden, 8 to 10 minutes; do not burn.
', 'Step 7: Remove from the oven and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Heat 1/2 inch oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Working in batches, fry eggplant until golden, about 6 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 10: Remove to paper towel-lined plates to drain.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, combine yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 12: Cover and refrigerate until needed.
', 'Step 13: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a small frying pan.
', 'Step 14: Add almonds and cook until fragrant, about 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Continue to cook, stirring often, until nicely brown and toasted, 3 to 4 minutes longer.
', 'Step 16: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 17: Place lettuce on a serving platter.
', 'Step 18: Layer with eggplant, chickpeas, and roasted pita bread.
', 'Step 19: Pour yogurt mixture over top and sprinkle with toasted almonds.
', 'Step 20: Serve at room temperature or cold.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '434.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '59.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '8.6 mg', 'fatContent': '16.7 g', 'fiberContent': '13.5 g', 'proteinContent': '16 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '2306.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.8 g'}

Title: Talamee
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon sugar', '4 cups lukewarm water', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast', '5 pounds all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons butter, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve sugar in about 1 cup of the water.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle the yeast over the top.
', 'Step 3: Let stand for about 10 minutes, until foamy.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, mix together the yeast mixture, water, oil, and about half of the flour until well blended.
', 'Step 5: Gradually mix in the rest of the flour until the dough is stiff enough to take out of the bowl.
', 'Step 6: Knead on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Place dough in a greased bowl, and cover with a cloth.
', 'Step 8: allow to rise in a warm place until doubled in size.
', 'Step 9: This will take 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 10: Divide dough into sections about the size of a grapefruit.
', 'Step 11: Form into smooth balls, cover with a cloth, and let rise again for about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: On a lightly floured surface, flatten each ball to 1/2 inch thickness, pressing out with your fingers.
', 'Step 13: Circles should be about 8 inches across.
', 'Step 14: Place on an oiled baking sheet.
', 'Step 15: Let rest for about 10 minutes, or while you preheat the oven .
', 'Step 16: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Bake rounds until the top is lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove from the oven, and brush with melted butter.
', 'Step 19: Repeat with remaining bread.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '356 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '72.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '2.5 mg', 'fatContent': '2.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2.6 g', 'proteinContent': '9.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '10 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.4 g'}

Title: Hummus II
Ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic', '2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained', '8 ounces tofu', '3 lemons, juiced', '¼ cup parsley', '¾ cup tahini', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch ground cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon tamari', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mince garlic in the large bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 2: Add garbanzo beans, tofu, lemon juice, parsley, and tahini; blend until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Add ginger, cayenne pepper, and tamari; blend.
', 'Step 4: Season to taste with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 5: Blend in water if hummus is too thick.
']

Title: Rose Scented Tapioca Pudding
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup white sugar', '3 tablespoons quick-cooking tapioca', "2 ¾ cups goat's milk", '1 egg, beaten', '1 ½ teaspoons rose water']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: In a saucepan, stir together the sugar, tapioca, goat's milk, and egg.
", 'Step 2: Set aside for 5 minutes for the tapioca to soak.
', 'Step 3: Place the saucepan over medium heat and bring the mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and stir in the rose water.
', 'Step 5: Ladle the pudding into 4 small individual dessert dishes.
', 'Step 6: Cover each dish with a piece of plastic wrap, pushing the wrap down onto the surface of the pudding to prevent a skin from forming.
', 'Step 7: Let the puddings cool slightly on the countertop, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Chill in refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.
']

Title: Hummus with a Kick
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, undrained', '⅓ cup tahini', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '¾ teaspoon onion powder', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '⅛ teaspoon ground allspice', '⅛ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '⅛ teaspoon paprika', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Add chickpeas to a small saucepan; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook until peas are soft and can be crushed with a spoon, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Transfer to a blender.
', 'Step 4: Add tahini, oil, garlic salt, onion powder, turmeric, allspice, cayenne pepper, paprika, salt, and pepper to the blender.
', 'Step 5: Cover and hold lid down with a potholder; blend on high until mostly smooth, but still thick, 1 to 2 minutes.
']

Title: Ash-e Anar (Persian Pomegranate Soup)
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 large sweet onions, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '¾ cup yellow split peas', '2 quarts chicken stock', '2 tablespoons ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '2 ¼ teaspoons mild paprika', '¾ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground fennel seeds', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 ½ pounds ground lamb', '¼ cup minced onion', '2 tablespoons minced fresh mint', '2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cup basmati rice', '½ cup minced fresh parsley', '½ cup minced fresh mint', '¼ cup pomegranate molasses', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 cups pomegranate seeds', '¼ cup heavy whipping cream, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a heavy stockpot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add chopped onions and saute until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add garlic and cook until browned, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in split peas; cook until peas take on a bit of color, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Pour chicken stock into the pot.
', 'Step 6: Add pepper, turmeric, paprika, cayenne, fennel seeds, and cinnamon stick.
', 'Step 7: Bring soup to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat and simmer until peas are tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: While soup is simmering, prepare meatballs.
', 'Step 10: Mix lamb, minced onion, mint, parsley, and garlic together.
', 'Step 11: Form into walnut-sized meatballs.
', 'Step 12: Drop meatballs into the simmering soup.
', 'Step 13: Cook until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Discard cinnamon stick from the soup.
', 'Step 15: Add basmati rice, parsley, mint, pomegranate molasses, and honey.
', 'Step 16: Cook until rice softens, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Ladle soup into bowls and garnish with pomegranate seeds and cream.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '514.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '56.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '67.8 mg', 'fatContent': '22.7 g', 'fiberContent': '7.9 g', 'proteinContent': '23.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '743.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '19.9 g'}

Title: Mexican Shakshuka aka 'Eggs in a Pot'
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) package chorizo sausage', '1 (8 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '¼ large onion, diced', '1 (22 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 cups chicken broth, or more to taste', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 loaf French bread, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '¼ cup butter, or to taste', '2 tablespoons baking soda', '8 eggs, or more to taste', '½ cup crumbled queso fresco', '⅔ cup Mexican crema, crema fresca']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir chorizo with mushrooms and onion in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard fat.
', 'Step 4: Combine diced tomatoes, chicken broth, and tomato paste in a Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a simmer and stir in the chorizo mixture and most of the crema, reserving a small amount to drizzle on top later.
', 'Step 6: Cover and let simmer, stirring occasionally, until stew is the texture of a thick chili, at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Lightly butter both sides of the bread slices and place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Toast in the preheated oven, turning bread halfway, for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Fill a pot with water and add baking soda.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Add eggs and boil for exactly 5 minutes and 45 seconds.
', 'Step 13: Remove eggs and immediately place into an ice water bath to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 14: Remove shells.
', 'Step 15: Place eggs into the chorizo stew to re-warm them.
', 'Step 16: Top with queso fresco and drizzle with the remaining crema.
', 'Step 17: Serve in bowls with pieces of toasted bread.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '532.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '34.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '225.3 mg', 'fatContent': '32.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '24.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15 g', 'sodiumContent': '2194 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.5 g'}

Title: Arugula Salad with Pomegranate Molasses
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '1 teaspoon sumac powder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup halved cherry tomatoes', '2 cups arugula leaves', '¼ cup walnut halves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk lemon juice, pomegranate molasses, vinegar, sumac, salt, and black pepper together in a small bowl to make the dressing.
', 'Step 2: Mix cherry tomatoes, arugula leaves, and walnut halves together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Pour dressing into bowl and toss salad well to coat.
']

Title: Georgian Bean Salad
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups dry kidney beans', 'salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ cup shelled walnuts', '2 garlic cloves', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '⅓ cup water', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 small white onion, minced', '2 cooked chicken breast halves, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place beans in a bowl; cover with plenty of water.
', 'Step 2: Soak for 8 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 3: Drain beans and transfer to a large pot; cover with plenty of water, salt, and 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until beans are soft, about 90 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain and season with salt.
', 'Step 6: Grind walnuts and garlic to a fine paste in a food processor.
', 'Step 7: Add vinegar, 1/3 cup water, 1 tablespoon parsley, 1 tablespoon cilantro, and 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 8: Process until smooth.
', 'Step 9: Mix beans, onion, chicken, and dressing in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Chill in refrigerator for at least 1 hour before serving.
', 'Step 11: Garnish with 1 tablespoon parsley and 2 tablespoons cilantro.
']

Title: Special Mutton Leg Roast For Eid-ul-Azha
Ingredients: ['1 (5 pound) leg of lamb, trimmed of excess fat', '4 cups plain yogurt', '4 tablespoons ginger-garlic paste', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons ground red chile pepper', '2 tablespoons chaat masala', '2 tablespoons garam masala', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 cup vegetable oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut deep slashes about 2 inches apart across the lamb.
', 'Step 2: Mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, ground red chile, chaat masala, garam masala, salt, red pepper flakes, turmeric, black pepper, cumin, and coriander together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Whisk until well combined.
', 'Step 4: Apply marinade generously all over the lamb in a dish; turn over and apply more marinade.
', 'Step 5: Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a large cast-iron pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Place the lamb leg gently into the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 8: Cover and place a heavy weight on top of the lid.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to low and cook for 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Turn leg over and cook for another hour.
', 'Step 11: Continue cooking lamb until liquid is mostly evaporated and meat is tender and golden, about 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 12: Oils should start collecting at the edges of the lamb.
', 'Step 13: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 130 degrees F (54 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Transfer meat to a serving dish.
']

Title: Yemeni Haroset
Ingredients: ['½ cup orange juice, divided', '1 tablespoon white wine, or more to taste', '1 cup dried apricots', '1 cup sliced almonds', '2 large Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored, and diced', '¼ cup brown sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 1/4 cup orange juice with white wine in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Place apricots on a flat work surface.
', 'Step 3: Snip into small bits with scissors.
', 'Step 4: Add to the juice-wine mixture; let soak until softened.
', 'Step 5: Place almonds in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook, stirring frequently, until golden brown, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Toss apples with the remaining 1/4 cup orange juice in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Add the toasted almonds, apricots, brown sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

Title: Masht-o Khiyaar (Persian Cucumber Salad with Sultanas and Walnuts)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups plain yogurt', '2 tablespoons roughly chopped walnuts', '3 tablespoons golden raisins (sultanas), roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 large cucumber - peeled, seeded, and diced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place yogurt into a fine-mesh sieve lined with a coffee filter and allow to drain, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 2: You should end up with about a cup of thick yogurt.
', 'Step 3: Heat a small skillet over medium heat, add walnuts, and toast while stirring until nuts start to turn golden brown and become fragrant, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Allow to cool.
', 'Step 5: Mix yogurt, sultanas, walnuts, dill, mint, salt, and pepper in a large bowl, add cucumber and toss to combine.
', 'Step 6: Refrigerate for 1 hour.
']

Title: Shakshooka
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 jalapeno pepper, sliced', '1 large red bell pepper, chopped', '2 tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '2 tablespoons sweet paprika', '2 tablespoons hot paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '¾ cup water', '¼ teaspoon saffron', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '6 eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the garlic, onion, and jalapeno; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add the bell pepper and tomatoes.
', 'Step 4: Cook the vegetables until the tomatoes have broken down and released their juices, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the sweet paprika, hot paprika, salt, and pepper and let the mixture simmer for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add the tomato paste and water and mix well.
', 'Step 7: When the vegetables have a sauce-like consistency, add the saffron and parsley.
', "Step 8: Crack the eggs on top of the sauce (as though you're making sunnyside-up eggs); cover the pan and let the eggs cook for 10 to 15 minutes or until the yolks reach your desired consistency.

Title: Salata

', 'Step 2: Add the pepper and salt and continue mashing until mixture becomes a thick paste.

', 'Step 6: Just before serving, add the cheese and just enough dressing to coat.

', 'Step 8: ) Toss well.
']

Title: Lahmahjoon (Armenian Pizza)
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground lamb', '1 ½ cups finely chopped onion', '½ cup chopped green bell pepper', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '½ cup chopped fresh Italian parsley', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint leaves', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '4 pita breads, or fluffy tortillas']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place ground lamb in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and break into small pieces until mostly browned.
', 'Step 3: Drain any excess grease.
', 'Step 4: Add the onion, green pepper, and garlic.
', 'Step 5: Cook until onion is translucent.
', 'Step 6: Stir in diced tomatoes and tomato paste, then season with parsley, basil, mint, cumin, and if using, cayenne.
', 'Step 7: Simmer for about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat, cover, and refrigerate overnight to blend the flavors.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Distribute the lamb mixture evenly over the tortillas, and spread out to the edges.
', 'Step 11: Place the tortillas onto a baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Bake for about 20 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the oven and place the lahmahjoons onto a large piece of aluminum foil so that two of them are meat side to meat side, then stack the pairs together, and bring the foil up over the top to keep warm.
', 'Step 14: These can be served hot or cold.
', 'Step 15: Cut into small wedges.
']

Title: Cheese Bourekas
Ingredients: ['2 eggs', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 pinch garlic powder', '1 pinch onion powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry', '2 teaspoons water', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Beat 1 egg in a medium bowl, and mix in the cheese.
', 'Step 4: Season with parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: On a lightly floured surface, cut each sheet of puff pastry into 6 equal squares to give 12 squares in total.
', 'Step 6: Beat the remaining egg with water in small bowl.
', 'Step 7: Brush edges of each square lightly with egg wash.
', 'Step 8: Place a heaping tablespoon of the cheese mixture in the center of each square.
', 'Step 9: Fold pastry over the filling, and seal edges with a fork.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet, brush with remaining egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 12: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Armenian Shish Kabob
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon dry white wine', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '⅛ teaspoon dried oregano', '⅛ teaspoon dried rosemary leaves', '1 bay leaf', '2 pounds boneless leg of lamb, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes', '2 large onions, peeled, cut into 8 wedges each', '2 large green bell peppers, cut into 8 wedges each', '12 mushrooms, stems removed', '2 large tomatoes, cut into 8 wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together olive oil, lemon juice, wine, and garlic; season with salt, pepper, oregano, rosemary, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 2: Toss lamb with marinade until evenly combined, then pour into a resealable plastic bag, and marinate in refrigerator at least 24 hours.
', 'Step 3: Position oven rack to its top setting and set oven to broil.
', 'Step 4: Remove lamb from marinade and thread onto metal skewers; reserve marinade.
', 'Step 5: Thread onion wedges, green peppers, and mushrooms onto separate metal skewers.
', 'Step 6: Brush vegetables with reserved marinade.
', 'Step 7: Broil the skewers on a broiler pan, turning frequently.
', 'Step 8: Cook onions for 12 minutes, lamb for 10 minutes, green pepper for 7 minutes, and the mushrooms for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from oven, and allow to cool until cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 10: Remove skewers from ingredients and set aside.
', 'Step 11: Reassemble skewers, alternating lamb, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and tomatoes.
', 'Step 12: Place onto broiler pan and brush again with marinade.
', 'Step 13: Discard remaining marinade.
', 'Step 14: Broil skewers again to finish cooking, turning frequently until the lamb is medium-rare and the vegetables begin to blacken in spots, 5 to 7 minutes.
']

Title: Chicken Shawarma
Ingredients: ['½ cup malt vinegar', '¼ cup plain yogurt', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground cardamom', '8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs', '½ cup tahini', '¼ cup plain yogurt', '½ teaspoon minced garlic', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 medium tomatoes, thinly sliced', '½ cup sliced onion', '4 cups shredded lettuce', '8 pita bread rounds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a glass baking dish, mix together the malt vinegar, 1/4 cup yogurt, vegetable oil, mixed spice, cardamom, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 2: Place the chicken thighs into the mixture and turn to coat.
', 'Step 3: Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: In a small bowl, mix together the tahini, 1/4 cup yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, and parsley.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper, taste, and adjust flavors if desired.
', 'Step 7: Cover and refrigerate.
', 'Step 8: Cover the chicken and bake in the marinade for 30 minutes, turning once.
', 'Step 9: Uncover, and cook for an additional 5 to 10 minutes, or until chicken is browned and cooked through.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the dish, and cut into slices.
', 'Step 11: Place sliced chicken, tomato, onion, and lettuce onto pita breads.
', 'Step 12: Roll up, and top with the tahini sauce.
']

Title: Rosh Hashanah Pilaf with Beets, Chard, and Beef from Iraqi Kurdistan
Ingredients: ['¾ cup basmati rice', '4 ounces beets, peeled and shredded', '5 cloves garlic, diced', '4 teaspoons white sugar, divided', '1 large lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, divided', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 pound 85% lean ground beef', '1 large onion, diced', '1 cup water', '4 ounces beets, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '2 large bunches chard leaves, stems removed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Wash rice repeatedly in a large bowl of water until the water runs clear.
', 'Step 2: Cover rice with fresh water and soak for 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Drain rice and mix with shredded beets, garlic, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1/2 of the lemon juice, dill, tarragon, and 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a 6-quart stock pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add beef and remaining salt.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until beef is browned, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove browned beef from the pot with a slotted spoon, leaving the oil behind.
', 'Step 8: Add onion; cook and stir until browned, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add cubed beets and saute for another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove onion and beets from the pot and mix with the beef.
', 'Step 11: Combine water, remaining lemon juice, and remaining sugar in a bowl to create sweet and sour water.
', 'Step 12: Place 1 layer of chard leaves on the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 13: Add 1/2 of the rice mixture, followed by a second layer of chard leaves.
', 'Step 14: Add 1/2 of the beef mixture, followed by a layer of chard leaves, and the remaining rice mixture.
', 'Step 15: Add another layer of chard leaves, the remaining beef mixture, and a final topping of chard leaves.
', 'Step 16: Pierce the chard leaf layers with a long and thin knife all the way to the bottom a few times so steam can escape.
', 'Step 17: Pour the sweet and sour water over the top.
', 'Step 18: Bring the pilaf to a gentle simmer over medium heat.
', 'Step 19: Turn the heat to very low, cover, and cook for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove from heat and allow to rest for 15 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '310.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '33.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '49.6 mg', 'fatContent': '12.1 g', 'fiberContent': '4.1 g', 'proteinContent': '19.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '753.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.5 g'}

Title: Booshala (Assyrian Yogurt Soup)

['Step 1: Place cabbage, celery, dill, and cilantro in a large stockpot.
', 'Step 2: Pour in enough water to barely cover.

', 'Step 4: Add banana peppers.
', 'Step 5: Stir in spinach bit by bit, waiting for it to wilt between batches.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 7: Whisk yogurt and flour in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Add to the stockpot.
', 'Step 9: Season with lemon juice and salt.
', 'Step 10: Cook, stirring constantly, until yogurt is hot but not boiling, 7 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Baked Falafel Patties
Ingredients: ['2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro', '⅔ large onion, roughly chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 large eggs', '1 medium jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon salt']

', 'Step 3: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Remove falafel mixture from the refrigerator.
', 'Step 5: Add more flour if needed, 1 tablespoon at a time, and form into 20 small patties.

Title: Turkish Stuffed Flatbread (Gozleme)
Ingredients: ['1 cup lukewarm water', '1 teaspoon butter-flavored shortening', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 ⅓ cups bread flour', '1 teaspoon yeast', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '½ medium onion, chopped', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained, and squeezed dry', '½ teaspoon garlic, minced', '6 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place lukewarm water, shortening, salt, sugar, bread flour, and yeast in a bread machine in the order listed.
', 'Step 2: Run Dough cycle.
', 'Step 3: Remove dough from the machine at the kneading, 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Divide dough into 5 pieces and roll them into balls.
', 'Step 5: Place on a floured surface, cover with a slightly damp cloth, and leave to rest for 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, melt oil and butter for filling in a medium skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add onion and salt and cook, stirring frequently, until onions soften, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add spinach and garlic and cook for another 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 10: Roll dough circles into flat rounds, 5 to 6 inches in diameter.
', 'Step 11: Fill one half each circle with spinach mixture, sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, then fold the other half over and seal the edges.
', 'Step 12: Preheat a griddle or large frying pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 13: Brush one side of each gozleme with oil and place on the hot pan; cook until base is golden, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Brush top side with olive oil, turn, and cook until golden, another 2 to 3 minutes.
']

Title: Air-Fried Carrots with Tahini-Lemon Sauce

Title: Yakh Dar Behesht (Persian Milk Pudding)
Ingredients: ['¾ cup rice flour', '2 cups water', '2 cups milk', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '¼ cup cornstarch', '¾ cup white sugar', '5 tablespoons rose water', '2 tablespoons crushed pistachios', '2 tablespoons chopped almonds', '1 tablespoon dried rose petals']

['Step 1: Dissolve rice flour in water in a bowl and pour into a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Whisk milk, cream, and cornstarch in a bowl and pour into the saucepan.

Title: Middle Eastern-Style Dolma (Stuffed Vegetables)
Ingredients: ['3 pounds ground beef', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste, divided', '¾ cup chopped fresh parsley', '¾ cup chopped green onion', '½ cup unsalted butter, softened', '1 tablespoon salt', '¾ tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ cups uncooked white rice', '1 medium head cabbage, leaves separated', '4 large green bell pepper, chopped', '2 large eggplants', '2 large zucchini, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine ground beef, 2 1/2 cans of tomato paste, parsley, green onion, butter, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Before adding uncooked rice, rinse until water runs clear; this keeps the rice from becoming sticky.
', 'Step 3: Add rice after rinsing and mix contents until blended well.
', 'Step 4: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil; add cabbage.
', 'Step 5: Boil until just tender enough to fold, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, hollow out bell peppers, eggplants, and zucchini.
', 'Step 8: Stuff hollowed vegetables with meat mixture.
', "Step 9: Set in a large pot (pack vegetables together so there isn't much room in between them).
", 'Step 10: Fill cabbage leaves with 3 to 4 tablespoons of leftover meat mixture and set in the pot with the other vegetables.
', 'Step 11: Pour water in the pot on top of the vegetables until almost covered.
', 'Step 12: Stir in remaining tomato paste.
', 'Step 13: Weigh down the food by placing a heavy, heat-proof plate on top.
', 'Step 14: Bring water to a boil; reduce heat to medium and cover the pot.
', 'Step 15: Let cook for 1 hour.
', 'Step 16: Drain half of the water in the pot (leave heavy plate until done cooking) and recover, reducing heat to a simmer, and allow to slow cook for 1 hour more.
', 'Step 17: Serve warm and enjoy!
']

Title: Falafel Dough Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 cup red lentils', '2 teaspoons oil', '1 onion, quartered', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '½ bunch fresh parsley', '½ bunch fresh cilantro', '¼ cup chopped green onions', '⅓ cup oil', '1 egg', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon chile powder', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon ground coriander', 'salt to taste', '1 cup yogurt', '4 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon tahini', 'salt to taste', '¾ cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 tomato, cubed', '¼ cup sliced olives', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons minced green onion']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place red lentils in a bowl and cover with water.
', 'Step 2: Let soak until softened, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with 2 teaspoons oil.
', 'Step 6: Place lentils in a food processor with onion, garlic, 1/2 bunch parsley, cilantro, and 1/4 cup green onions; pulse until finely ground.
', 'Step 7: Transfer lentil mixture to a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Add 1/3 cup oil, egg, baking powder, black pepper, chile powder, cumin, coriander, and salt; mix until well-blended.
', 'Step 9: Spread dough to 1/4-inch thickness onto prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until golden and firm, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from oven.
', 'Step 12: Combine yogurt, lemon juice, tahini, and salt in a small bowl; mix well until sauce is smooth.
', 'Step 13: Layer sauce, Cheddar cheese, tomato, olives, 1 tablespoon parsley, and 2 teaspoons green onion on top of baked dough.
', 'Step 14: Return to the oven and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: Lentil Balls

Title: Instant Pot® Turkish Red Lentil Soup with Aleppo Pepper Oil
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons salted butter', '1 medium yellow onion, cut into 1/2-inch dice', '1 clove garlic, finely grated', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon sweet paprika', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 cup red lentils', '2 tablespoons long-grain white rice', '1 pinch kosher salt, or to taste', '5 cups water', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons Aleppo pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint, or to taste', '1 lemon, cut into wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Melt butter until foamy.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 5: Push onion and garlic to one side of the pot and add olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Toast paprika and cumin for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 7: Stir in tomato paste.
', 'Step 8: Add lentils, rice, and salt.
', 'Step 9: Pour in water and turn off Saute function.
', 'Step 10: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 11: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 3 minutes.
", 'Step 12: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 13: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Release remaining pressure using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 16: Adjust seasoning to taste.
', 'Step 17: Meanwhile, heat extra-virgin olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat, swirling to coat the entire skillet.
', 'Step 18: Add Aleppo pepper and cook until a few bubbles appear and the oil is bright red.
', 'Step 19: Remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 20: Ladle soup into bowls, drizzle with Aleppo pepper oil, sprinkle with fresh mint, and serve with lemon wedges.
']

Title: Middle Eastern-Style Marzipan

['Step 1: Place almonds in a large skillet over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Toast, stirring occasionally, until shells crack open easily, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Cool until easily handled, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Shell almonds; place in a food processor.
', 'Step 5: Add cardamom, cinnamon, and salt.
', 'Step 6: Process, slowly pouring in honey, until marzipan mixture lumps together.
', 'Step 7: Cut and form marzipan into desired shapes.
', "Step 8: Dust with confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]

Title: Kesme Helva
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour, sifted', "1 cup confectioners' sugar, sifted", '7 ounces unsalted butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Put flour in a wide saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir over medium heat until fragrant, about 15 minutes.
', "Step 3: Don't let it turn yellow.
", 'Step 4: Add sugar slowly, mixing well, until combined.
', 'Step 5: Add melted butter and vanilla to the mixture.
', 'Step 6: Mix all by a spoon or your hands, but be careful, as it can be very hot, until it has a sand-like consistency.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a 9x9-inch pan, pressing down as much as you can.
', 'Step 8: Cut the mixture into a baklava shape or squares.
', 'Step 9: Chill until set, 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 10: Serve.
']

Title: Persian Pound Cake
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 cup almond flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 cups white sugar', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup butter, softened', '1 tablespoon rose water, or more to taste', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '6 eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a large tube pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Line with parchment paper; spray parchment paper.
', 'Step 4: Whisk all-purpose flour, almond flour, baking powder, cardamom, and salt together in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Combine sugar, cream cheese, and butter in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 6: Add rose water and vanilla extract.
', 'Step 7: Add 1 egg at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 8: Beat in flour mixture gradually on low speed until batter is smooth and no lumps remain.
', 'Step 9: Pour batter into the prepared tube pan.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cool in the pan for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Invert onto a wire rack to cool completely before slicing.
']

Title: Mahallebi
Ingredients: ['5 tablespoons corn flour', '4 cups milk, divided', '1 cup white sugar', 'vanilla extract to taste', '¾ cup heavy cream', '2 cups finely chopped pistachio nuts', '2 cups water', '2 cups white sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '3 (1 inch) pieces cinnamon sticks']

['Step 1: In a small bowl, stir together corn flour and 1 cup milk.
', 'Step 2: In a saucepan over high heat, stir together 3 cups milk, sugar, and vanilla.
', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir the corn flour and milk mixture into the saucepan.
', 'Step 5: Reduce the heat to low, and allow to cool slightly; then stir in cream, stirring constantly until the cream is thickened.
', 'Step 6: Allow to cool momentarily, then pour into individual bowls or one large serving bowl.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle pistachio nuts on top.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and refrigerate.
', 'Step 9: To make the syrup, stir together water, sugar, and lemon juice in a saucepan set over high heat.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Place cinnamon sticks in saucepan, and boil about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Strain liquid, and pour into a bowl.
', 'Step 13: Allow to cool; cover, and refrigerate.
', 'Step 14: Serve puddings cold with cold syrup drizzled over the top.
']

Title: Turkish Pogaça
Ingredients: ['3 teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '2 tablespoons warm milk', '1 cup all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '1 cup whole wheat flour', '½ cup warm water, or more as needed', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon salted butter, or as needed', '1 cup crumbled feta cheese', '½ bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon chili powder', '2 tablespoons milk, or as needed', '1 teaspoon poppy seeds, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm milk in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Combine 1 cup all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, 1/2 cup water, vegetable oil, salt, and yeast mixture in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the hook attachment; knead until pliable and not too sticky.
', 'Step 4: Add a little flour if too soft, or warm water if too hard.
', 'Step 5: Cover with a wet cloth and let sit at room temperature for 45 to 50 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Grease a baking tray with butter.
', 'Step 8: Mix feta cheese, parsley, salt, pepper, and chili powder together in a bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 9: Knead dough for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Divide it into 12 equal portions, and roll each one into a ball.
', 'Step 11: Use your hands or a rolling pin to flatten each ball into a 2- to 3-inch circle.
', 'Step 12: Add a spoon of cheese filling in the middles and fold the edges upward like a bundle, pressing to secure.
', 'Step 13: Place on the prepared baking try, folded-sides down.
', 'Step 14: Brush with milk and sprinkle with poppy seeds.
', 'Step 15: Bake on the top rack of the preheated oven until golden, 30 to 32 minutes.
']

Title: Basmati with Toasted Noodles
Ingredients: ['1 cup uncooked basmati rice, rinsed and drained', '2 cups water', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ (8 ounce) package uncooked fideo noodles', '½ cup water', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']

['Step 1: Bring the basmati rice, 2 cups of water, and salt to a boil in a saucepan over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.

', 'Step 5: Pour 1/2 cup of water into the noodles, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to a simmer, and cook until noodles are tender and water has absorbed, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Gently fluff the cooked basmati rice with a fork, and lightly fold in the cooked fideo and parsley.
', 'Step 8: Add salt to taste.
']

Title: Chelo Kabob (Persian Rice with Chicken Kabob)
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ground chicken', '1 small onion, diced', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste', '¾ teaspoon ground turmeric, divided', '½ teaspoon saffron, divided', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons warm water', '3 cups water', '2 cardamom pods, bruised', '2 cups long-grain basmati rice', '3 tablespoons butter, divided', '4 medium tomatoes, cut lengthwise into quarters', '1 medium onion, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine chicken, diced onion, black pepper, salt, 1/4 teaspoon turmeric, 1/4 teaspoon saffron, and cayenne in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Shape mixture into long, sausage-like kabob shapes, or shape around skewers and put aside in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 3: Put the leftover saffron minus a pinch in 2 tablespoons warm water so that it lets out its color.
', 'Step 4: Bring 3 cups water and cardamom pods to a boil; add rice, reduce heat, and let simmer until tender and water has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes, making sure not to overcook or undercook.
', 'Step 5: Drain out any remaining starch water.
', 'Step 6: Place a pot over low heat.
', 'Step 7: Add 1 tablespoon butter, remaining turmeric, and reserved pinch of saffron; saute a bit then add the rice on top to dry out the excess water.
', 'Step 8: Drizzle the saffron water on top and add 1 tablespoon butter.
', 'Step 9: Cover and let simmer until the rice is fluffy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Melt remaining butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Fry kabobs in the hot oil until they are no longer pink in the centers, 5 to 7 minutes, flipping as needed.
', 'Step 12: Place tomatoes and chopped onion on top and cover.
', 'Step 13: Cook until tomatoes soften and release their juices (this helps it from getting too dry), about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Serve with rice.
']

Title: Grilled Chicken Shawarma Wraps with Raita
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ medium lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '1 (5.3 ounce) container plain Greek yogurt', '½ cup peeled, shredded cucumber, drained', '2 tablespoons shredded yellow onion', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '2 (8.8 ounce) packages naan breads (2 per package), warmed', '2 cups shredded lettuce', '4 thin slices red onion, separated into rings', '1 medium tomato, thinly sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: At least 2 hours ahead, or up to 8 hours ahead, combine olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, paprika, cumin, coriander, pepper flakes, turmeric, salt, pepper, and cinnamon in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir ingredients well and add chicken pieces.
', 'Step 3: Cover and refrigerate.
', 'Step 4: Stir chicken pieces and marinade about every 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: About 30 minutes prior to grilling, make the raita by mixing yogurt, cucumber, onion, cilantro, cumin, salt, and pepper together in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Cover and refrigerate until ready to make the wraps.
', 'Step 7: Preheat an outdoor gas grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 8: Place chicken pieces in a single layer onto the oiled grate, and grill until no longer pink in the center, the juices run clear, and both sides are brown, 6 to 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Timing will depend on the thickness of the chicken thighs and the distance of the grates to the heat.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Place grilled chicken on a cutting board and cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 12: Allow chicken to rest 5 to 10 minutes, then cut into thin slices.
', 'Step 13: To assemble the wraps, divide ingredients evenly: Place chicken slices in the center of each naan bread.
', 'Step 14: Top with shredded lettuce, onion rings, and tomato slices; spoon raita on top.
', 'Step 15: Wrap each naan around the sandwich ingredients, and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '708.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '73.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '93.4 mg', 'fatContent': '30.4 g', 'fiberContent': '14.1 g', 'proteinContent': '37.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '1132.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.6 g'}

Title: Cypriot Tahini Pies with Orange Flavor
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups white sugar, divided', '1 ¼ cups warm water, divided', '1 ounce compressed fresh yeast', '2 cups bread flour', '2 cups unbleached all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '6 tablespoons sesame seeds', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 orange, zested', '1 ¼ cups tahini']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 1 teaspoon sugar, 1/4 cup water, and yeast together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir well with a fork.
', 'Step 3: Sift bread flour and all-purpose flour together in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 4: Add salt and blend.
', 'Step 5: Pour in yeast mixture.
', 'Step 6: Start adding remaining water gradually; mix until dough comes together.
', 'Step 7: Place dough on a flat work surface and knead until soft and smooth, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Transfer dough to a lightly greased bowl and cover.
', 'Step 9: Place it a warm spot and let it rise for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 10: In the meantime, prepare the filling.
', 'Step 11: Add remaining sugar, sesame seeds, cinnamon, and orange zest to the tahini.
', 'Step 12: Mix well.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 15: Flatten dough gently and cut into 8 equal pieces.
', 'Step 16: Keep dough covered as you work with 1 piece at a time.
', 'Step 17: Roll out 1 piece of dough into a 6-inch disk.
', 'Step 18: Place 2 tablespoons of the filling in the middle, gather up the edges in the center, and pinch to seal.
', 'Step 19: Press down to flatten; roll back out into a 6-inch disk.
', 'Step 20: Roll disk into a log about 12 inches long.
', 'Step 21: Cut in half and stretch each piece out to make it a little longer.
', "Step 22: Roll in both ends towards the center, creating an 'S' shape.
", 'Step 23: Fold 1 spiral over the other and flatten with your palm.
', 'Step 24: Roll out slightly; transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 25: Repeat step 6 with remaining dough and filling, making 16 hand pies in total.
', 'Step 26: Keep finished pies loosely covered so they rise slightly while you finish the rest.
', 'Step 27: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 18 minutes.
']

Title: Vegan Turkish Baked Eggplant

Title: Goat Shoulder Braised with Prunes and Preserved Lemons
Ingredients: ['3 pounds goat shoulder', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '10 pitted prunes, chopped', '¼ cup chopped Moroccan preserved lemon', '½ cup dry red wine', '1 ½ cups chicken broth']

Title: Za'atar Pickles
Ingredients: ['¼ cup salt', '2 quarts water, at room temperature', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', '3 sprigs chopped fresh thyme', '3 sprigs chopped fresh oregano', '2 teaspoons harissa', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '1 cumin seed', '1 tablespoon sumac powder', '16 small pickling cucumbers, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour water into a 1-gallon glass jar with a lid and dissolve salt.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic followed by thyme, oregano, and harissa.
', 'Step 3: n Heat coriander, sesame seeds, and cumin seed in a dry pan over medium-low heat, stirring to avoid burning, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 4: Add toasted spices to the salt mixture along with sumac.
', 'Step 5: Cover tightly with a lid and shake to combine.
', 'Step 6: n Place as many cucumbers as will fit into the jar while remaining submerged in the brine.

Title: Shadi's Soup-e Mahicheh
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (1 pound) lamb shank, excess fat removed', '6 cups water', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 large carrot, chopped', '½ cup green lentils', '⅓ cup rice', '2 cups chopped fresh spinach', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 medium lemon, juiced']

', 'Step 2: Add onion; cook until translucent, about 5 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Add the water, turmeric, and pepper.

', 'Step 7: Reduce heat and simmer, covered, until lamb is almost cooked, about 40 minutes.

', 'Step 9: Cover and cook 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Stir in spinach, parsley, and cilantro.
', 'Step 11: Cook over medium-low heat 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 12: Remove lamb shank and let cool slightly.
', 'Step 13: Separate meat from bone, shred it into medium pieces, and return it to the soup.
', 'Step 14: Season with salt and additional black pepper as needed.
', 'Step 15: Add lemon juice just before serving.
']

Title: Babi's Bean Salad

['Step 1: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onions; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 3: Toss in fava beans and cook until slightly tender, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Mix 2 tablespoons water and flour together in a bowl; pour into the fava bean mixture.
', 'Step 5: Add 1 cup water, lemon juice, sugar, and salt.
', 'Step 6: Cover and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and simmer until fava beans are very tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir dill into the fava bean mixture; continue simmering until flavors are combined, about 2 minutes.

Title: Harisseh (Middle Eastern Sweets)
Ingredients: ['1 cup semolina flour', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup white sugar', '½ cup chopped almonds', '½ cup whole-milk plain yogurt', '½ cup vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon rose water', '15 blanched almond halves for garnish', '1 cup water', '2 cups white sugar', '1 teaspoon rose water', '1 teaspoon lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together semolina, baking powder, 1/2 cup sugar, and chopped almonds until evenly blended.
', 'Step 2: Stir in yogurt, vegetable oil, and rose water until a soft dough forms.
', 'Step 3: Cover bowl with plastic wrap, and allow to rest at room temperature for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Press the dough into a 10-inch square baking dish, and smooth the top.
', 'Step 6: Score the top of the dough to create 15 1-inch squares, then top each square with an almond half.
', 'Step 7: Bake in preheated oven until the top has puffed and turned golden brown, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: The harisseh is done when the top is golden, and the center has firmed.
', 'Step 9: When done, remove from the oven, and allow to cool in the pan for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: While the harisseh is cooling, pour water and 2 cups of sugar into a saucepan.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a simmer, and cook for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir in 1 teaspoon of rose water and lemon juice, then remove from the heat.
', 'Step 13: To serve, cut the warm harisseh into 15 squares, and place onto a large serving platter; pour the rose water syrup over, making sure all of the pieces are moist.
']

Title: Kefta
Ingredients: ['1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '3 medium onions, finely chopped', '1 ½ pounds ground lamb', '2 teaspoons ground allspice', '1 ½ teaspoons grated lemon zest', '2 teaspoons salt', '¼ cup butter, softened', '1 medium tomato, sliced']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, mix together the parsley, onions, lamb, allspice, lemon zest, salt and butter until well blended.
', 'Step 3: Use your hands for best results.
', 'Step 4: Place in a baking dish, or pat into a 2 inch tall round on a baking sheet with sides.
', 'Step 5: Arrange tomato slices on top.
', 'Step 6: Bake uncovered for 50 minutes in the preheated oven, until no longer pink and the internal temperature has reached at least 160 degrees F (72 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Serve with pita bread or rice.
']

Title: Vegetarian Kofta Pitas
Ingredients: ['1 medium onion, cut into chunks', '¼ cup fresh cilantro leaves', '1 ½ (12 ounce) packages meatless ground beef substitute (such as Impossible(TM) Foods)', '2 teaspoons ground paprika', '1 teaspoon Greek seasoning', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 (6 inch) pita bread rounds, cut in half', '½ cup shredded lettuce, or to taste', '¼ cup diced tomato, or to taste', '2 tablespoons diced onion, or to taste', '8 tablespoons tzatziki']

', 'Step 2: Combine onion and cilantro in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until minced.

Title: Fattoush (Lebanese Salad)

Title: Instant Pot® Lebanese Lentil and Chard Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 russet potato, cubed', '3 ribs celery, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste', '1 small bunch cilantro, chopped, divided', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '8 cups water', '1 ½ cups brown lentils', '1 bunch Swiss chard, stems removed and leaves sliced into thin ribbons', '2 lemons']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in the pot.
', 'Step 3: Add onion, potato, celery, and garlic; cook and stir until starting to soften, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle 1/2 of the cilantro, salt, cumin, coriander, and cinnamon on top; stir until fragrant.
', 'Step 5: Pour in water and lentils.
', 'Step 6: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 7: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 15 minutes.
", 'Step 8: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 9: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 10: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 11: Stir in chard; cover soup and let sit until chard wilts, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Uncover and stir in juice of 1 lemon.
', 'Step 13: Taste and adjust seasoning.
', 'Step 14: Garnish with remaining cilantro.
', 'Step 15: Cut the second lemon into wedges and serve alongside.
']

Title: Danielle's Fattoush Salad

Title: Wheat Flour Halva
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups water', '1 cup white sugar', '¼ cup rose water', '⅓ teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 pinch saffron', '½ cup butter', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water and sugar to a boil in a small pot, stirring until sugar dissolves into a syrup.
', 'Step 2: Stir rose water, cardamom, and saffron into the syrup.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to low; cover to keep syrup hot.
', 'Step 4: Melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 5: Stir in flour until mixture is a smooth paste, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Cook, stirring constantly, until paste turns brown, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove flour mixture from heat.
', 'Step 8: Whisk in hot syrup gradually until syrup is completely absorbed and mixture is the consistency of a smooth, soft paste, at least 4 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Spread mixture in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 10: Cool to room temperature, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Creamy Israeli-Style Hummus
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon peanut butter', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon sliced green onions, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 2 tablespoons chickpea liquid and 1 cup chickpeas in a bowl for hummus.
', 'Step 2: Reserve remaining chickpeas and liquid for another use.
', 'Step 3: Combine olive oil, peanut butter, lemon juice, sesame oil, cumin, onion powder, and salt in a blender.
', 'Step 4: Blend until smooth, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in chickpeas and liquid and blend until creamy, 2 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to an airtight container and chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.
', 'Step 7: Garnish with green onions to serve.
']

Title: Jiddo's Fatayer Sabanegh (Spinach Triangles)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 ¼ cups warm water (110 degrees F to 115 degrees F)', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cups whole wheat flour', '3 pounds fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed', '2 medium onions, finely chopped', '⅔ cup lemon juice', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil leaves', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves', '¾ teaspoon garlic salt']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: In a small bowl, stir together yeast, sugar and hot water; set aside until bubbles form on the yeast's surface.
", 'Step 2: Stir in salt and olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Place flour in a large bowl, then stir in yeast mixture and bring mixture together to form a soft dough.
', "Step 4: Working on a lightly floured surface, use your hands to knead the dough until it's satiny smooth and soft, about 15 minutes.
", 'Step 5: Cover dough with a clean towel and set aside to rest.
', 'Step 6: Coarsely chop the spinach.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and add spinach.
', 'Step 8: Cook spinach 2 minutes, or just until wilted; drain very well and return to the pot.
', 'Step 9: Add onions, lemon juice, garlic, basil, mint, and garlic salt.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir spinach mixture 2 minutes more to blend the flavors.
', 'Step 11: Place a pizza stone in the oven and preheat to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, cut the dough into golf-ball size pieces and roll into 5-inch diameter disks about 1/4-inch thick.
', 'Step 13: Place 1 tablespoon of spinach filling in the middle of each disk.
', "Step 14: Be sure to stir the spinach mixture frequently so the juice doesn't separate.
", 'Step 15: Fold up three sides of the disk to make a triangle, leaving a small hole in the center to release steam while baking.
', 'Step 16: Bake 10 to15 minutes, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 17: Remove and cool on racks.
']

Title: Chicken Shawarma Salad
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '½ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '1 ½ teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 clove garlic, minced', '4 (4 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '¼ cup tahini', '3 tablespoons honey, or to taste', 'cooking spray', '1 medium onion, sliced into 1/2-inch rings', '6 cups chopped romaine lettuce', '2 medium tomatoes, sliced', '1 medium cucumber, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, cardamom, paprika, turmeric, cayenne pepper, salt, and garlic in a blender or small food processor.
', 'Step 2: Pulse to combine.
', 'Step 3: Measure 1/2 cup marinade into a bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Pour the remaining marinade into a 1-gallon resealable bag and add chicken thighs.
', 'Step 5: Squeeze as much air out of the bag as possible, seal, and refrigerate, at least 4 hours or up to 24 hours.
', 'Step 6: Chicken thighs should be in a single layer; turn the bag occasionally.
', 'Step 7: Stir tahini and honey into the bowl with the reserved marinade, cover, and refrigerate until ready to make the salad.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and lightly oil a broiler pan.
', 'Step 9: Place onion slices on the oiled pan, and set chicken thighs on top of the onion slices.
', 'Step 10: Roast in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Turn and continue roasting until chicken is longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 15 more minutes.
', 'Step 12: An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Broil chicken thighs for 3 to 5 minutes for some caramelization, if desired.
', 'Step 14: Remove chicken from the oven, tent with foil and allow to rest for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Slice each chicken thigh into 1/2- inch slices and coarsely chop cooked onion.
', 'Step 16: Dress 4 salad plates with lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
', 'Step 17: Add chicken slices and chopped onions.
', 'Step 18: Stir dressing, drizzle over each salad, and serve.
']

Title: Lebanese Fatayer
Ingredients: ['1 cup hot water, divided', '1 teaspoon yeast', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons powdered milk', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ medium lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon sesame seeds, or as needed', '1 large egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix 1/3 cup hot water and yeast together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let sit for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix in flour, powdered milk, sugar, olive oil, baking powder, and salt while adding remaining water gradually to make a combined dough.
', 'Step 4: Leave in a warm place to rise for about 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: While the dough is rising, prepare the stuffing: Heat olive oil in a pan.
', 'Step 6: Add onion, then add spinach and stir-fry for a few minutes.
', 'Step 7: Season with salt and pepper and sprinkle with lemon juice.
', 'Step 8: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 11: Take small portions of the risen dough and roll into small, flat circles.
', 'Step 12: Fill each circle with about 1 teaspoon spinach mixture and fold into a triangle as follows: fold one edge of the circle to the middle, then the next, then fold the third edge over the top to shape a triangle.
', 'Step 13: Repeat with remaining dough and filling.
', 'Step 14: Brush each piece with egg and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
', 'Step 15: Place on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Spicy Baba Ganoush on the Grill
Ingredients: ['2 large eggplant', '3 tablespoons tahini', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', "1 tablespoon za'atar seasoning", '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon smoked paprika', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Using a fork, poke holes in the eggplant so steam will be able to release during cooking.
', 'Step 3: Place eggplant on the preheated grill.
', 'Step 4: Grill until skins are charred, about 30 minutes, turning occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Transfer to a baking pan, cover, and let steam for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Using your hands, carefully remove the stem and the skin; the skin should be split open and peel off easily.
', 'Step 7: Discard the skin and place flesh in a colander; let drain for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Press out any remaining moisture with paper towels.
', 'Step 9: Place eggplant in a food processor.
', "Step 10: Add tahini, lemon juice, za'atar, crushed red pepper, salt, paprika, and garlic.
", 'Step 11: Pulse until smooth.
', 'Step 12: Add olive oil and parsley; pulse until oil is incorporated.
', 'Step 13: Garnish with additional crushed red pepper flakes and parsley if desired.
']

Title: Turkish Flatbread
Ingredients: ['8 teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 cup warm water', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '7 cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups lukewarm water', '2 tablespoons lukewarm water', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon butter, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand in a warm place until frothy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in flour.
', 'Step 4: Cover sponge with plastic wrap and let rise for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Place flour in a large bowl and make a well in the center.
', 'Step 6: Pour in sponge.
', 'Step 7: Add 2 cups plus 2 tablespoons lukewarm water, olive oil, and salt.
', 'Step 8: Gradually work in the flour to make a soft and sticky dough.
', 'Step 9: Knead the dough on a floured surface for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Grease a large bowl with butter and add dough.
', 'Step 11: Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 12: Divide dough into quarters.
', 'Step 13: Cut each quarter into 10 pieces; shape each piece into a ball.
', 'Step 14: Cover balls of dough and let rest for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 17: Shape each ball of dough into a circle by flattening dough and stretching it.
', 'Step 18: Arrange 2 inches apart on the baking sheets.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the preheated oven until puffed up and golden, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Havij Polo (Persian Carrot Rice)
Ingredients: ['1 onion, thinly sliced', '½ cup salted butter', '1 pound cubed beef stew meat', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 cups grated carrots', '2 cups water', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '2 cups uncooked long-grain rice', '1 tablespoon butter, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Saute onion in butter in a large skillet over medium heat until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove onion to a bowl, leaving any excess butter in the skillet.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle meat with cinnamon and salt; cook in the skillet in the remaining butter until browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Transfer meat to a small pot, leaving butter in the skillet.
', 'Step 5: Add carrots to the skillet and cook until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove carrots to a bowl; set skillet aside.
', 'Step 7: Add water to the meat and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat and simmer until tender, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove meat and mix with reserved onions.
', 'Step 10: Pour 1 cup cooking water into the skillet used to cook the vegetables and meat.
', 'Step 11: Add sugar; mix until completely dissolved.
', 'Step 12: Set sauce aside.
', 'Step 13: While the meat is cooking, place rice in a colander and rinse several times with warm water to remove starch.
', 'Step 14: Transfer to a bowl and soak for 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Bring 6 cups salty water to a boil in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 16: Drain rice and add to the boiling water.
', 'Step 17: Boil, stirring occasionally to prevent grains from sticking together, until rice is no longer crunchy but still quite firm, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Drain.
', 'Step 19: Butter the bottom of a large pot and top with several layers of rice, the meat-onion mixture, and carrots.
', 'Step 20: Pour sauce over top.
', 'Step 21: Cover the underside of the pot lid with a clean dish towel and place tightly on the pot to absorb moisture.
', 'Step 22: Cook over low heat until crunchy on the bottom, about 30 minutes, checking often near the end to prevent burning.
']
