Title: Baba Ganoush
Ingredients: ['1 pound eggplant', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons tahini', '2 cloves garlic', '⅛ teaspoon ground cumin', '⅛ teaspoon red chile powder', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '½ tablespoon plain yogurt, or more to taste', 'salt to taste', '1 pinch paprika']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Halve eggplants and brush cut sides with olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Place face-down onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Roast in the preheated oven until softened, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from oven and let cool, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Scoop flesh out of skins and place in a mesh strainer.
', 'Step 8: Discard skins.
', 'Step 9: Press down on flesh to remove liquid or drippings.
', 'Step 10: Transfer eggplant flesh to a food processor.
', 'Step 11: Add lemon juice, tahini, garlic, cumin, and chile powder.
', 'Step 12: Drizzle olive oil on top of everything.
', 'Step 13: Blend well, 45 seconds to 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Mix in plain yogurt and season with salt.
', 'Step 15: Serve with a sprinkle of paprika over top for garnish.
']

Title: Baharat Chicken Tenders
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ teaspoons sweet paprika', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '¾ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground cardamom', '¼ teaspoon ground star anise', '⅛ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 pound chicken tenders', '1 pinch ground sea salt, to taste', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', '½ cup sliced red onion']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine sweet paprika, pepper, cumin, coriander, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, star anise, and nutmeg in a small bowl and stir to combine.
', 'Step 2: Place chicken tenders on a plate and sprinkle one side with 2 teaspoons of the spice blend.
', 'Step 3: Season with sea salt to taste.
', 'Step 4: Turn tenders and sprinkle the other side with an additional 2 teaspoons of the spice blend; add salt to taste.
', 'Step 5: Store remaining spice blend in an airtight container and reserve for another use.
', 'Step 6: Heat a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Pour in olive oil once skillet is hot and heat until it shimmers.
', "Step 8: Carefully place chicken tenders into skillet one at a time, making sure they don't touch each other.
", 'Step 9: Cook for 4 1/2 minutes, turn, and cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 4 1/2 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Remove chicken from skillet and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 12: Add onion to the same skillet and cook until soft and translucent, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove onion slices and drain on paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 14: Serve onions with chicken.
']

Title: Traditional Shorba
Ingredients: ['1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, rinsed and patted dry', '1 cup tomato puree', '1 large whole onion', '2 bay leaves', '2 pods cardamom', '2 pieces mistika', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook chicken in boiling water, skimming any fat, until partially cooked through, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir tomato puree, whole onion, bay leaves, cardamom pods, mistika, salt, and pepper into the pot.
', 'Step 4: Cook until chicken is cooked through and tender, about 50 minutes.
', 'Step 5: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Koula's Best Ever Chicken Gyros
Ingredients: ['3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1/2 inch strips', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ teaspoons white wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1 ½ teaspoons curry powder, or to taste', '4 pita breads, cut in half', '2 cups mixed salad greens', '1 cup plain yogurt']

', 'Step 2: In a cup or small bowl, stir together the ketchup, olive oil, white wine vinegar, oregano, mustard powder and curry powder.

', "Step 4: Allow the chicken to marinate while you preheat the oven's broiler.

Title: Middle Eastern Balela Salad

Title: Samoon (Iraqi Flatbread)
Ingredients: ['6 cups all-purpose flour', '5 tablespoons powdered milk', '2 tablespoons instant yeast', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened', '2 ½ cups warm water (120 to 130 degrees F/50 degrees C)', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil, or as needed', '¼ cup water', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk flour, powdered milk, yeast, sugar, and salt together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add butter and mix with your hands until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
', 'Step 3: Gradually add water to flour mixture, using your hands to mix well after each addition.
', 'Step 4: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Lightly oil a large bowl with vegetable oil.
', 'Step 6: Place dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a towel or plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Gently punch down dough.
', 'Step 9: Divide dough into 12 equal pieces and form into balls.
', 'Step 10: Cover with a light cloth and let rest 15 to 20 minutes.
', "Step 11: Dough may expand, but it's okay if it does not.
", 'Step 12: Place a ball of dough on a lightly floured surface and press with the palm of your hand.
', 'Step 13: Bring two opposite sides of dough together and pinch.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with remaining opposite sides.
', 'Step 15: Pull and press dough to form a flat, elongated diamond-like shape.
', 'Step 16: Place on a lightly greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Repeat with remaining dough.
', 'Step 18: Cover with a cloth and let rest at least 10 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Mix water, flour, and sugar for paste in a small bowl.
', 'Step 21: Brush over flatbreads and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
', 'Step 22: Bake flatbreads in the preheated oven in batches until golden brown, 7 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Persian Eggplant Stew
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salt, divided', '5 Japanese eggplants, peeled, tops left intact', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large white onion, chopped', '1 ½ teaspoons chopped garlic', '1 pound cubed stew meat', '1 cube beef bouillon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon saffron', '½ (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 cups water', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce']

Title: Eggplant, Roasted Pepper and Chicken Pitas
Ingredients: ['2 eggplants, cut into 1/2-inch slices', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'all-purpose flour for dusting', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 cup seasoned bread crumbs', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, peeled, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, sliced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 (6-inch) pita breads']

['Step 1: Sprinkle sliced eggplant with salt and allow to drain in a colander for 20 minutes.
', "Step 2: Meanwhile, preheat a grill for medium-high heat (see Cook's Note).

', 'Step 4: Dredge with flour, shake off excess, dip into beaten egg, then press into seasoned bread crumbs to coat.

Title: Afghan Tomato Soup (Aush Goshti)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ pound ground beef', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (32 ounce) can tomato juice', '5 cups water', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and coarsely chopped', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked fettuccine', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dry mustard', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste', '1 teaspoon chili paste, or to taste', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook onions in butter until they begin to soften, about 10 minutes; stir in garlic and cook for one minute.
', 'Step 3: Add ground beef and cook until beef loses its pink color, 10 to 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to break up lumps.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the tomato paste, tomato juice, water, and garbanzo beans.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt, pepper, dry mustard, dill, cilantro, chili paste, and lemon juice.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 7: Simmer uncovered 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Increase heat and bring mixture to a low boil; add fettuccine, reduce heat to medium-low and cook until fettuccine is tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Adjust seasonings adding more chile paste, salt, or lemon juice as desired.
', 'Step 10: If soup seems too thick, thin with a little water.
']

Title: Spinach Triangles (Fatayer Sabanegh)
Ingredients: ['4 cups fresh spinach leaves, chopped', '1 pinch salt', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 pinch salt', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons ground sumac', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup butter', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen phyllo dough, thawed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the chopped spinach in a bowl with a pinch of salt, and stir the spinach and salt for about 1 minute until the spinach begins to wilt and release its juice.
', 'Step 2: In a separate bowl, combine the chopped onion with a pinch of salt, and stir for about 1 minute to wilt the onion.
', 'Step 3: Add the wilted spinach, olive oil, sumac, pine nuts, lemon juice, and pepper, and stir to combine.
', 'Step 4: Let the stuffing mixture rest for 5 minutes, and then drain off the liquid.
', 'Step 5: Melt butter in a small saucepan over low heat, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Preheat an oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 8: Place a phyllo sheet onto a flat surface, and brush it lightly with melted butter.
', 'Step 9: Place a second sheet on top of the first sheet, and brush with melted butter.
', 'Step 10: Cut each stack of 2 buttered sheets into 5 strips about 3 1/2 inches wide by 13 inches long.
', 'Step 11: Cover strips waiting to be filled with a damp cloth while you fill and roll the triangles.
', 'Step 12: To fold a triangle, place a tablespoon of filling centered at the top end of a phyllo dough strip, and fold the right corner across and down, to make a pointed, filled dough pocket at the top of the strip.
', 'Step 13: Fold the pocket down one more turn, like folding a flag, to make a triangle shape.
', 'Step 14: Continue to fold the triangle down and across the dough strip until you reach the end of the strip and you have a compact, filled triangle of dough.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with the remaining filling and phyllo dough.
', 'Step 16: Place the filled triangles onto the prepared baking sheets, and brush them with butter.
', 'Step 17: Working in batches if necessary, bake in the preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes per batch, until the triangles are golden brown.
']

Title: Grilled Baba Ganoush
Ingredients: ['2 large eggplant', '3 tablespoons tahini', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons salt', '¾ teaspoon smoked paprika', '½ teaspoon cumin', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil']

Title: Moroccan-Style Chicken with Butternut Squash Noodles
Ingredients: ['2 cups spiralized butternut squash', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon Moroccan spice mix (such as McCormick®), or to taste', '½ cup orange juice', '¼ cup chopped dried apricots', '¼ cup dried cranberries', '¼ cup chopped dates', '¼ cup almond slivers', '2 cups cooked rice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place spiralized butternut squash in a bowl; add 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Toss to coat and transfer to a baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until just tender, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Heat butter and remaining 2 tablespoons oil in a large saute pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Add chicken and sprinkle both sides with Moroccan spice, salt, and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 7: Cover pan and cook, turning occasionally, until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove chicken and set aside.
', 'Step 9: Add orange juice, apricots, cranberries, and dates to the same saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir until orange juice thickens, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add almonds and toss to coat.

Title: Rose Water Turkish Delight
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 cups white sugar', '1 cup water', '3 (.25 ounce) envelopes unflavored gelatin', '2 teaspoons rose water', '1 dash red food coloring, or desired amount', "1 cup confectioners' sugar"]

['Step 1: Line a 9-inch cake pan with enough aluminum foil to have it hanging over the sides; spray with non-stick cooking spray and set aside.
', 'Step 2: Stir sugar, water, and gelatin together in a large pot; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and cook at a simmer, stirring constantly, for 20 minutes.

', 'Step 8: Cut gelatin into squares.
', "Step 9: Spread confectioners' sugar into a wide, shallow dish.
", 'Step 10: Roll gelatin squares in the sugar to coat.
']

Title: Upside Down
Ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower, broken into florets', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '1 pound ground beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 cups water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon curry powder', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 cups uncooked white rice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place the cauliflower florets onto a baking sheet, and brush with olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until beginning to brown, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: While cauliflower is baking, place ground beef and onion into a large pot over medium heat, and cook and stir until the meat is browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Break the meat apart into crumbles as it cooks.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 8: In a saucepan, bring the water to a boil, and stir in the salt, black pepper, cumin, oregano, curry powder, and turmeric.
', 'Step 9: Mix the cooked cauliflower and garlic into the ground beef and onion in the large pot, and stir in the white rice.
', 'Step 10: Pour the spiced water into the pot over the rice, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to a simmer, and cover the pot; cook until the rice is tender and the water has absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove from heat, and allow to stand covered for 5 to 10 minutes to help dry out the rice.
', 'Step 13: To serve, place a large serving platter on top of the uncovered pot, and flip to turn out the contents onto the platter.
']

Title: Tomato Freekeh

Title: Southwestern Falafel
Ingredients: ['1 quart vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', '1 onion, quartered', '1 small green bell pepper, chopped', '1 egg', '3 cloves garlic', '1 (1.25 ounce) package dry taco seasoning mix', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons peanut oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 (16 ounce) can pinto beans, drained', '1 dash hot sauce, or to taste', '1 cup dry bread crumbs, or more as needed']

', 'Step 2: Place onion, green bell pepper, egg, garlic, taco seasoning, baking powder, peanut oil, cumin, salt, and cayenne pepper in a food processor.
', 'Step 3: Puree until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Pour pinto beans into mixture and pulse until pinto beans are chopped and integrated, but not smooth.
', 'Step 5: Transfer bean mixture to a large bowl; stir hot sauce into mixture.
', "Step 6: Stir enough bread crumbs into mixture to form a dough that holds together, but isn't sticky.
", 'Step 7: Form dough into quarter-sized balls.
', 'Step 8: Deep-fry in hot oil until falafel are deep brown, about 3 to 5 minutes.
']

Title: Fava Beans

Title: Persian Melon Salad
Ingredients: ['1 honeydew melon, fruit removed with a melon baller', '1 cantaloupe, fruit removed with a melon baller', '¼ watermelon, fruit removed with a melon baller', '1 bunch grapes', '1 pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks', '2 tablespoons pickled ginger', '1 cup fresh orange juice', '¼ cup fresh lime juice', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '¼ cup chopped fresh mint', '1 pint fresh strawberries, hulled', '4 sprigs fresh mint for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:

', 'Step 2: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Gently fold the strawberries into the fruit mixture.
', 'Step 4: Garnish with the mint sprigs to serve.
']

Title: Makrout (Algerian Semolina Pastries)
Ingredients: ['4 cups semolina flour', '½ cup vegetable oil', '½ cup unsalted butter', '1 pinch salt', '⅓ cup warm water, or as needed', '1 tablespoon orange flower water', '4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '4 cups finely ground almonds', '1 ¼ cups white sugar', '1 tablespoon vanilla sugar', '2 pinches ground cinnamon', '1 dash almond extract', '1 (12 ounce) jar honey', '3 tablespoons orange flower water', '2 cups oil for frying, or as needed', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds, for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine semolina, oil, butter, and salt in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Rub the grains of semolina between your fingers, so that all the grains are well coated.
', 'Step 3: Cover with a kitchen towel and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Let it rest like this for at least 2 hours, but ideally overnight.
', 'Step 5: The mixture should be like wet, oily sand in the morning.
', 'Step 6: Combine warm water and orange blossom water when you are ready to make the makrout.
', 'Step 7: Slowly add mixture to the semolina mixture along with flour and vanilla sugar and knead into a soft dough.
', 'Step 8: Add just enough liquid for a soft, smooth dough.
', "Step 9: Don't overwork the dough-- knead it just enough to have a smooth and flexible dough that can easily be shaped into a ball.
", 'Step 10: Set dough aside.
', 'Step 11: Combine ground almonds, sugar, vanilla sugar, cinnamon, and almond extract in a bowl for the filling.
', 'Step 12: Roll mixture into 2 long logs and set aside.
', 'Step 13: Divide semolina dough into 2 balls, then flatten to pat into a rectangle, about 3 times the width of your filling logs.
', 'Step 14: Press down in the center of the rectangle with your fingers to form an indentation.
', 'Step 15: Set filling log into the indentation.
', 'Step 16: Fold dough over the filling and press the edges together to seal.
', 'Step 17: Roll the log back and forth gently to shape the dough around the filling and smooth log into a uniform shape.
', 'Step 18: You can cut the logs in half for easier handling.
', 'Step 19: Cut each log into diagonal pieces, creating diamond-like shapes.
', 'Step 20: Reshape the cut ends to have a nice uniform look.
', 'Step 21: Set the makrout aside to rest, as you heat up a deep, heavy saucepan with oil - about 3 fingers deep.
', 'Step 22: Combine honey and orange flower water in a small saucepan for the syrup.
', 'Step 23: Heat over low heat until just below simmering and keep warm.
', 'Step 24: Once the oil is hot, deep-fry makrout in small batches until golden on all sides, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 26: Continue frying until all the dough pieces are cooked.
', 'Step 27: Dip fried makrout into the hot honey syrup and submerge in the syrup for about 1 minute.
', 'Step 28: Remove and drain on wire racks.
', 'Step 29: Repeat the process, dunking each makrout into the syrup a second time.
', 'Step 30: Remove and drain on wire racks.
', 'Step 31: Sprinkle with sesame seeds, if using.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '259.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '33.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '6.1 mg', 'fatContent': '12.7 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '5.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '5 mg', 'sugarContent': '16.8 g'}

Title: Baklava Pinwheel Cookies
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter, softened', '1 cup sugar', '1 large egg', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups walnuts', '⅔ cup honey', '1 teaspoon cinnamon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cream butter and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 2: Beat in egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract.
', 'Step 3: Add flour, baking soda, and salt and beat until well incorporated.
', 'Step 4: Shape dough into a disk, cover in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 2 hours, or until firm enough to roll.
', 'Step 5: Place walnuts in a food processor and pulse until finely chopped.
', 'Step 6: In a small saucepan, heat honey and cinnamon over medium heat, stirring until honey has liquefied and cinnamon is incorporated.
', 'Step 7: Add walnuts and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat and let cool.
', 'Step 9: Remove dough from the refrigerator and roll out on a lightly floured surface into a 13x10-inch rectangle.
', 'Step 10: Using a butter knife, spread honey-walnut mixture evenly over the dough to within 1/2-inch from the edges.
', 'Step 11: Starting with the long side, tightly roll the dough, jelly-roll style, to form a log.
', 'Step 12: Cover in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper or silicone mats.
', 'Step 15: Unwrap dough and cut into 1/4-inch slices.
', 'Step 16: Place slices, cut-side down, 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to brown, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove baking sheets to a cooling rack and let cookies cool completely.
']

Title: White Bean Tabbouleh
Ingredients: ['1 cup bulgur wheat, uncooked', '1 ½ cups boiling water', '2 cups chopped fresh parsley', '1 cup chopped baby spinach', '1 tomato, diced', '½ yellow bell pepper, diced', '1 small onion, finely diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 ½ teaspoons sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 3: Add the bulgur, lightly stir to thoroughly combine the salad, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour.
']

Title: One-Pot Lebanese Chicken and Rice
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '4 ounces diced onion', '12 ounces ground beef', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '¾ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1 ½ cups long grain rice', '3 cups chicken broth', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in a heavy, oven-safe skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook chicken breasts on both sides until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Remove chicken breasts from skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Add onion and ground beef to the skillet; cook until onions are starting to brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Season with cinnamon, allspice, salt, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir rice into the skillet until fully coated with oil and spices.
', 'Step 10: Place chicken breasts on top of the rice and pour in broth.
', 'Step 11: Cover skillet with a tight-fitting lid or aluminum foil.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until rice has absorbed all liquid, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove from oven and sprinkle with parsley before serving.
']

Title: Homemade Pita Bread
Ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons instant dry yeast', '1 cup warm water, or more as needed', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '2 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or as needed', '1 tablespoon milk powder', '½ teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sprinkle yeast over 1 cup warm water, then add sugar.
', 'Step 2: Let sit until bubbles form in the water, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix 2 cups flour, 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, milk powder, and salt together in a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook attachment until combined.
', 'Step 4: Add yeast mixture and knead on low speed; it may look unmanageable at first but in a few minutes it will leave the sides of the bowl and form a ball.
', 'Step 5: Continue to knead gently until ball is soft and smooth.
', 'Step 6: If dough is too dry and hard, add 1 to 2 tablespoons warm water.
', 'Step 7: If dough is too wet, add a little flour.
', 'Step 8: Cover the dough with plastic wrap and leave in a warm place until it has doubled in size, 2 to 3 hours.
', 'Step 9: Transfer dough to a floured work surface.
', 'Step 10: Roll into a cylinder shape or flatten it with your hands and divide into 10 equal pieces.
', 'Step 11: Form each piece into a ball, cover with greased plastic wrap, and let rise for 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle a small amount of flour onto the work surface.
', 'Step 13: Take one dough ball and gently flatten it with your fingers or a rolling pin into a 6- to 8-inch circle, about 1/4 inch thick.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with remaining balls.
', 'Step 15: Cover and let rise one more time, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Heat a large skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 17: Lightly grease with remaining olive oil and place pitas into the skillet.
', 'Step 18: Cook until bubbles form and pitas puff up, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Flip and cook, without turning, until completely puffed up, another 2 to 3 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '124.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '20.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '0.1 mg', 'fatContent': '3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '3.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '121.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.7 g'}

Title: Persian-Inspired Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground lamb', '½ cup panko bread crumbs', '½ cup minced scallions', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '1 tablespoon advieh', '2 teaspoons dried dill', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', 'cooking spray', '2 tablespoons pomegranate molasses, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine lamb, bread crumbs, scallions, mint, advieh, dill, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add beaten eggs; knead by hand until smooth and sticky.
', 'Step 3: Cover and refrigerate until flavors blend, at least 30 minutes.
', "Step 4: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 5: Form the lamb mixture into 1-inch balls.
', 'Step 6: Arrange on a rimmed baking sheet.
', 'Step 7: Mist the tops with cooking spray.
', 'Step 8: Broil in the preheated oven for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Rotate the baking sheet and broil for 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 140 degrees F (60 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Brush the meatballs with pomegranate molasses as soon as they come out of the oven.
']

Title: Persian Tahdig Rice
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon saffron threads', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '4 tablespoons boiling water', '2 cups basmati rice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons butter, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Grind saffron threads with sugar in a mortar and pestle.
', 'Step 2: Transfer to a bowl and dissolve in boiling water.
', 'Step 3: Set aside to soak.
', 'Step 4: Wash starch from the rice by rinsing it in a nonstick 4-quart pot.
', 'Step 5: Rinse 3 or 4 times in lukewarm water until water runs clear.
', 'Step 6: Fill the pot 3/4 full with cold water, covering the rice.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Add olive oil and cook until rice is soft on the outside and still crunchy in the middle, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain rice and rinse with cool water.
', 'Step 10: Set aside.
', 'Step 11: Rinse any excess rice starch out of the pot.
', 'Step 12: Melt butter in the clean, dry pot.
', 'Step 13: Mound rice over the butter; add enough water to reach 1/3 of the height of the rice.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle salt over the rice.
', 'Step 15: Wrap the lid with a kitchen towel and cover the pot to seal tightly.
', 'Step 16: Simmer over medium heat until all water is absorbed and a crispy crust starts to form on the bottom, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Fluff the rice with a fork while turning it out on a plate.
', 'Step 18: Measure 1 cup rice and mix with the saffron water.
', 'Step 19: Scatter saffron rice over plain rice.
', "Step 20: Detach the layer of crust, or 'tahdig', from the bottom of the pot and serve in a separate dish as a special treat.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '275.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '49.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '10.2 mg', 'fatContent': '6.9 g', 'fiberContent': '0.4 g', 'proteinContent': '4.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3 g', 'sodiumContent': '415.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Baklava Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['6 ounces chopped walnuts', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ (16 ounce) package frozen phyllo pastry, thawed', '½ cup melted butter, or as needed', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '¾ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 cup water', '1 cup white sugar', '½ cup honey', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Butter the bottom and sides of a 9x13-inch pan.
', 'Step 3: Toss walnuts and cinnamon together in a bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Unroll phyllo dough and trim to just slightly larger than the pan so dough will run up the sides.
', 'Step 5: Place 2 sheets of dough in the prepared pan and butter thoroughly.
', 'Step 6: Repeat for a total of 8 sheets layered.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle about 2 tablespoons of cinnamon-walnut mixture on top.
', 'Step 8: Top with 2 more sheets of dough, butter, cinnamon-walnut mixture; repeat and end with 3 sheets of dough.
', 'Step 9: Butter the top of the baklava.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Leave oven on.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, combine cream cheese, sugar, and flour in the bowl of an electric mixer.
', 'Step 13: Beat on high power until smooth, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Scrape the bowl.
', 'Step 15: Beat on low speed and add eggs 1 at a time, beating about 15 seconds after each.
', 'Step 16: Scrape bowl.
', 'Step 17: Add lemon juice and beat on high speed until well blended, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 18: Pour mixture over baked baklava crust in the pan while crust is still hot.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the hot oven until set, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Cool to room temperature, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 21: Cut cooled cheesecake into 12 servings.
', 'Step 22: Combine water and sugar in a saucepan and bring to a boil until melted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Add honey and vanilla extract and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Drizzle hot sauce over the cooled cake, making sure to get in between the slices.
', 'Step 25: Refrigerate uncovered or only lightly covered with aluminum foil; a tight seal will make it soggy.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '519.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '54.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '92.4 mg', 'fatContent': '31.9 g', 'fiberContent': '1.4 g', 'proteinContent': '7.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '268.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '41.3 g'}

Title: Zucchini with Dill Weed and Garlic-Yogurt Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '4 zucchini, chopped', '1 cup chopped fresh dill weed', '¼ cup uncooked long grain white rice', '½ cup water', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 cups plain yogurt', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '½ teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir the onion until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the sugar, then add the chopped zucchini, dill, and rice.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until the zucchini is softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the water, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and bring the mixture to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce the heat and simmer the mixture until the rice is cooked, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Turn off the heat, and let the mixture cool to lukewarm.
', 'Step 7: Make a sauce by mixing the yogurt, garlic, and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Serve over the lukewarm zucchini and rice.
']

Title: Chicken Shawarma Marinade
Ingredients: ['1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, sliced into thin strips', '½ cup Greek yogurt', '1 tablespoon fresh or jarred minced garlic', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine chicken, Greek yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, cinnamon, oregano, salt, nutmeg, and cloves in a resealable plastic container or bag.
', 'Step 2: Shake until ingredients are evenly combined and chicken is well coated.
', 'Step 3: Refrigerate at least 4 hours, up to overnight.
', 'Step 4: Discard excess marinade and cook the chicken as desired when ready to make sandwiches or wraps.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '162.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '2.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '70.2 mg', 'fatContent': '5.3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '25.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '363.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.2 g'}

Title: Lebanese Fattoush (Bread Salad)
Ingredients: ['2 pita bread', '1 head romaine lettuce, chopped', '4 radishes, diced', '1 English cucumber, sliced', '1 tomato, diced', '3 green onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '¼ cup chopped fresh mint', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup lemon juice', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 tablespoon ground sumac']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place pita bread on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until the bread is a light brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the oven and allow to cool, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Break toasted bread into bite-size pieces.
', 'Step 6: Combine lettuce, radishes, cucumber, tomato, garlic, green onions, parsley, mint, and salt and pepper together in a bowl; toss until salad is well mixed.
', 'Step 7: Pour lemon juice, olive oil, and sumac into a salad dressing bottle with a lid; cover and shake until blended.
', 'Step 8: Add dressing to salad and toss.
', 'Step 9: Garnish salad with toasted pita.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '240.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '25.5 g', 'fatContent': '14.4 g', 'fiberContent': '4.6 g', 'proteinContent': '5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2 g', 'sodiumContent': '201 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.7 g'}

Title: Zereshk Polo (Persian Barberry Rice)
Ingredients: ['2 cups uncooked white rice', '2 pinches saffron, divided', '1 pinch white sugar', '1 pound chicken, cut into pieces', '7 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 tablespoon advieh (spice blend)', '1 teaspoon garlic paste', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 large potato, sliced', '4 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 cup fresh barberries', '1 tablespoon white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak rice in water to cover for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Meanwhile, place 1 pinch saffron and 1 pinch sugar in a mortar and grind to a fine power.
', 'Step 3: Transfer to a cup and fill 3/4 full with hot water.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Wash the chicken pieces, pat dry, and place in a deep baking tray.
', 'Step 7: Coat with 2 tablespoons olive oil, advieh, garlic paste, and remaining saffron.
', 'Step 8: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: While the chicken is baking, drain the soaked rice, add to a pot, and cover with 4 cups of water.
', 'Step 11: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil if desired to stop the grains from sticking to each other and 1 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 12: Boil the rice until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Drain in a colander.
', 'Step 14: Put the pot back on the stove and add remaining oil.
', 'Step 15: Lay the sliced potato in the base (to protect the rice, but also to create a delicious edible crust of rice and potato).
', 'Step 16: Top with the drained rice and cover with a lid.
', 'Step 17: Cook until the rice begins to steam, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Turn the heat to low, and leave to steam, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Heat 1/2 of the butter in a frying pan and add barberries.
', 'Step 20: Saute for 3 to 4 minutes; add 1 tablespoon sugar and 2 tablespoons of the saffron water.
', 'Step 21: Stir briefly, then remove from heat.
', 'Step 22: Place a layer of rice on a serving platter, followed by a sprinkling of barberries and a little saffron water.
', 'Step 23: Keep layering.
', 'Step 24: Leave some barberries for the top.
', 'Step 25: Arrange the chicken quarters around or on the top of the platter then spoon the saffron rice and barberries on top.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '697.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '78.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '69.8 mg', 'fatContent': '33.3 g', 'fiberContent': '3.8 g', 'proteinContent': '21.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '627 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.3 g'}

Title: Nazook (Sweet Persian Pastry)
Ingredients: ['1 cup sour cream, at room temperature', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '½ cup butter', '1 pound butter, melted', '2 ½ cups white sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4 cups all-purpose flour', '2 egg whites', '2 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon plain yogurt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix 1 cup sour cream, 2 teaspoons sugar, and yeast together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix in egg, vinegar, and oil.
', 'Step 4: Pour 3 cups flour into a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Cut in 1/2 cup butter, working it into the flour until mixture is the consistency of meal.
', 'Step 6: Stir in sour cream mixture until dough comes together.
', 'Step 7: Turn dough out onto a floured surface; knead until smooth but still slightly tacky, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Cut dough into 4 pieces and wrap each piece in plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate until firm, at least 2 hours and up to overnight.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Mix melted butter, 2 1/2 cups sugar, and vanilla extract together in a very large bowl to make filling.
', 'Step 12: Stir in 4 cups flour.
', 'Step 13: Beat in egg whites.
', 'Step 14: Roll a piece of dough into an 8x12-inch rectangle on a lightly floured work surface.
', 'Step 15: Crumble 1/4 of the filling mixture on top, leaving a 1/2-inch border on the long sides.
', 'Step 16: Cover filling with plastic wrap; flatten out with a rolling pin.
', 'Step 17: Roll dough into a tight roll, starting with one of the long sides.
', 'Step 18: Cut roll into 2-inch pieces at a slight angle.
', 'Step 19: Arrange pieces on a rimmed baking sheet.
', 'Step 20: Push tops down gently to flatten slightly.
', 'Step 21: Repeat with remaining 3 pieces of dough and filling.
', 'Step 22: Whisk egg yolks and yogurt together to make glaze.
', 'Step 23: Brush glaze over pieces of dough.
', 'Step 24: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Let cool before serving, about 15 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '336.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '39.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '63.2 mg', 'fatContent': '18.1 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '4.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11 g', 'sodiumContent': '120.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '17.1 g'}

Title: Savory Saffron Chicken Polow
Ingredients: ['5 ⅓ cups water', '6 ½ tablespoons olive oil, divided', '16 ounces yellow saffron rice', '2 yellow onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into cubes', '2 cups chicken broth', '2 (16 ounce) cans chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained', '4 ounces raisins', '1 tablespoon paprika']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water and 3 1/2 tablespoons olive oil to a boil in a large pot; stir in saffron rice.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir onions and garlic in hot oil until lightly browned and softened, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir chicken into skillet and cook until seared on all sides; add chicken broth.
', 'Step 5: Bring broth to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until broth is reduced and chicken is tender, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Shred chicken using two forks to pull chicken cubes apart.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 385 degrees F (196 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Grease a 9x12-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Spread 1/2 the rice in a layer on the bottom of the baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Spoon chicken and onion mixture over rice; spread chickpeas and raisins over chicken mixture.
', 'Step 12: Top with remaining rice and sprinkle with paprika.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until liquid is almost completely cooked off and rice is lightly browned at the edges, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Cool for 15 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '763.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '102.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '87.8 mg', 'fatContent': '19.9 g', 'fiberContent': '6.8 g', 'proteinContent': '45 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1677.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '16 g'}

Title: Mahalabia (Lebanese Cardamom Pudding)
Ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '6 tablespoons cornstarch', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 drops cardamom-flavored extract', '¼ cup water', '5 tablespoons white sugar', '¼ vanilla bean, split lengthwise and seeds scraped', '¼ cup unsalted pistachios, coarsely chopped', '1 tablespoon dried rose petals, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 3/4 cup of the milk and cornstarch in a bowl and stir until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Pour remaining milk into a pot and stir in sugar and cardamom extract.
', 'Step 3: Heat over low heat, stirring until sugar is fully dissolved.
', 'Step 4: Whisk in cornstarch mixture and simmer until thickened, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour milk mixture into 5 ramekins, cover, and cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 6: Chill in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours.
', 'Step 7: Combine water, sugar, and vanilla seeds in a pot and bring to a boil over low heat.
', 'Step 8: Stir until sugar is dissolved.
', 'Step 9: Allow syrup to cool.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle each serving with pistachios and rose petals.
', 'Step 11: Drizzle with 1 tablespoon syrup.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '213.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '38.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '7.8 mg', 'fatContent': '4.8 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '4.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '41.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '28.3 g'}

Title: Kifta and Potatoes with Tahini Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground lamb', '½ large onion, minced', '½ cup minced fresh parsley', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt', '¾ teaspoon ground allspice', '¾ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed', '5 potatoes, peeled and sliced into rounds', 'salt to taste', '2 cloves garlic, crushed and peeled', '2 lemons, juiced', '1 ½ cups water', '½ cup tahini', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine lamb, onion, parsley, salt, allspice, and pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Roll meat into 2 1/2-inch long pieces and arrange in a baking pan.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: While meat is cooking, heat vegetable oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add potatoes; fry until lightly golden, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Set aside on paper towels to drain excess oil.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 9: Remove lamb from the oven; drain and discard any fat from meat.
', 'Step 10: Leave oven on.
', 'Step 11: Combine garlic, lemon juice, water, tahini, salt, and pepper in a food processor until smooth.
', 'Step 12: Set tahini sauce aside.
', 'Step 13: Arrange potatoes on top of lamb in the baking dish and pour tahini sauce on top.
', 'Step 14: Drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 15: Return the baking pan to the oven.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until lamb is no longer pink and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 150 degrees F (65 degrees C), about 30 minutes more.
']

Title: Vegetarian Ghormeh Sabzi
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil, or as needed', '1 large onion, minced', '1 ½ teaspoons ground turmeric', 'soy sauce, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 bunches fresh parsley, chopped', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped', '3 ½ tablespoons dried fenugreek leaves (kasoori methi)', '2 cups water, or more as needed', '1 lemon, seeded and cut into 8 wedges', '1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onion in the hot oil until golden, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix in turmeric until onion is coated.
', 'Step 4: Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Stir in parsley, green onions, and cilantro, adjusting soy sauce to taste.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until herbs are sufficiently wilted, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add fenugreek and saute until incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Pour in water and add lemon slices.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to medium-low and let simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally and adding more water if necessary, about 20 minutes, adding kidney beans about 10 minutes before serving; sooner than this might make them mushy.
']

Title: Fatayer (Lebanese Meat Pies)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 pounds round steak, cut into small pieces', '2 large onion, chopped', '½ cup snipped fresh parsley', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 (1 pound) loaves frozen bread dough, thawed', '1 tablespoon butter, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add steak pieces, onions, parsley, salt, and pepper and cook until steak is browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 5: Pat bread dough on a lightly floured surface into 4- to 5-inch rounds.
', 'Step 6: Place about 2 tablespoons meat mixture on each dough round.
', 'Step 7: Fold dough over the mixture to make a triangle.
', 'Step 8: Pinch the edges of the dough together but make sure to leave the very center of the meat pie unsealed so steam can escape while cooking.
', 'Step 9: Set on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining dough and meat mixture and cover with a clean kitchen towel.
', 'Step 11: Let rise for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Bake fatayer in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 25 minutes.
']

Title: Tomato-Pesto Hummus
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed', '¼ cup water', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '⅓ cup tahini', '¼ cup tomato paste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil']

Title: Lebanese 7 Spices
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1 tablespoon ground allspice', '1 tablespoon fenugreek seeds', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon cinnamon']

Title: Tulumba (Deep-Fried Pastry with Syrup)
Ingredients: ['2 cups water', '6 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '5 large eggs', '2 cups vegetable oil for frying', '5 cups white sugar', '2 ½ cups water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring 2 cups of water and 6 tablespoons oil to a boil in a large pot over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat and stir in flour and baking powder until well combined.
', 'Step 3: Allow to cool, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add eggs, one by one, and then beat with an electric mixer until mixture is smooth and homogeneous.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, prepare the syrup.
', 'Step 6: Combine sugar and 2 cups water in a saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high.
', 'Step 7: Stir until sugar has dissolved.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat and let cool, at least 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: While syrup cools, heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Spoon dough into a tulumba syringe or an icing bag with a special nozzle and pipe small portions of dough into the hot oil.
', "Step 11: You can also drop spoonfuls of dough into the hot oil, but then the tulumbas won't have the traditional shape.
", 'Step 12: Work in batches and fry tulumbas until golden, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove to a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 14: Let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Transfer tulumbas to a bowl and pour cooled syrup on top.
', 'Step 16: Allow to soak for at least 2 hours.
']

Title: Arabian Rose Water Pudding (Muhalbiyah)

', 'Step 2: Place over medium heat, stirring with a wooden spoon, and cook until it begins to boil; cook at a boil for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat immediately; stir a few times to help it cool.
', 'Step 4: Divide the mixture between 8 small serving glasses; refrigerate until set, about 2 hours.
']

Title: Hummus I
Ingredients: ['2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained', '½ cup roasted tahini', '¼ cup lemon juice', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest, minced', '2 cloves garlic', '¼ cup packed flat leaf parsley', '¼ cup chopped green onions', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']

Title: Kookoo Sabzi (Fresh Herb Frittata)
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup fresh barberries', '1 bunch Swiss chard, stems removed', '1 bunch fresh parsley, tough stems trimmed', '1 bunch fresh cilantro, tough stems trimmed', '1 bunch fresh dill, tough stems trimmed', '1 bunch green onions, finely chopped', '½ cup walnuts, roughly chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt (such as Diamond Crystal®)', '1 teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground saffron', '¼ teaspoon ground Damask rose petals', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '6 large eggs, or more as needed', '⅓ cup olive oil', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak barberries in water to cover for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain.
', 'Step 3: Pulse Swiss chard, parsley, cilantro, and dill together in a food processor, working in batches, until finely chopped but not mushy.
', 'Step 4: Place into a large bowl with barberries, walnuts, garlic, salt, fenugreek, tarragon, turmeric, cinnamon, saffron, rose petals, and black pepper.
', 'Step 5: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 6: Add 6 eggs and mix well to combine; the batter should have the consistency of thick yogurt or soft serve ice cream.
', "Step 7: If it doesn't, add more eggs, 1 at a time, and mix to combine.
", 'Step 8: Heat 1/3 cup olive oil in a large (10- or 12-inch) nonstick frying pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add batter and spread evenly.
', 'Step 10: Cover with a lid and cook kookoo until oil starts to bubble along the sides, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cover and cook until it starts to set and the bottom is browned, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Cut the kookoo evenly into 4 large pieces and use a wide spatula to flip each piece over, 1 at a time.
', 'Step 13: Drizzle 2 tablespoons oil in between the cuts, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook, uncovered, until cooked through, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Cut into desired pieces and serve warm or at room temperature.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '238.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '6.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '139.5 mg', 'fatContent': '21.3 g', 'fiberContent': '2.6 g', 'proteinContent': '7.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '488.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.8 g'}

Title: Manaaeesh Flatbread
Ingredients: ['1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '¾ cup warm water - 110 degrees F (43 degrees C)', '¼ cup olive oil', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', "¼ cup za'atar", '¾ teaspoon kosher salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix yeast with warm water in a large mixing bowl and allow to stand until a creamy layer of foam appears, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Whisk in 1/4 cup olive oil, then gradually stir in flour and 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt.
', 'Step 3: Transfer dough to a floured surface and knead until smooth and just a little bit sticky, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Place dough into an oiled bowl and turn dough around in bowl to coat surface with oil; cover bowl and refrigerate dough overnight.
', 'Step 5: (Dough should double in size.
', 'Step 6: ) Coat a 9x13-inch baking sheet generously with 2 tablespoons olive oil; place dough in the center of the baking sheet and flatten into a thick disk.
', 'Step 7: Cover dough with plastic wrap and let double in size, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Use your palms and fingers to gently press and stretch dough to the edges of the oiled baking sheet, making the flatbread as even in thickness as you can.
', 'Step 9: With fingertips, make small indentations in the dough.
', 'Step 10: Brush dough with remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', "Step 11: Stir za'atar and 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt together in a small bowl and sprinkle evenly over the flatbread.
", 'Step 12: Let dough rest for 30 minutes uncovered.
', 'Step 13: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Bake flatbread in the preheated oven until golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '322.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '34.1 g', 'fatContent': '18.7 g', 'fiberContent': '2.4 g', 'proteinContent': '5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '404.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.2 g'}

Title: Zhoug Chicken Thighs
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '8 ounces prepared zhoug sauce, divided', '1 (12 ounce) jar fire-roasted red and yellow bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x9-inch baking dish with olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Measure 1/2 cup of prepared zhoug and spread over the bottom of the oiled baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Place chicken thighs, cut side down, on top of the zhoug.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle fire-roasted bell peppers over chicken thighs.
', 'Step 6: Using a spoon, drop remaining zhoug sauce in between the bell pepper pieces, covering as much of the chicken thighs as possible.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 8: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Carrot Recipe
Ingredients: ['4 cups grated carrots', '2 cups milk', '1 cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon butter', '½ cup cashew halves', '½ cup raisins', '1 pinch ground cardamom']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a saucepan over medium heat, combine carrots and milk.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, and cook until most of the milk evaporates, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in sugar, and simmer until mixture becomes dry.
', "Step 4: Stir constantly to ensure that it doesn't burn.
", 'Step 5: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 6: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Stir in cashews and raisins, and saute until cashews are golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Spread over carrot mixture.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle top with ground cardamom for fragrance.
']

Title: Muhammara

', 'Step 2: Process until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Serve with pita triangles.

Title: Ghorayeba
Ingredients: ['1 cup butter, softened', "1 cup sifted confectioners' sugar", '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '12 almonds, split']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, stir together the butter and sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Stir in flour and cardamom until well blended.
', 'Step 4: Pinch off tablespoonfuls of dough, and roll into a thin rope.
', 'Step 5: Join the ends together in a circle, and place on a greased cookie sheet.
', 'Step 6: Place almond halves on the joints where the circles come together.
', 'Step 7: Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 8: The cookies should remain white, but may turn golden at the very edge.
']

Title: Strawberry, Ginger and Mint Sekanjabin
Ingredients: ['4 cups white sugar', '2 cups water', '12 ounces fresh or frozen strawberries, chopped', '1 cup chopped fresh mint', '½ cup sliced fresh ginger', '2 lemons, peeled and juiced', '1 cup white balsamic vinegar (not distilled vinegar)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring the sugar and water to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Boil until the sugar has dissolved, then stir in the strawberries, mint, ginger, lemon peels, and lemon juice.
', 'Step 3: Return to a boil, then reduce heat to medium and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat, and stir in the white balsamic vinegar.
', 'Step 5: n Allow the syrup to stand overnight at room temperature, then strain out the fruits with a fine sieve.
', 'Step 6: Store at room temperature in a sterile container.
', 'Step 7: n To use, stir 1 part syrup into 4 to 6 parts water; serve cold with ice if desired.
']

Title: Middle Eastern Cumin Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '¼ cup bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 ½ cups water', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine the ground beef, egg, garlic, bread crumbs, cumin, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until well mixed.
', 'Step 2: Roll the mixture into egg-sized balls, and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add the meatballs; cook until firm, and browned on all sides, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove meatballs from the skillet and pour out the fat.
', 'Step 6: Bring the water to a boil in the same skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the tomato paste, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 9: Add the cooked meatballs, and simmer in the tomato sauce for 5 to 10 minutes until completely cooked.
']

Title: Harissa Hummus
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons harissa powder', '3 cups low-sodium chickpeas, drained and liquid reserved', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons tahini', '1 tablespoon lemon juice, or more as needed', '2 cloves garlic', '8 Kalamata olives', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro', '⅛ teaspoon harissa powder, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine harissa powder and 1 teaspoon chickpea liquid in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Whisk until a smooth paste forms, adding more liquid as needed.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Reserve about 1/2 cup of whole chickpeas for garnish.
', 'Step 5: Add remaining chickpeas to the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 6: Add 1/3 cup olive oil, tahini, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and garlic; blend until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Mix in reserved harissa paste and more chickpea liquid if needed, to maintain a creamy consistency.
', 'Step 8: Taste and adjust olive oil and lemon juice amounts until flavor is smooth and nutty with a kick, and not overpowered by any one element.
', 'Step 9: Transfer hummus to a serving dish.
', 'Step 10: Top with reserved 1/2 cup chickpeas, olives, cilantro, harissa powder, and any remaining olive oil.
', 'Step 11: Serve at room temperature.
']

Title: Jacy's Middle-Eastern Fava Bean Stew
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon caraway seeds', '½ teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 cloves garlic', '1 pinch coarse sea salt', '2 tablespoons sweet paprika', '2 tablespoons dried red pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 anchovy fillets, chopped', '2 cups diced peeled butternut squash', '2 carrots, chopped', '½ red bell pepper, diced', '1 cup frozen peas', '1 pinch salt', '2 cups vegetable broth', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans fava beans, drained', '1 (14 ounce) can canned tomatoes, diced', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '3 tablespoons pomegranate molasses', '1 cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '¼ cup chopped fresh mint']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To make harissa paste: Heat a dry skillet over high heat and add coriander, caraway and cumin seeds.
', 'Step 2: Shake pan gently until spices become fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove pan from heat and pour seeds into mortar and grind with pestle to a fine powder.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic, salt, paprika and dried red pepper flakes, mashing and stirring until garlic is incorporated with the spices.
', 'Step 5: Mixture will be dry and crumbly.
', 'Step 6: Add enough of the 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil until you have a thick paste.
', 'Step 7: Use fewer pepper flakes if you prefer less heat.
', 'Step 8: Set aside.
', 'Step 9: Pour 2 tablespoons olive oil into a large pot and add minced onions and garlic.
', 'Step 10: Cook slowly over low heat until onions are translucent, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Push onions aside in the pot, and stir in the anchovies.
', 'Step 12: Cook anchovies until they soften, mashing them with the back of a wooden spoon until they dissolve.
', 'Step 13: Stir together with the onion and garlic mixture.
', 'Step 14: Add the butternut squash, carrots, bell pepper, frozen peas and a pinch of salt.
', 'Step 15: Stir and cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Pour in the stock.
', 'Step 17: Bring to a simmer and cook for about a minute.
', 'Step 18: Stir in the drained fava beans, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, bay leaf and harissa paste (from step 1).
', 'Step 19: Add brown sugar and pomegranate molasses.
', 'Step 20: Bring back to a simmer, then reduce heat to low and cook uncovered for about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 21: The long, slow cooking time allows the flavors to deepen.
', 'Step 22: Just before serving, stir in the chopped parsley.
', 'Step 23: Top with the mint, if you like.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '315.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '45.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '2.3 mg', 'fatContent': '11.4 g', 'fiberContent': '11.9 g', 'proteinContent': '11.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '757.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.1 g'}

Title: Za'atar Pull-Apart Rolls
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup warm whole milk (110 degrees F (43 degrees C))', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '3 ¼ cups all-purpose flour, divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons salted butter, melted', '2 eggs', '½ teaspoon fine sea salt', 'cooking spray', "½ cup za'atar, divided", '⅓ cup olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine warm milk, yeast, and sugar in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until mixture is foamy, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Beat milk mixture on low speed.
', 'Step 4: Add 1 cup flour, beating just until combined.
', 'Step 5: Add melted butter, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and 1/2 cup flour; beat until combined.
', 'Step 6: Beat in eggs.
', 'Step 7: Add remaining 1 3/4 cups flour and salt.
', 'Step 8: Beat until a soft, sticky dough forms.
', 'Step 9: Spray a large bowl with cooking spray; add dough.
', 'Step 10: Cover loosely and let rise until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with cooking spray.
', 'Step 13: Punch dough down gently.
', 'Step 14: Pinch off 36 small pieces of dough and roll into balls.
', "Step 15: Whisk 6 tablespoons za'atar and 1/3 cup olive oil together in a bowl.
", 'Step 16: Immerse dough balls in oil mixture to coat all sides.
', 'Step 17: Arrange 3 dough balls in each muffin cup.
', "Step 18: Sprinkle remaining 2 tablespoons za'atar over dough.
", 'Step 19: Cover muffin tin loosely with greased plastic wrap.
', 'Step 20: Let rise until dough balls puff up over the rim of the tin, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Bake in the preheated oven until puffed up and golden, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Cool for 5 minutes in the pan.
', 'Step 23: Lift out of the pan and cool briefly on a wire rack, about 5 minutes more.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '244.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '37.4 mg', 'fatContent': '12 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '5.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3 g', 'sodiumContent': '130.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.2 g'}

Title: Namoora (Basboosa)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon tahini (sesame seed paste)', '2 cups dry farina cereal', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 cup plain yogurt', '1 tablespoon butter, softened', '16 blanched almond halves', '2 cups white sugar', '2 cups water', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon orange flower water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a 9x13-inch glass baking dish with aluminum foil and generously butter the foil.
', 'Step 2: Spread the tahini evenly over the bottom of the prepared pan in a thin layer.
', 'Step 3: Mix together farina cereal with 1 1/2 cup of sugar and baking powder in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the yogurt and 1 tablespoon of softened butter gently with your hands until the dough is smooth.
', 'Step 5: Spread dough out into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Pat the surface smooth.
', 'Step 7: Cover the dish with foil, and allow to stand at room temperature for 2 hours.
', 'Step 8: With a sharp knife, cut the dough into 16 squares; push an almond half gently into the top of each square.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until the dessert is set and the top is lightly golden brown, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: While the dessert is baking, make the syrup.
', 'Step 12: Place 2 cups of sugar into a saucepan with the water, and bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly to dissolve sugar.
', 'Step 13: Stir in the lemon juice, and boil the syrup for 5 minutes; stir in butter and orange flower water until combined.
', 'Step 14: Pour the hot syrup over the dessert as soon as it comes out of the oven.
', 'Step 15: Let cool for 1 to 2 hours to let the syrup absorb before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '285.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '62.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '4.7 mg', 'fatContent': '2.9 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '3.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '84.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '44.9 g'}

Title: Mamool or Ma'amoul
Ingredients: ['2 cups semolina flour', '1 ½ cups shortening', '1 cup boiling water', '¾ cup white sugar', '2 cups ground walnuts', '1 teaspoon rose water', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the semolina flour into a medium bowl, and cut in shortening using a pastry blender or a fork.
', 'Step 2: Pour in boiling water, and mix to form a solid dough.
', 'Step 3: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface, and knead for a minute or two to be sure the dough is well blended.
', 'Step 4: Cover dough and let stand for at least one hour, or as long as overnight.
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, mix together the sugar, ground nuts, and rose water so that the mixture is uniform.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Grease cookie sheets, or line with parchment paper.
', 'Step 9: Knead dough again briefly, and form into walnut sized balls.
', 'Step 10: Make a hole in the center using your finger.
', 'Step 11: Fill the hole with the nut mixture, and seal the dough up over it.
', 'Step 12: Gently form into balls or crescents, or make designs into the dough using a fork.
', 'Step 13: Place cookies at least 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 14: Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned.
', 'Step 15: Dust with confectioners sugar while still warm if desired.
']

Title: Farro Tabbouleh
Ingredients: ['¾ cup water', '¼ cup farro', '1 cup firmly packed fresh parsley leaves', '¼ cup fresh mint', '¼ cup finely chopped red onion', '½ cup finely diced tomato, seeds removed', '½ cup finely diced English cucumber', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water and farro to a boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until farro is tender, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and let cool.
', 'Step 4: Combine parsley and mint in the bowl of a food processor; process until finely chopped.
', 'Step 5: Transfer to a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Add farro, onion, tomato, cucumber, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; toss lightly.
', 'Step 7: Refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours before serving.
']

Title: Dukkah-Crusted Chicken Tenders with Lemon-Saffron Aioli
Ingredients: ['½ cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon preserved lemon, peel only, rinsed and minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon preserved lemon brine (from jar)', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch crumbled saffron', '2 egg whites, lightly beaten', '½ cup dukkah', '1 pound chicken tenderloins']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Combine mayonnaise, lemon peel, garlic, lemon brine, cayenne pepper, and saffron in a mini food processor; blend until smooth, scraping down sides once or twice.
', 'Step 4: Refrigerate aioli until ready to use.
', 'Step 5: Place egg whites into a dish or bowl.
', 'Step 6: Place dukkah into a second dish.
', 'Step 7: Dip chicken tenders first into egg whites, letting excess drip off, then coat with dukkah.
', 'Step 8: Place tenders on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, turning over halfway through, 12 to 15 minutes total.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Easy Mediterranean Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '4 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced', '1 small green bell pepper, diced', '1 (14.5 ounce) can fava beans, drained', '1 small onion, diced', '¼ cup lemon juice', '½ cup grated halloumi cheese', '¼ cup sliced almonds']

', 'Step 2: Add the pasta and return the water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Stir the olive oil and garlic into the pasta and water; continue cooking until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 4: Reduce the heat to medium-low and return the pasta to the pot.
', 'Step 5: Stir the tomatoes, bell pepper, fava beans, onion, and lemon juice into the pasta; simmer together until hot and the flavors have melded, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Top with halloumi cheese and sliced almonds to serve.
']

Title: Fusion Hummus
Ingredients: ['2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 clove garlic, peeled', '2 (15.5 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained', '¼ cup olive oil', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup cold water', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Strip rosemary leaves from stems, discard stems, and place leaves in the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic and pulse until finely chopped.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the garbanzo beans; process until evenly blended.
', 'Step 4: With food processor running, slowly pour in the olive oil, scraping sides of the bowl as necessary.
', 'Step 5: Pour in balsamic vinegar and process until evenly blended.
', 'Step 6: Taste, and add more vinegar, 1 tablespoon at a time, as desired.
', 'Step 7: Pour in the water and process to make a spreadable consistency.
', 'Step 8: Add more water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if necessary.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 10: Chill before serving.
']

Title: Qabali - Afghani Rice
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '5 carrot, julienned', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ cup sultana raisins', '4 cups uncooked basmati rice', '½ cup vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 cup water', '1 pinch saffron', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place rice in a large bowl, rinse, and then soak in cold water for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add carrots and 1 teaspoon sugar; cook, stirring frequently, until tender.
', 'Step 5: Stir in raisins, and continue cooking until the raisins are soft and plump.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat, and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Strain rice, and then add to boiling water.
', 'Step 9: Cook for about 5 minutes, then strain with a mesh strainer.
', 'Step 10: In a small saucepan, heat 1/2 cup oil and 1 tablespoon sugar.
', 'Step 11: Cook until sugar dissolves completely, making a syrup.
', 'Step 12: Remove from heat , and cool.
', 'Step 13: Once cool, add 1 cup water, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Return the rice to pan.
', 'Step 15: Stir in carrots and raisins, and then mix in oil and sugar syrup.
', 'Step 16: Season with saffron, cinnamon, cardamom, black pepper, and cumin.
', 'Step 17: Poke some holes with a spoon all over the rice.
', 'Step 18: Cover, and cook over high heat until you hear crackling noises.
', 'Step 19: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 20: Bake, covered, in preheated oven for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Remove from oven, and toss rice with a fork.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '278.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '44.4 g', 'fatContent': '10.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1.3 g', 'proteinContent': '4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '16.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.3 g'}

Title: Lahmajoon
Ingredients: ['1 package active dry yeast', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '2 cups warm water', '6 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '5 tablespoons shortening', '2 pounds ground beef', '1 (16 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, drained and chopped', '2 onions, finely chopped', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup finely chopped green bell pepper', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, mix active dry yeast, 1 tablespoon sugar and 1/2 cup warm water.
', 'Step 2: Allow to stand approximately 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, mix flour, salt, 3 tablespoons shortening, remaining sugar, remaining water and the yeast preparation.
', 'Step 4: Knead until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Use the remaining shortening to remove any dough sticking to the sides of the bowl, and to remove dough from fingers.
', 'Step 6: Cover with a towel and place in a warm location until doubled in size, about 2 to 3 hours.
', 'Step 7: In a medium bowl, mix ground beef, tomatoes, onions, parsley, green bell pepper, salt, cayenne pepper and black pepper.
', 'Step 8: Chill in the refrigerator until ready to use.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Lightly flour a large baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: On a lightly floured surface, form dough into 12 balls.
', 'Step 12: Separate each ball in half.
', 'Step 13: Roll halves into balls.
', 'Step 14: Place balls on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 15: Allow to stand approximately 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Roll balls into 7 inch diameter circles.
', 'Step 17: Spread approximately 1 1/2 tablespoons meat mixture over each circle.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven 15 to 20 minutes, or until beef is no longer pink and dough is lightly browned.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '269.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '27.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '32.2 mg', 'fatContent': '13.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1.4 g', 'proteinContent': '9.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '393.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.6 g'}

Title: Curried Israeli Couscous
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup minced onion', '2 cubes vegetable bouillon', '1 teaspoon yellow curry powder', '½ teaspoon oregano', '2 cups pearl (Israeli) couscous', '2 ½ cups water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion, bouillon cubes, curry powder, and oregano.
', 'Step 3: Cook, breaking up bouillon cubes, until onion is soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add couscous and mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 5: Add water to the saucepan and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cover and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 7: Simmer, stirring frequently, until couscous is soft, 8 to 10 minutes.
']
