Title: Algerian Bouzgene Berber Bread with Roasted Pepper Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 red bell peppers', '4 tomatoes', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 jalapeno pepper, chopped', 'salt to taste', '2 pounds semolina', '1 ½ teaspoons salt, or to taste', '3 cups water, or as needed', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '6 tablespoons olive oil for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Preheat your oven's broiler.
", 'Step 2: Place red bell peppers and tomatoes on a baking sheet, and roast under the broiler for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally.
', 'Step 3: This should blacken the skin and help it peel off more easily.
', 'Step 4: Cool, then scrape the skins off of the tomatoes and peppers, and place them in a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Remove cores and seeds from the bell peppers.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the jalapenos and garlic, and cook until tender, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat, and transfer the garlic and jalapeno to the bowl with the tomatoes and red peppers.
', 'Step 9: Using two sharp steak knives (one in each hand), cut up the tomatoes and peppers to a coarse and soupy consistency.
', 'Step 10: Stir, and set sauce aside.
', 'Step 11: Place the semolina in a large bowl, and stir in salt and 4 tablespoons of olive oil.
', 'Step 12: Gradually add water while mixing and squeezing with your hand until the dough holds together without being sticky or dry, and molds easily with the hand.
', 'Step 13: Divide into 6 pieces and form into balls.
', 'Step 14: For each round, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large heavy skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 15: Roll out dough one round at a time, to no thicker than 1/4 inch.
', 'Step 16: Fry in the hot skillet until dark brown spots appear on the surface, and they are crispy.
', 'Step 17: Remove from the skillet, and wrap in a clean towel while preparing the remaining flat breads.
', 'Step 18: To eat the bread and sauce, break off pieces of the bread, and scoop them into the sauce.
', 'Step 19: It will slide off, but just keep reaching in!
']

Title: Rose Water Gelees
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil, or to taste', '1 ⅔ cups cold water, divided', '7 teaspoons unflavored gelatin', '2 ⅓ cups white sugar', '3 tablespoons strained fresh lemon juice', '4 teaspoons rose water', '2 drops red food coloring', '1 tablespoon cornstarch, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Grease an 8-inch square pan with vegetable oil.
', 'Step 2: Place 2/3 cup water in a small bowl.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle gelatin on top; let stand until softened, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Combine remaining 1 cup water, sugar, and lemon juice in a saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil, stirring until sugar dissolves.
', 'Step 5: Increase heat and boil syrup, covered, for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Uncover saucepan and attach a candy thermometer to the side; continue cooking syrup until the temperature reaches 238 degrees F (114 degrees C), about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat; stir in gelatin mixture carefully until completely dissolved.
', 'Step 8: Mix in rose water and red food coloring.
', 'Step 9: Pour syrup into the greased pan.
', 'Step 10: Let stand at room temperature until gelled, about 4 hours.
', 'Step 11: Cover with plastic wrap and chill, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 12: Cut gelled mixture into 1-inch squares.
', 'Step 13: Dust with cornstarch.
']

Title: Chef John's Green Hummus
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup firmly packed fresh basil leaves', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '1 (15 ounce) can white beans, drained', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add the basil and cook uncovered until bright green, about 20 seconds.
', 'Step 2: Immediately plunge basil in ice water until cold.
', 'Step 3: Squeeze basil to remove excess moisture and pat dry with a paper towel.
', 'Step 4: Put basil, garlic, lemon juice, 1 tablespoon olive oil, garbanzo beans, and white beans, salt, and black pepper, respectively, in a blender.
', 'Step 5: Cover and blend until almost smooth; add remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil and puree until smooth.
']

Title: Rice Pudding with Rose Water

['Step 1: Bring milk and sugar to a boil in a saucepan; add rice and stir until mixture comes to a boil again.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low and cook until mixture becomes very creamy, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add more milk if mixture becomes too thick.
', 'Step 4: Pour rose water into mixture and stir until bubbles appear on the surface.
', 'Step 5: Remove saucepan from heat and cool slightly.
', 'Step 6: Pour rice pudding into a bowl and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Serve pudding cold with almonds sprinkled on top.
']

Title: Rose Petal Cookies

', 'Step 2: Beat with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl.

', 'Step 14: Cool completely before serving.
']

Title: Yummy Matzo Rolls
Ingredients: ['2 cups water', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '¼ cup margarine', '2 cups matzo cake meal', '6 egg']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring the water to boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Add the salt, oil and margarine.
', 'Step 3: When it returns to a boil, gradually stir in the matzo meal, continuing to stir until the mixture becomes a solid lump.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.
', 'Step 5: When the mixture is cool, stir in the eggs until a smooth texture is achieved.
', 'Step 6: Let stand for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Form into four balls and place on a greased baking pan.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Bake the rolls for 30 minutes.

']

Title: Pogaca (Feta Dumplings)
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup canola oil', '¼ cup butter, melted', '1 cup plain yogurt', '3 beaten eggs', '1 tablespoon sour cream', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 cup crumbled feta cheese', '1 cup finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 egg yolks', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Mix the flour with baking soda in a bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 4: Mix the canola oil, butter, yogurt, eggs, sour cream, sugar, and salt together in a large mixing bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Gradually stir the flour mixture into the wet ingredients to form a soft dough.
', 'Step 6: Knead and squeeze the dough in the bowl until it is no longer sticky, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir the feta cheese, parsley, olive oil, and paprika together in a bowl with a fork to make a filling.
', 'Step 8: Make each dumpling by pinching off about 2 1/2 tablespoons of dough; roll into a ball about 1 3/4 inches across between your hands, and press it into a flat circle 3 inches across on your palm.
', 'Step 9: Spoon 1 scant tablespoon of filling into the center of the circle.
', 'Step 10: Bring the edges of the circle together over the filling, and pinch them together to make a fat, round little stuffed dumpling.
', 'Step 11: Set the dumplings onto the parchment paper-lined baking sheet, seam sides down.
', 'Step 12: Beat the egg yolks in a small bowl, and brush the pogaca tops with the egg yolk.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle each with about 1/4 teaspoon of sesame seeds.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until the tops are shiny, brown, and crackled, 20 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Gheymeh (Persian Beef Stew)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '¾ pound beef stew meat, cut into small pieces', '1 cup dried split peas', '2 dried Persian limes', '1 ½ tablespoons tomato paste, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch curry powder, or to taste', '1 pinch ground turmeric, or to taste', '1 pinch ground black pepper to taste', 'water as needed', 'oil for frying', '½ pound potatoes, peeled']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 1/2 tablespoons oil in a saucepan over medium heat; stir in onion.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add stew meat, split peas, limes, tomato paste, salt, curry powder, turmeric, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Add just enough water to fully cover the surface of the mixture.
', 'Step 5: Cover and simmer until split peas are tender and meat is cooked through and no longer pink in the center, 2 to 3 hours.
', 'Step 6: Just before the stew is ready, heat 2 inches oil in a deep saucepan over medium heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Slice potatoes into 2-inch long, thin pieces and lower carefully into the hot oil in batches.
', 'Step 8: Fry until soft, 4 to 5 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 10: Increase the heat so the oil is 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Fry potatoes again, until golden and crisp, 4 to 5 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 12: Remove from the oil and drain on fresh paper towels.
', 'Step 13: Pour stew into bowls and place potatoes on the surface.
']

Title: Tabakh Roho (Syrian Lamb and Vegetable Stew)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ghee (clarified butter)', '1 pound lamb meat, cut into small pieces', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground cardamom', '2 onions, sliced', '1 potato, peeled and sliced', '1 pound eggplant, peeled and cubed', '1 pound zucchini, thickly sliced', '2 pounds tomatoes, cubed', '1 green chile pepper', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '¼ cup water', '6 cloves cloves garlic, crushed', 'salt to taste', '3 tablespoons dried mint', '1 tablespoon ghee (clarified butter), melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the ghee in a large pot over medium-high heat and stir in the lamb meat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until evenly browned.
', 'Step 3: Season with allspice, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, and cardamom and mix well.
', 'Step 4: Place a layer of onion on top of the lamb in the pot, but do not stir.
', 'Step 5: Top with layers of potato, eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes.
', 'Step 6: Repeat the layers of vegetables until you have used them up, ending with tomatoes on top.
', 'Step 7: Place the chile pepper in the center of the tomatoes.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt.
', 'Step 9: Dilute the tomato paste in the water, and pour it over the vegetables.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer 1 hour, until vegetables are tender.
', 'Step 11: With a mortar and pestle, crush together the garlic, a pinch of salt, and the dried mint.
', 'Step 12: Mix with 2 tablespoons of liquid from the pot, and drop by spoonfuls over the vegetables in the pot, but do not stir.
', 'Step 13: Simmer for 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 14: Transfer the stew to a wide bowl or serving dish by gently tipping the pot and letting it slide out into the serving dish, while maintaining its layers.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle with ghee, if desired.
']

Title: Zhug
Ingredients: ['1 ounce flat-leaf parsley, stems removed', '1 ounce fresh cilantro, stems removed', '2 cloves garlic', '¼ lemon, juiced and zested', "3 green bird's eye chile peppers, stems removed", '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon ground coriander', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 ice cubes', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed']

', 'Step 4: Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving to allow flavors to meld.
']

Title: Khoresht Fesenjaan (Chicken with Pomegranate Sauce)
Ingredients: ['½ cup vegetable oil', '4 medium red onions, thinly sliced', '3 pounds bone-in chicken pieces', '2 cups hot water or as needed', '2 ½ cups pomegranate juice', '4 cups chopped walnuts', '2 tablespoons freshly ground cardamom', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 medium butternut squash, seeded and cubed', '¼ teaspoon saffron powder', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the oil in a large heavy skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in sliced onions; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue cooking and stirring until the onion is very tender and dark brown, 15 to 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Raise heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 5: Add chicken pieces, and fry until lightly browned on the outside.
', 'Step 6: Pour in the water, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, adding more water if necessary to keep the mixture from drying out.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (65 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Combine the walnuts and pomegranate juice in the container of a blender or food processor.
', 'Step 10: Process into liquid.
', 'Step 11: (This can be done in small batches if necessary.
', 'Step 12: ) Add walnut-pomegranate mixture to the simmering chicken.
', 'Step 13: Season with cardamom, cinnamon, saffron powder, and salt.
', 'Step 14: Stir in the cubed squash.
', 'Step 15: Transfer the entire mixture to a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 16: Bake, loosely covered, for 2 1/2 hours in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 17: Serve with white rice.
']

Title: Air Fried Falafel
Ingredients: ['1 (15.5 ounce) can chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '1 small yellow onion, quartered', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '⅓ cup roughly chopped parsley', '⅓ cup chopped scallions', '⅓ cup roughly chopped cilantro', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'olive oil cooking spray']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dry chickpeas on paper towels.
', 'Step 2: Place onions and garlic in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade.
', 'Step 3: Add parsley, scallions, cilantro, cumin, salt, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 4: Process until blended, 30 to 60 seconds, then add the chickpeas and pulse 2 to 3 times until just blended, but not pureed.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle in flour and baking powder, scrape the sides of the bowl down with a spatula, and pulse 2 to 3 times.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to a bowl and refrigerate, covered, 2 to 3 hours.
', 'Step 7: Form the falafel mixture into 12 balls; if mixture is too sticky add some flour to your hands and your work surface.
', "Step 8: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 9: Spray falafel with cooking spray.
', 'Step 10: Cook in the preheated air fryer until golden brown, about 14 minutes, turning halfway through.
']

Title: Spicy Baked Falafel with Tzatziki
Ingredients: ['1 (32 ounce) container Greek yogurt', '1 large cucumber, peeled and finely chopped', '⅓ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '2 tablespoons garlic powder', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '8 leaves fresh mint, finely chopped, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill', '2 whole jalapeno peppers', '½ bunch parsley', '1 bunch green onions, root ends removed', '4 cloves peeled garlic', '3 (16 ounce) cans chickpeas - rinsed, drained, and dried', '2 eggs', '½ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon Greek seasoning', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon salt, divided', '½ tablespoon smoked paprika', '½ tablespoon ground black pepper', '½ tablespoon chile powder', '1 cup chickpea flour', '½ cup olive oil, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir yogurt, cucumber, lemon juice, garlic powder, sugar, lemon zest, mint, and dill together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Adjust seasonings to taste and refrigerate tzatziki until ready to serve with falafel.
', 'Step 3: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Combine jalapeno peppers, parsley, green onions, and garlic in a food processor.
', 'Step 5: Pulse until finely chopped and fully blended.
', 'Step 6: Scrape mixture down and add chickpeas.
', 'Step 7: Pulse several times until just blended and chickpeas are broken up, but texture is still rough; do not overblend.
', 'Step 8: Transfer mixture to a large bowl.
', 'Step 9: Add eggs, lemon juice, lemon zest, Greek seasoning, cumin, 1/2 tablespoon salt, paprika, pepper, and chili powder to the chickpea mixture.
', 'Step 10: Stir with a spatula until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 11: Add chickpea flour a few tablespoons at a time and stir; the final mixture should be wet, but not falling apart when handled.
', 'Step 12: Place bowl in the freezer, uncovered, to firm up mixture, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper and brush with some olive oil.
', 'Step 14: Remove chickpea mixture from freezer and form into 20 to 24 small balls and place on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 15: Brush falafel with remaining olive oil and sprinkle with remaining salt.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until falafel are dry and slightly darker brown in color, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Turn on the broiler and continue baking until tops are crisp, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Serve with tzatziki.
']

Title: Quick Couscous with Raisins and Carrots
Ingredients: ['¼ cup butter', '2 carrots, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '½ cup chicken broth', '1 ½ cups water', '1 ½ cups uncooked couscous', '¼ cup raisins']

', 'Step 5: Stir in the raisins, and serve hot.
']

Title: Apricot Almond Pilaf

Title: Apple and Honey Sorbet
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ pounds Granny Smith apples, cored and thinly sliced', '1 ½ cups water', '1 ½ cups sugar', '1 ½ lemons, juiced', '1 tablespoon honey']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large, resealable plastic bag or plastic container with a lid, mix apples with the juice of 1/2 lemon.
', 'Step 2: Freeze for several hours or overnight.
', 'Step 3: In a small saucepan, bring water and sugar to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat, and simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat, and stir in honey.

', 'Step 8: The peel will add texture, and prevent the mixture from being completely smooth.
', 'Step 9: Transfer the mixture to an ice cream machine and freeze according to directions.
', 'Step 10: Leave the sorbet out to soften 10 minutes prior to serving.
']

Title: Kubbe
Ingredients: ['3 cups fine bulgur', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '6 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '2 tablespoons coarse kosher salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste', '1 cup water, or as needed', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 large onions, finely chopped', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon coarse salt', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ cup pine nuts', '3 cups oil for frying, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place bulgur in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the flour, 6 tablespoons of vegetable oil, red pepper flakes, salt, and cumin.
', 'Step 3: Gradually mix in the cup of water to make a stiff but not crumbly dough.
', 'Step 4: Knead for a few minutes to fully bind the ingredients.
', 'Step 5: If it is too mushy, let it sit for a while, and the bulgur will absorb some of the water.
', 'Step 6: For the filling: Heat 3 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add onions and cook until browned.
', 'Step 8: Remove from the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Crumble the ground beef into the skillet, and cook until evenly browned, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 10: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 11: Season with allspice, salt, and cinnamon, and stir in the cooked onions and pine nuts.
', 'Step 12: Allow to cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 13: Form the dough into walnut-sized balls.
', 'Step 14: Press your thumb into the ball while it is enclosed in your other hand to form a tube.
', 'Step 15: The cylinder should be about 2 inches long, and the thinner the walls are, the better they will cook.
', 'Step 16: Fill the cavity with as much of the meat mixture as you can, then seal the end to form a torpedo shape.
', 'Step 17: Repeat with remaining dough and filling.
', 'Step 18: At this point, the kubbe may be frozen.
', 'Step 19: Freeze on baking sheets, then transfer to freezer bags when solid.
', 'Step 20: Heat oil in a deep fryer or heavy saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 21: If the oil is not hot enough, the kubbe will fall apart.
', 'Step 22: Carefully place the kubbe into the hot oil, and fry until nicely browned, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 23: Remove with tongs to paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 24: Serve with tahini.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '231.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '16.5 mg', 'fatContent': '12.6 g', 'fiberContent': '3.8 g', 'proteinContent': '8.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '519.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.7 g'}

Title: Kobete Chicken
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup warm water', '1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken', 'water to cover', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 onion, peeled', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 cups uncooked white rice', '½ teaspoon salt', '6 cups water', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1 egg, beaten', '1 (10 inch) unbaked pie crust']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Make Dough: Combine flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1 cup water.
', 'Step 2: Mix together.
', 'Step 3: Dough should be as soft as an ear lobe.
', 'Step 4: Divide the dough into two pieces, cover with a wet cloth and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Fill a large pot with water.
', 'Step 6: Add 1 teaspoon salt and a whole peeled onion.
', 'Step 7: Bring water to a boil and boil whole chicken in water until it is tender.
', 'Step 8: Remove chicken from pot, remove bones and cut chicken meat into small pieces.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Melt 2 tablespoons butter/margarine in pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add rice, turn heat to high and cook rice, stirring, for about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add 1/2 teaspoon salt and 6 cups water.
', 'Step 13: Cover pot.
', 'Step 14: Bring water to a boil, then remove cover, reduce heat to low and simmer about 10 minutes, until the rice absorbs all of the water.
', 'Step 15: Roll 2 reserved dough pieces out into 2 separate rounds/circles to fit a 10 inch pie dish.
', 'Step 16: Lay one round of dough in the lightly greased pie dish.
', 'Step 17: Spoon in the rice mixture and season with fresh ground black pepper.
', 'Step 18: Spread the chicken pieces on top of the rice and cover with the second dough round.
', 'Step 19: Pinch the sides closed, trimming off any excess dough.
', 'Step 20: Brush top with egg and bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Kobete is ready when the top is a nice yellowish brown.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '735.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '86.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '109.8 mg', 'fatContent': '28 g', 'fiberContent': '2.8 g', 'proteinContent': '31 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '684.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.9 g'}

Title: Vegetarian Kofta Kabobs
Ingredients: ['1 cup bulgur', '2 cups vegetable broth or stock', '1 (18.75 ounce) can adzuki beans', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro', '2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce', '1 egg, beaten', '1 cup stale whole wheat bread cubes', '1 cup skim milk', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '8 (12-inch) skewers']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine the bulgur wheat and vegetable stock in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, then simmer for about 10 minutes, or until liquid has been absorbed.
', 'Step 3: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine the adzuki beans, 2 tablespoons of olive oil, onion, garlic, cumin, coriander, cilantro, hot sauce, and the egg.
', 'Step 5: Mash with a potato masher or sturdy whisk until fairly smooth.
', 'Step 6: Soak the bread in milk, then squeeze out the excess; add to the bean mixture along with the bulgur.
', 'Step 7: Mix using your hands until everything is well blended.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour, or until firm.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Wet your hands, and form the kofta into 32 oval shapes.
', 'Step 11: Press onto skewers four at a time.
', 'Step 12: Brush with remaining olive oil.
', 'Step 13: Place on a baking sheet or broiling pan.
', 'Step 14: Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 15: Turn over, brush again with oil, and continue baking for 5 to 10 minutes, until crispy.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '311.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '56.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '23.9 mg', 'fatContent': '6.4 g', 'fiberContent': '6.2 g', 'proteinContent': '7.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1 g', 'sodiumContent': '343.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.3 g'}

Title: Za'atar Chicken Salad with Lemon-Tahini Dressing
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', "2 tablespoons za'atar seasoning", '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ pound chicken tenders', '6 cups torn, bite-sized romaine lettuce', '1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '1 cucumber, peeled and diced', '½ cup shredded carrot', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '4 tablespoons tahini', '4 tablespoons water, or more as needed', '2 cloves garlic', '1 dried date, minced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Mix 2 tablespoons lemon juice, olive oil, za'atar, garlic, salt, and pepper together in a gallon-sized plastic zip-top bag.
", 'Step 2: Add chicken tenders and refrigerate, turning occasionally, 30 minutes to 12 hours.
', 'Step 3: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 4: Place chicken tenders on the grate, reduce heat to medium, and cover.
', 'Step 5: Grill until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a tender registers 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), 4 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Remove chicken from grill and let rest.
', 'Step 7: Prepare the salad in the meantime; place romaine pieces in a large bowl and add tomatoes, bell pepper, cucumber, and carrot.
', 'Step 8: Combine lemon zest and juice, tahini, water, garlic, and date in the bowl of a mini food processor or a blender.
', 'Step 9: Pulse several times, adding water by tablespoons if necessary, until desired consistency is achieved.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Pour dressing into the salad bowl and toss.
', 'Step 12: Divide salad between plates.
', 'Step 13: Slice each chicken tender crosswise into 1/4-inch slices and place over the salads.
', 'Step 14: Garnish with chives and mint.
']

Title: Kibby (Kibby-Bel-Saneeya)
Ingredients: ['1 cup cracked wheat', '1 pound ground beef', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter, cut into small pieces', '½ cup pine nuts']

['Step 1: Soak wheat in a bowl of warm water until water is slightly absorbed, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and squeeze out excess moisture.
', 'Step 3: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Grease a 10x14-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Mix soaked wheat, ground beef, onion, lemon juice, cinnamon, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Spread mixture in the prepared baking dish; top with butter and pine nuts.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until ground beef is no longer pink, about 25 minutes.
', "Step 8: Turn on oven's broiler; broil until top is browned, 5 minutes.
"]

Title: Pakistani Pot Roast Beef Fillets (Pasanday)
Ingredients: ['1 cup plain yogurt', '1 teaspoon ginger garlic paste', '2 teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon ground black cumin', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 pounds round steak, cut into pieces', '¾ cup vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, thinly sliced', '1 ½ tablespoons lemon juice', '1 bunch fresh cilantro, for garnish', '4 fresh green chilies, for garnish']

', 'Step 2: Mix in beef until evenly coated.

', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat.

', 'Step 11: Garnish with cilantro, green chiles, and reserved fried onion.
']

Title: Easy Turkish Delight
Ingredients: ['3 cups water', '2 cups white sugar', '¼ cup unflavored gelatin', "1 ½ cups confectioners' sugar, sifted", '⅔ cup corn flour', '¼ teaspoon cream of tartar', '½ teaspoon rose water', '3 drops pink food coloring, or as desired', "¾ cup confectioners' sugar, sifted"]

['Step 1: Combine water, white sugar, and gelatin in a large microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave on high for 7 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir sugar mixture and cook in microwave for 7 minutes more.
', "Step 3: Mix 1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar, corn flour, and cream of tartar together in a bowl; stir into sugar mixture.
", 'Step 4: Heat mixture in microwave on high for 6 minutes more.
', 'Step 5: Stir rose water and food coloring into mixture.
', 'Step 6: Lightly grease a 7x11-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Pour mixture into the greased dish; refrigerate until firm, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Cut Turkish delight into small squares using a wet knife.
', "Step 9: Place 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar in a bowl.
", "Step 10: Roll Turkish delight in the confectioners' sugar until evenly coated.
", 'Step 11: Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
']

Title: Sfouf (Lebanese Turmeric Cake)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon tahini', '1 ½ cups boiling water', '2 teaspoons whole anise seeds', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons ground turmeric', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 ¼ teaspoons anise seed powder', '½ cup vegetable oil', '½ cup unsalted butter, melted', '2 tablespoons pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch baking pan with tahini.
', 'Step 3: Combine boiling water and anise seeds in a glass measuring cup; let steep, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Strain into a bowl; stir in sugar until dissolved.
', 'Step 5: Discard anise seeds.
', 'Step 6: Mix flour, turmeric, baking powder, and anise seed powder together in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Make a well in the center; mix in oil and butter.
', 'Step 8: Stir in sweetened anise water until batter is the consistency of thick yogurt.
', 'Step 9: Pour batter into the prepared baking pan.
', 'Step 10: Score top into diamond shapes with the tip of a knife; place 1 pine nut in the center of each diamond.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until top is lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
']

', 'Step 2: Add salt, mint, and ravioli.

Title: Fasoliyyeh Bi Z-Zayt (Syrian Green Beans with Olive Oil)
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package frozen cut green beans', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', 'salt to taste', '1 clove garlic, minced', '¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro']

['Step 1: Place the green beans into a large pot, and drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 2: Season with salt to taste, and put the lid on the pot.
', 'Step 3: Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until beans are cooked to your desired doneness.
', 'Step 4: Syrians like it cooked until the green beans are turning brownish in color.
', 'Step 5: The idea is not to saute them, but to let them steam in the moisture released by the ice crystals.
', 'Step 6: Add cilantro and garlic to the beans, and continue to cook just until the cilantro has started to wilt.

Title: Israeli Charoset

Title: Zhug Chicken

Title: Carrots and Lentils
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 pound carrots, cut into thin half-rounds', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '½ teaspoon ground chile pepper', '¼ teaspoon sea salt', '3 cups water', '1 cup lentils', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup Greek yogurt']

Title: Aunt Louise's Baked Kibbeh
Ingredients: ['1 cup bulgur wheat', '2 cups boiling water', '½ cup finely chopped onion, divided', '2 teaspoons salt, divided', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pound ground beef', '1 pound ground lamb, divided', '½ cup pine nuts', '¼ stick salted butter', '½ cup cherry tomatoes, or to taste', '¼ cup fresh mint leaves, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place bulgur in a large bowl and cover with boiling water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until water is absorbed, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

', 'Step 19: Garnish with cherry tomatoes and mint.
']

Title: Iraqi Sumac Salad (Summag Salad)

Title: Lahmacun Turkish Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon chopped garlic', '1 yellow onion, chopped', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground coriander seed', '½ cup green bell pepper, diced', '½ cup red bell pepper, diced', '½ lemon, juiced', '4 teaspoons olive oil', '4 roma (plum) tomatoes, halved', '1 pound lean ground lamb', '6 tablespoons double concentrated tomato paste', 'cayenne pepper to taste', 'salt to taste', '3 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '5 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '½ cup water', '1 cup plain yogurt', '½ teaspoon chopped fresh parsley', '¼ teaspoon crushed garlic', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup shredded green cabbage', '1 cup shredded red cabbage']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Combine the garlic, onion, basil, parsley, mint, paprika, cumin, coriander, diced bell peppers, lemon juice, and olive oil in a food processor.
', 'Step 3: Pulse the vegetables until finely chopped.
', 'Step 4: Add the halved tomatoes and process until the mixture is a thick puree.
', 'Step 5: Place the lamb in the preheated skillet and reduce the heat to medium.
', 'Step 6: Add the puree and the tomato paste and mix well.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir until the lamb is cooked through, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in cayenne pepper and salt to taste.
', 'Step 9: Transfer the mixture to a shallow baking dish to cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 10: Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 11: Dissolve the yeast and sugar in 1 cup warm water.
', 'Step 12: Combine the flour and salt in a mixing bowl and stir well.
', 'Step 13: Add the vegetable oil and 1/2 cup water to the yeast mixture and pour it over the flour.
', 'Step 14: Use your hands to mix the dough.
', 'Step 15: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Shape the dough into a ball and transfer to an oiled bowl.
', 'Step 17: Cover with a wet towel and let rise in a warm place until doubled in bulk, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 18: Remove the lamb sauce from the refrigerator and allow it to come up to room temperature.
', 'Step 19: Prepare the garlic sauce: combine the yogurt, parsley, crushed garlic, and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 20: Stir well and set aside.
', 'Step 21: Punch the dough down, transfer it to a floured work surface, and cut the dough into 10 portions.
', 'Step 22: Shape each portion into a round.
', 'Step 23: Flatten each round with your hand; use a rolling pin to roll each piece into a 10-inch circle.
', 'Step 24: The dough should be thin, like a crepe.
', 'Step 25: Place the rounds on parchment paper.
', 'Step 26: Preheat an oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 27: Stir the lamb sauce and then spoon it onto a dough round.
', 'Step 28: Spread it thinly to the edges and press down lightly so it sticks to the dough.
', 'Step 29: Bake pizzas on parchment paper-lined baking sheets on the lowest oven rack until the edges are a light tan color, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 30: Place on a wire rack to cool.
', 'Step 31: The pizzas can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for three days or in the freezer for three months.
', 'Step 32: To reheat, place the pizzas in a 350 degree F oven (175 degrees C) for 8 minutes.
', 'Step 33: To assemble the lahmacun, drizzle with garlic sauce, top with shredded cabbage, and roll up to eat.
', "Step 34: See the Cook's Notes for other garnish ideas.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '479.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '57.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '34.6 mg', 'fatContent': '20.1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.8 g', 'proteinContent': '17.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '571.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.3 g'}

Title: Hummus from Scratch
Ingredients: ['¾ cup dry garbanzo beans', '¼ cup dried soybeans', '1 bay leaf', '1 onion, quartered', '1 cup vegetable broth', '3 cups water', '2 cloves cloves garlic, crushed', '1 lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'black pepper to taste', '¼ cup tahini', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse the garbanzos and soybeans, and place them in a pressure cooker along with the bay leaf and onion.
', "Step 2: Add vegetable broth and enough water to cover the beans by 1 inch (or follow the manufacturer's instructions for the minimum amount of liquid required).
", 'Step 3: Seal the lid and bring the pressure up to high; reduce the heat to low and cook, maintaining high pressure, for 1 hour.
', 'Step 4: Allow the pressure to drop naturally.
', 'Step 5: Drain the beans, reserving the liquid.
', 'Step 6: Place the beans in the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 7: Add the garlic, lemon juice, soy sauce, black pepper, and tahini; process until smooth.
', 'Step 8: (You may add some of the cooking liquid for a thinner consistency.
', 'Step 9: ) Scoop the mixture into a bowl, and mix in the parsley.
']

Title: Karak Chai

Title: Flavorful Persian Braised Lamb Shanks
Ingredients: ['4 lamb shanks', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '4 tablespoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 large onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '⅓ cup hot water', '2 limes, juiced', '2 teaspoons rosewater', '¼ teaspoon crumbled saffron', '½ cup red wine', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '3 sprigs thyme, leaves picked', '½ teaspoon grated lime zest', '2 bay leaves', '6 cups hot chicken broth']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rub 1 tablespoon olive oil over lamb shanks and cover with salt.
', 'Step 2: Mix turmeric, cinnamon, cardamom, black pepper, cumin, and nutmeg together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle over lamb shanks.
', 'Step 4: Let lamb shanks marinate for 1 hour at room temperature.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pot.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir onion until browned, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 9: Whisk hot water, lime juice, rose water, and saffron together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 10: Cover and let steep for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 12: Cook lamb shanks in batches until browned, 5 to 8 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 13: Transfer lamb shanks to a plate.
', 'Step 14: Whisk wine into the pot, scraping any browned bits off the bottom.
', 'Step 15: Add onion and garlic mixture, steeped saffron mixture, parsley, thyme, lime zest, and bay leaves.
', 'Step 16: Return lamb shanks to the pot.
', 'Step 17: Cover with chicken broth.
', 'Step 18: Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, covered, until lamb shanks are tender, about 2 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 19: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Uncover pot and simmer until broth reduces slightly, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Transfer lamb shanks to an oven-safe dish.
', 'Step 22: Place lamb shanks in the preheated oven to keep warm.
', 'Step 23: Bring broth to a boil; simmer until thickened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Spoon broth over lamb shanks.
']

Title: Matbucha

Title: Kabab Barg

Title: Basboosa II
Ingredients: ['2 cups semolina flour', '⅓ teaspoon baking powder', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup sweetened flaked coconut', '¼ cup butter, melted', '1 cup plain yogurt', '¼ cup milk, or as needed', '¼ cup whole almonds', '1 cup water', '1 cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease an 8 inch square baking dish.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, mix together the semolina flour, baking powder, 1 cup sugar, coconut and butter.
', 'Step 4: Add the yogurt and milk; mix until moistened but not runny or liquid.
', 'Step 5: If you see that it is too dry, add more milk.
', 'Step 6: Spread into a greased 8 inch square baking dish, smoothing the top as much as possible.
', 'Step 7: Decorate the top with whole almonds.
', 'Step 8: Bake for 40 to 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown.
', 'Step 9: While the basboosa is baking, combine the water, 1 cup of sugar and lemon juice in a small saucepan.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil, and cook for at least 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: When the basboosa has finished baking, pour the syrup over it as evenly as possible.
', 'Step 12: Place it back in the oven for about 5 minutes, or until the syrup has been fully absorbed.
', 'Step 13: Let rest for about 20 minutes before cutting into pieces and serving.
']

Title: Layali Libnan (Lebanese Nights)
Ingredients: ['8 cups cold milk', '1 ½ cups semolina', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons rose water', '4 cups white sugar', '2 ¼ cups water', '¼ teaspoon lemon juice', '1 cup whipping cream', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '⅓ cup finely chopped pistachio nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour the milk into a large saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Reduce the heat, and slowly pour in the semolina in a steady stream, stirring continuously.
', 'Step 3: Continue to stir and cook until the mixture thickens and boils for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the eggs and rose water.
', 'Step 5: Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch serving dish, or individual dishes.
', 'Step 6: Allow the pudding to cool slightly, then cover with plastic wrap directly on the top.
', 'Step 7: Refrigerate, covered, for at least 5 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 8: Heat 1/2 cup of the sugar and 2 tablespoons of water in a heavy bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: Stir to dissolve the sugar, then cook until the mixture turns golden brown.
', 'Step 10: Immediately remove from the heat and stir in the rest of the water.
', "Step 11: Don't worry if the mixture bubbles and hardens a bit, it will dissolve.
", 'Step 12: Return the pan to the stove, and stir in the remaining sugar until dissolved.
', 'Step 13: Add the lemon juice, to the sugar syrup, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove from heat, cover and chill.
', 'Step 16: The syrup will keep for a month if refrigerated in a sealed container.
', 'Step 17: To serve, whip the whipping cream with sugar until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 18: Spread a thin layer of whipped cream over the pudding.
', 'Step 19: Sprinkle with chopped nuts.
', 'Step 20: Cut into squares, and serve with caramel syrup poured around it.
']

Title: Muhammara (Roasted Pepper & Walnut Spread)
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 ¼ cups raw walnut halves', '⅓ cup fresh breadcrumbs', '1 cup fire-roasted red bell peppers - peeled, seeded, coarsely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 teaspoons pomegranate molasses', '1 teaspoon salt, plus more if needed', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon Aleppo pepper flakes or other red pepper flakes, plus a pinch or so for garnish', '½ teaspoon cumin', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped Italian parsley for garnish']

Title: Raw Hummus

', 'Step 16: Spoon into a serving dish, and garnish with paprika.
']

Title: Kibbee Lebanese Style

', 'Step 2: Grease an 8 inch square baking dish.

Title: Vegetarian Moroccan Stew
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 yellow onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 (4 inch) cinnamon stick', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pound butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 2-inch cubes', '4 large red potatoes, cut into 2-inch cubes', '2 cups vegetable broth', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can canned diced tomatoes with their juice', '1 cup pitted, brine-cured green olives', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', '1 ¾ cups water', '1 (10 ounce) box uncooked couscous', '6 tablespoons plain yogurt', '6 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large covered saucepan or Dutch oven over medium heat, until oil is hot but not smoking.
', 'Step 2: Drop in the onion, garlic, cumin, cinnamon stick, and salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir for 5 minutes, until onion is tender and translucent.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the butternut squash and potato cubes, broth, garbanzo beans, and tomatoes, and bring the mixture to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat, cover the pot, and simmer about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the squash and potatoes are tender.
', 'Step 6: Remove the stew from heat, and stir in the olives and lemon zest.
', 'Step 7: In a large saucepan, bring 1 3/4 cup water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Stir in couscous.
', 'Step 9: Cover and remove from the heat; let stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Fluff with a fork; cool.
', 'Step 11: Serve stew over cooked couscous.
', 'Step 12: Garnish each serving with a dollop of yogurt and a sprinkle of cilantro leaves.
']

Title: Sambousa
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '½ carrot, minced', '½ onion, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon tomato paste', '1 green onion, chopped', '1 pinch seasoning salt', '1 green chile peppers, diced', '1 (16 ounce) package egg roll wrappers, cut in half into rectangles', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon water', '2 cups vegetable oil']

['Step 1: In a large skillet, brown meat.
', 'Step 2: Remove the meat from the skillet.
', 'Step 3: In the same skillet used for the meat, saute onion, garlic, carrot and green onion.

", 'Step 10: Continue back and forth (making a triangular shape) until there is no more wrapper.
', 'Step 11: Seal the wrappers closed with the flour and water mixture.

Title: Traditional Armenian Gomgush
Ingredients: ['1 bunch basil, chopped', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 bunch parsley, chopped', '1 sprig thyme, chopped', '5 medium tomatoes, chopped', '3 green bell peppers, chopped', '6 medium russet potatoes, peeled', '3 pounds lamb chops, cubed', '3 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 sprig mint, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 eggplants, chopped', '3 carrots, chopped', '2 cups beer, or more to taste', '4 brown onions, chopped', '7 cloves garlic, minced']

', 'Step 2: Reserve 2 tablespoons in a bowl and refrigerate.

Title: Green Lentils and Rice Assyrian Style
Ingredients: ['1 cup dry green lentils', '2 cups water', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 cup basmati rice', '1 large onion, chopped', '¾ teaspoon salt, or to taste']

['Step 1: Place the lentils into a pot and cover with the water.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a rolling boil over high heat for 5 minutes, then cover and remove from heat.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, rinse the rice in cold water until water comes out clear.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil or vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the rice for about 1 minute, until the grains turn opaque and white, then stir in the lentils and water.
', 'Step 6: Bring the rice mixture to a boil, then cover and reduce heat to medium-low for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir once, then cover and reduce heat further to low.
', "Step 8: Continue cooking, covered (don't remove the lid!
", 'Step 9: ) until the rice is tender, about 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in the skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue cooking and stirring until the onion is very tender and dark brown, 15 to 20 minutes more.

Title: Air Fryer Kibbeh

Title: Bamieh (Middle Eastern Okra Stew)
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 large onions, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 pounds cubed lamb stew meat', '3 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic paste', '5 (14.5 ounce) cans canned diced tomatoes, drained', '1 ½ tablespoons tomato paste', '2 beef bouillon cubes', '4 cups boiling water', '2 pounds frozen sliced okra']

['Step 1: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the onion, salt and black pepper; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned a light golden brown, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add the lamb, cinnamon, cumin, coriander, and garlic paste.
', 'Step 4: Cook on medium heat until the lamb starts to brown, 10 to 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the tomatoes and tomato paste; cook and stir for another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Dissolve the beef bouillon cubes in 4 cups of boiling water.
', 'Step 7: Pour the broth into the pot with the lamb and stir in the okra.
', 'Step 8: If necessary, add water to cover the okra.

Title: Couscous Royale
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 pounds small chicken thighs', '12 ounces Merguez or spicy Italian sausage', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 onions, minced', '2 carrots, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch rounds', '½ stalk celery, cut into 1/2 inch pieces', '1 rutabaga, parsnip, or turnip - peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes', '½ green bell pepper, cut into 1/4 inch strips', '½ red bell pepper, cut into 1/4 inch strips', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans', '2 cups chicken stock', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon harissa, or to taste', '1 bay leaf', '2 zucchini, halved lengthwise and sliced into 1-inch pieces', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 cups couscous', '2 cups chicken stock', '½ cup plain yogurt']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add chicken thighs, skin-side down, and sear until golden brown on both sides; set aside.

', 'Step 6: Season with thyme, turmeric, cayenne, harissa, and bay leaf.

Title: Authentic Falafels
Ingredients: ['1 cup dried chickpeas', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 tablespoon water', '1 ⅓ tablespoons sesame seeds', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon red chili powder', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 pinch asafoetida powder', '1 quart vegetable oil for frying, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place dried chickpeas in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Fill with water to cover; stir in baking soda.
', 'Step 3: Soak at least 8 hours or overnight in refrigerator.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Place soaked and drained chickpeas in a blender or food processor; blend to a paste.
', 'Step 6: Pour water into chickpea paste and blend until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Scrape down sides of blender with spatula if needed.
', 'Step 8: Place sesame seeds, cumin, salt, baking powder, coriander, black pepper, red chili powder, sugar, turmeric, and asafoetida powder in blender with chickpea paste; blend until well mixed.
', 'Step 9: Transfer chickpea mixture to a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Chill chickpea mixture in refrigerator to allow flavors to blend, at least 1 hour and up to two days.
', 'Step 11: Pour vegetable oil to a depth of 1 inch in a deep skillet over medium heat and heat to 370 degrees F (188 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Scoop up chickpea mixture by heaping tablespoons and form into balls the size of ping pong balls.
', 'Step 13: Fry balls in hot oil until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes on each side.
']

Title: Mediterranean Meat Pies (Sfeeha)
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '½ pound ground lamb', '1 white onion, finely chopped', '¾ cup pine nuts', '⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '⅓ cup lemon juice', '1 egg, beaten', '2 (17.3 ounce) packages frozen puff pastry, thawed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the ground beef and ground lamb, chopped onion, pine nuts, cinnamon, and salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until the meat is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard any excess grease.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the lemon juice; taste and adjust the seasonings, and let the meat mixture cool.

', 'Step 6: Lightly grease a baking sheet or line it with parchment paper.
', 'Step 7: Roll out the thawed pastry sheets to about 1/8-inch thickness.
', 'Step 8: Using a sharp 3-inch round cookie cutter, cut out at least 9 rounds per sheet.
', 'Step 9: Lightly brush the inside edges with a little water, and place about 2 teaspoons of filling into the middle of each round.
', 'Step 10: Fold the pastry round in half to cover the filling and seal the edges well.
', 'Step 11: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet and repeat with the remaining dough circles.
', 'Step 12: Brush each pie with a little egg wash.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes.
']

Title: Lamb Borek
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, diced', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 pounds ground lamb', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons currants', '3 tablespoons toasted pine nuts', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon allspice', '1 ½ cups tomato sauce', '¼ cup water', '1 large egg', '3 tablespoons full-fat plain Greek yogurt', '2 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '12 sheets frozen phyllo dough, thawed, or as needed', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds', '½ cup plain Greek yogurt', '2 tablespoons very finely sliced mint leaves', '1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon water, or as needed', 'salt to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion, salt, and lamb.
', 'Step 3: Break up lamb into small crumbles.
', 'Step 4: Cook, stirring occasionally, until most of the liquid evaporates, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Toss in garlic, currants, pine nuts, cumin, coriander, cinnamon, paprika, black pepper, cayenne, and allspice.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir for 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Pour tomato sauce into the lamb mixture.
', 'Step 8: Add water, stir, and reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 9: Cook until lamb mixture dries up and you can stir it without seeing liquid on the bottom of the pan, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Turn off heat and let cool completely before using.
', 'Step 11: In the meantime, combine egg, yogurt, water, and butter in a bowl.
', 'Step 12: Whisk together thoroughly.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Butter a round baking pan or sheet pan.
', 'Step 15: Place 2 sheets of phyllo on your work surface.
', 'Step 16: Keep remaining sheets covered with a damp towel.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle some egg wash lightly on top and spread using a pastry brush.
', 'Step 18: Layer on 2 more sheets, one at a time, brushing some more egg wash over each.
', 'Step 19: Line 1/3 of the lamb filling along one wide edge of the phyllo.
', 'Step 20: Roll pastry up starting from the filling side and place it against the edge of the pan.
', 'Step 21: Brush more egg wash on top.
', 'Step 22: Shape and fill 2 more rolls with remaining phyllo, most of the egg wash, and filling.
', 'Step 23: Wrap rolls along and inside the first one, filling the pan, and brush with egg wash.
', 'Step 24: Sprinkle sesame seeds on top.
', 'Step 25: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and crisp, 35 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Let cool for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 27: Combine yogurt, mint, lemon juice, and garlic for the yogurt sauce.
', 'Step 28: Mix in enough water to achieve desired consistency for dipping.
', 'Step 29: Season with salt and cayenne.
', 'Step 30: Cut borek into wedges and serve with yogurt sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '449.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24 g', 'cholesterolContent': '110.7 mg', 'fatContent': '28 g', 'fiberContent': '2.5 g', 'proteinContent': '25.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '1086 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.1 g'}

Title: Irmik Helvasi (Turkish Semolina Halva)
Ingredients: ['5 cups water', '3 cups white sugar', '2 cups butter', '2 ½ cups semolina flour', '½ cup pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine water and sugar in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Bring syrup to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a separate saucepan over medium-low heat, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add semolina and pine nuts.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring continuously, until golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour syrup carefully over the semolina mixture.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 8: Cover and simmer until nicely thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Let rest for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Divide halva over several small dishes.
']

Title: Cilantro Tabouli

']

Title: Lebanese Restaurant Rice Pilaf
Ingredients: ['3 cups parboiled long-grain white rice', '½ cup butter, divided', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '½ cup orzo pasta', '4 cups water', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon slivered almonds, or to taste', '1 tablespoon tahini']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak rice in a bowl of water for 10 minutes; drain and rinse until the water runs clear.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1/4 cup butter and 2 tablespoons olive oil together in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir orzo until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add drained rice and increase heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir orzo-rice mixture until rice is coated in butter-oil mixture and starts to turn translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour water over rice mixture and season with salt; stir and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cover skillet, reduce heat to low, and simmer until rice is fluffy and tender yet firm, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Heat remaining olive oil in a separate skillet over medium heat; cook and stir almonds until toasted and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add remaining butter and stir in tahini until almonds are evenly coated.
', 'Step 9: Mix almond mixture into rice mixture.
']

Title: Persian Shish Kabob
Ingredients: ['2 pounds beef tenderloin', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '⅛ cup fresh lime juice']

', 'Step 2: Add to a medium mixing bowl along with the onion, salt, black pepper, and lime juice.

', 'Step 4: Preheat grill for high heat.
', 'Step 5: Thread beef on skewers, 6 to 8 pieces per skewer.
', 'Step 6: Lightly oil grate, and place kebobs on grill.

Title: Lentil and Green Collard Soup
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 cup dry red lentils, rinsed and drained', '6 cups water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 bunch collard greens - rinsed, stemmed and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '⅓ cup lemon juice']

['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat, stir in onion and salt; cook until softened and translucent, about 4 minutes.

', 'Step 3: Pour in water, then bring to a boil over high heat, then turn heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the lentils are tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add collard greens, and cook until wilted, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: When the lentils are tender, stir in the collard greens and season with cumin, cinnamon, and garlic; allow to simmer 10 more minutes.

Title: Grape Leaves Aleppo
Ingredients: ['1 cup uncooked white rice', '2 pounds ground lamb', '2 (16 ounce) jars grape leaves, drained and rinsed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon ground allspice', '6 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 cup lemon juice', '2 kalamata olives']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak rice in cold water, and drain.
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, mix together the ground lamb, rice, allspice, salt and pepper until well blended.
', 'Step 3: Place about 1 tablespoon of the meat mixture onto the center of each leaf.
', 'Step 4: Fold the leaf over once, turn in the edges on each side, and then roll the leaf closed.
', 'Step 5: Stack the leaf-rolls in a large pot, covering each layer with slices of garlic.
', 'Step 6: Add just enough water to cover the rolls, then pour in the lemon juice.
', 'Step 7: Add the olives to the pot for flavoring, if desired.
', 'Step 8: Place a plate on top of the rolls to keep them under water.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Taste the rice for doneness.
', 'Step 11: Grape leaves taste even better after sitting for several hours.
', 'Step 12: Serve and enjoy.
']

Title: Harvey's Moroccan Roast Chicken
Ingredients: ['⅛ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '⅜ teaspoon fennel seed, ground', '¾ teaspoon sesame seeds, ground', '⅛ teaspoon ground coriander', '⅛ teaspoon ground cumin', '⅛ teaspoon ground allspice', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¾ teaspoon ground ginger', '⅛ teaspoon ground cardamom', '2 tablespoons Hungarian paprika', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon salt', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound small red potatoes, quartered', '2 cups baby carrots', '2 small lemons', '1 (4 pound) roasting chicken, rinsed and patted dry']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: For the spice mix: Mix together in a bowl the cloves, pepper, fennel, sesame seeds, coriander, cumin, allspice, nutmeg, ginger and cardamom.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: For the spice paste: Place the paprika, lemon juice, the spice mix (from Step 2), salt, chopped mint, black pepper and garlic cloves in a blender.
', 'Step 5: Add 2 tablespoons of the olive oil and blend to until ingredients are mixed, about 6 or 8 pulses.
', 'Step 6: Slowly add the additional olive oil if mixture seems too thick to spread.
', 'Step 7: Blend just until mixture is a smooth paste.
', 'Step 8: Spread potatoes and carrots in a roasting pan.
', 'Step 9: Rub about 1/4 of the spice paste inside the cavity of the chicken.
', 'Step 10: Rub the remainder of the paste on the outside of the chicken including the underside.
', 'Step 11: Place the chicken directly on the carrots and potatoes.
', 'Step 12: Pierce the 2 lemons all over with a fork, and place them into the chicken cavity.
', 'Step 13: Tent the chicken with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 14: Roast approximately 2 hours until the thickest part of the thigh reaches 180 degrees F (80 degrees C) and the juices run clear.
', 'Step 15: Remove from the oven and let rest for about 10 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '789 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '32.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '194.1 mg', 'fatContent': '45.2 g', 'fiberContent': '7.2 g', 'proteinContent': '64.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '1993 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.8 g'}

Title: Kuku Sabzi
Ingredients: ['1 large leek', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '4 large eggs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground fenugreek', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 ½ cups finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 cup finely chopped fresh cilantro', '¾ cup finely chopped fresh dill']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice leek in half lengthwise, then thinly slice crosswise.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a 10-inch, nonstick, broiler-safe skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add leek and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened and cooked through, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat.
', "Step 5: Preheat the oven's broiler with the rack in the upper third position.
", 'Step 6: Whisk eggs in a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add baking powder, fenugreek, salt, and turmeric, and whisk to thoroughly combine.
', 'Step 8: Fold parsley, cilantro, dill, and leeks into eggs.
', 'Step 9: Gently stir to combine; the mixture will be mostly herbs, with just enough egg to wet the mixture through.
', 'Step 10: Heat remaining 2 tablespoons oil in the same skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add herb mixture and distribute evenly in the pan, smoothing the top.
', 'Step 12: Cover and cook, undisturbed, until the bottom and edges are just set, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove cover and transfer to the preheated oven.
', 'Step 14: Cook until the top and middle is cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes.
']

Title: Sekanjabin (Iranian Mint Vinegar Syrup)

', 'Step 2: Add vinegar, reduce heat to low, and simmer until syrup flavors combine, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 4: n Submerge mint in hot syrup and cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 5: Remove and discard mint.
', 'Step 6: Chill in the refrigerator.
']

Title: Basboosa
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups semolina flour', '½ cup white sugar', '1 cup plain yogurt', '½ cup vegetable oil', '3 tablespoons flaked coconut', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '6 whole almonds, split in half', '1 ½ cups water', '1 ¾ cups white sugar', '2 tablespoons rose water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, mix together the semolina flour, 1/2 cup of sugar, yogurt, oil, coconut, and baking powder.
', 'Step 2: Set aside for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, stir together the water, 1 3/4 cups sugar, and rosewater.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, and boil for 3 or 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat, and set aside to cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Spread the semolina batter into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking pan.
', 'Step 8: Slice into squares or diamonds, and place on almond half onto each piece.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown.
', 'Step 10: Switch the oven setting to broil, and broil until the top is golden, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from the oven, and pour the syrup over the squares.
', 'Step 12: Serve warm.
']

Title: Tava or Turkish Stew
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes', '½ (12 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers, drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice', '1 (6 ounce) jar mushrooms, drained', '1 onion, diced', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a medium casserole dish.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the chicken until juices run clear.
', 'Step 4: Puree the roasted red peppers in a blender or food processor until smooth.
', 'Step 5: In the prepared casserole dish, mix the cooked chicken, roasted red peppers, tomatoes, mushrooms, onion, and garlic.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, and top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 8: Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until cheese is melted and bubbly.
']

Title: Adas Polow (Persian Rice and Lentils)
Ingredients: ['1 pound uncooked white rice', '4 cups water, or as needed', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 cups water, or more as needed', 'salt to taste', '2 cups dry lentils, rinsed', '¼ cup vegetable oil, divided', '2 large onions, thinly sliced', '½ teaspoon saffron', '⅓ cup hot water', '¾ cup pitted, chopped dates', '¾ cup raisins']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the rice in a bowl, and cover with water.
', 'Step 2: Soak the rice for about 3 hours, and drain off the water.
', 'Step 3: Bring the rice, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 4 cups water to a boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is partially cooked, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain the liquid from the rice, and set the rice aside.
', 'Step 6: Bring 2 more cups of water and a pinch of salt to a boil in a saucepan, and stir in the lentils.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a boil, and cook over medium heat until tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 9: Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat, and fry the onions, stirring frequently, until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Set the onions aside.
', 'Step 11: Dissolve the saffron in 1/3 cup of hot water, and set aside.
', 'Step 12: In a large nonstick pot with deep sides, heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil until shimmering, and spoon in half the rice to cover the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 13: Top the rice with the lentils, and cover the lentils with the remaining rice.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to low, cover the pot, and cook until the rice is completely tender and there is a golden brown, crusty layer of rice on the bottom of the pot, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Pour the saffron water over the rice and lentils, cover, and allow to cook until absorbed, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: To serve, spoon the polow into a serving dish, and peel off and place pieces of the crusty rice layer on top of the polow.
', 'Step 17: Decorate the polow with dates, raisins, and fried onions.
']

Title: Fasoulia (Breakfast Kidney Bean Dish)
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 jalapeno pepper, finely chopped, or more to taste', '1 tomato, chopped', '2 teaspoons tomato paste', '2 (15 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans, undrained', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons curry powder', 'salt and black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 4: Pour in the kidney beans with their liquid; stir in the cumin and curry powder.
', 'Step 5: Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the beans are hot and the sauce has thickened, about 15 minutes.
']

Title: Kafta (BBQ)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '1 medium onion, grated', '½ cup finely chopped fresh parsley', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '6 wooden or metal skewers']

['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
', 'Step 2: If using wooden skewers, soak in water.

Title: Authentic Kicked-Up Syrian Hummus
Ingredients: ['5 unpeeled garlic cloves', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '½ cup tahini', '⅓ cup fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place unpeeled garlic cloves in the middle of a large square of aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Drizzle cloves with 1 tablespoon of olive oil; wrap in foil.
', 'Step 4: Roast in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes until golden brown.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the oven, and allow to cool.
', 'Step 6: When slightly cooled, squeeze roasted garlic out of peels.
', 'Step 7: Combine roasted garlic, garbanzo beans, tahini, lemon juice, cumin, salt, and the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the work bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 8: Process until very creamy.
']

Title: Persian Rice with Potato Tahdig
Ingredients: ['2 cups basmati rice', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', '1 potato, sliced into 1/4-inch rounds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse and drain rice 2 times.
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add rice and salt; cook for 6 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain in a colander.
', 'Step 5: Rinse rice and drain again.
', 'Step 6: Put oil in the bottom of the pot and place potato slices in a single layer over top.
', 'Step 7: Pour cooked rice on top of potato slices, cover, and cook over low heat until rice and potatoes are tender, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Invert carefully onto a serving plate so sliced potatoes are on top of rice.
']

Title: Armenian Stuffed Eggplant (Imam Bayildi)
Ingredients: ['2 large eggplants', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '1 red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch strips', '½ onion, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce with no salt added', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pinch chopped fresh parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cut eggplants in 1/2, then cut each 1/2 into thirds, leaving 12 eggplant spears total.
', 'Step 3: Place on a baking sheet and brush with 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Roast in the preheated oven until fork tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Reduce the oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: While eggplants are cooking, heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat in a medium to large pan.
', 'Step 7: Add bell pepper, onion, and garlic to the hot pan and cook until onions become tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in tomatoes and cook until most of the liquid has evaporated, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 10: Remove eggplants from the oven and let cool slightly, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer eggplants to a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Slice each spear vertically using a fork and knife, being careful not to cut through skin.
', 'Step 13: Pry each open and fill with 2 to 3 tablespoons of tomato filling.
', 'Step 14: Cover with tomato sauce.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 17: Garnish with parsley.
']

Title: Toum

', 'Step 2: Mix in oil a teaspoon at a time until the mixture will absorb no more oil.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the lemon juice.
', 'Step 4: serve at room temperature with Lebanese breads, hummus or Tabbouleh.

Title: Turkish Fish Stew
Ingredients: ['3 cups water', '1 ½ cups dry couscous', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small white onion, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup marinated artichoke hearts, liquid reserved', '2 teaspoons capers, liquid reserved', '12 small green olives', '1 (14.5 ounce) can chopped stewed tomatoes, drained', '2 tablespoons white wine', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 cup water', '2 teaspoons sumac powder', '1 ½ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 pound tilapia fillets, cut into chunks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil, and stir in the couscous.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat, cover, and let sit 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and saute the onion and green pepper about 5 minutes, until tender.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the garlic, and continue to cook and stir about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix in the artichoke hearts with reserved liquid, capers with reserved liquid, and olives.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the tomatoes, wine, lemon juice, and 1 cup water (or enough to attain desired thickness).
', 'Step 7: Season with sumac powder, red pepper, basil, cumin, ginger, and pepper.
', 'Step 8: Bring the mixture to a boil, and mix in the fish chunks.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat, and simmer 10 minutes, or until the fish is easily flaked with a fork.
', 'Step 10: Serve over couscous.
']

Title: Persian Saffron-Braised Chicken Thighs
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon saffron threads', '3 tablespoons hot water, or more as needed', '1 ½ pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '2 teaspoons kosher salt, divided', 'freshly cracked black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 yellow onion, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 ½ cups chicken stock']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place saffron threads into a small bowl and crush them up a bit with a spoon.
', 'Step 2: Add 3 to 4 tablespoons of hot water and stir.
', 'Step 3: Let bloom for about 10 minutes - the water should turn bright yellow/orange.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Season chicken thighs on both sides with about 1 teaspoon salt and freshly cracked pepper.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add chicken thighs and sear on both sides until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 8: Remove and place on a plate to the side.
', 'Step 9: Add onion to the same skillet and cook until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in garlic and curry powder and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Pour in chicken stock and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to a simmer and add saffron mixture.
', 'Step 13: Season with remaining 1 teaspoon salt and freshly cracked pepper.
', 'Step 14: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 15: Return chicken thighs to the skillet, cover, and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, flipping thighs halfway through cook time.
', 'Step 16: Season to taste and serve with the sauce.
']

Title: Turkish Red Lentil 'Bride' Soup
Ingredients: ['¼ cup butter', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 cup red lentils', '½ cup fine bulgur', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '8 cups vegetable stock', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon dried mint leaves', '4 slices lemon', '½ teaspoon chopped fresh mint']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook the onions in the hot butter until they are golden brown, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir the paprika, lentils, and bulgur into the onions and coat with the butter.
', 'Step 4: Add the tomato paste, vegetable stock, and cayenne pepper; bring to a boil and cook until soft and creamy, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: Crumble the dried mint leaves into the soup; stir the soup and remove from heat.
', 'Step 6: Ladle into bowls and garnish with lemon slices and fresh mint to serve.
']
