Title: Upside Down (Maqluba)
Ingredients: ['7 cups water', '2 onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups cooking oil', '2 cups lamb meat, cut into small pieces', '1 large eggplant, cut into 3/4-inch slices', '2 zucchini, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '1 cup broccoli', '1 cup cauliflower', '1 ½ cups jasmine rice', '1 (16 ounce) container plain yogurt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring to a boil the water, onion, garlic, cinnamon, turmeric, garam masala, salt, and pepper in a large pot.
', 'Step 2: Add the lamb; reduce the heat to low and simmer 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Separate the lamb from the liquid and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Transfer the liquid to a bowl.
', 'Step 5: While the lamb mixture simmers, heat the oil in a large, deep skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Fry the eggplant slices in the hot oil, assuring the pieces do not touch, until brown on both sides; remove to a plate lined with paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 7: Use the same procedure to fry the zucchini and the cauliflower.
', 'Step 8: Cook the broccoli in the oil until hot and remove to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
', 'Step 9: Layer the lamb into the bottom of the large pot.
', 'Step 10: Arrange the eggplant, zucchini, broccoli, and cauliflower on top of the lamb in layers.
', 'Step 11: Pour the rice over the meat and vegetables, shaking the pot gently to allow the rice to settle into the dish.
', 'Step 12: Pour the reserved cooking liquid from the lamb over the mixture until it is completely covered.
', 'Step 13: Add water if needed.
', 'Step 14: Cover the pot and simmer over low heat until the rice is soft and the liquid is absorbed, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove the lid from the pot.
', 'Step 16: Place a large platter over the pot and flip the pot so the dish is "upside down" on the platter.
', 'Step 17: Serve with yogurt on the side.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '1018.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '58.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '50 mg', 'fatContent': '78.1 g', 'fiberContent': '6.8 g', 'proteinContent': '24.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '152.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '10.9 g'}

Title: Beef and Okra Bamia
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 pound beef top sirloin, cut into 1-inch cubes', '½ large onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (10 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen okra, thawed', '2 cups water', '1 ½ tablespoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground white pepper', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', 'salt to taste', '1 jalapeno pepper, thinly sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large pot over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle 1 tablespoon salt over steak cubes; cook and stir meat in the hot oil with onion and garlic until meat is seared, about 5 minutes; reduce heat to medium; cook and stir until meat is browned, about 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove steak pieces and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Stir tomato sauce and tomato paste into same pot; mix in okra, water, coriander, white pepper, and cumin.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil; season with additional salt.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer until okra is tender, 30 to 45 minutes; return pieces of beef to the bamia.
', 'Step 7: Simmer until flavors are blended, about 10 minutes; garnish with slices of jalapeno pepper.
']

Title: Shakshuka (Middle Eastern Breakfast Dish)
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 zucchini, chopped', '1 (10 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '4 dashes hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)', '4 eggs', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the garlic and onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in zucchini; cook and stir for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the crushed tomatoes and hot pepper sauce.
', 'Step 5: Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Make 4 wells in the tomato mixture, and crack the eggs into each well.
', 'Step 7: Do not stir.
', 'Step 8: Cover and cook until eggs are desired consistency, about 3 minutes for soft yolks.
', 'Step 9: Carefully remove the eggs from the skillet and serve with the tomato sauce.
']

Title: Homemade Tahini
Ingredients: ['5 ½ cups sesame seeds', '2 ½ cups olive oil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spread sesame seeds on a rimmed baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: n Bake in the preheated oven, shaking the baking sheet frequently, until seeds are lightly toasted, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: n Pour cooled seeds and 1 1/2 cups olive oil into a food processor.
', 'Step 6: Blend until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add more oil and blend until a thick yet pourable consistency is reached.
']

Title: Duck Fesenjan
Ingredients: ['8 legs duck', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '¼ cup water, or as needed', '3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste', '2 cups diced yellow onion', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '6 cups chicken broth, or more as needed', '⅔ cup pomegranate molasses', '¼ cup honey', '3 cups walnut halves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season duck legs all over with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Place duck legs, skin-side down, in hot oil and cook until browned, 2 to 5 minutes; turn and cook until browned on the other side, 2 to 4 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Transfer legs to a plate; pour rendered duck fat into a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Pour water into the skillet and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Heat about 2 tablespoons duck fat and olive oil in Dutch oven medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir onion in hot oil and fat until golden brown, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add turmeric, cinnamon, nutmeg; cook and stir until fragrant, 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Pour chicken broth, pomegranate molasses, honey, and reserved water mixture from the skillet into onions; bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 11: Grind walnuts to a fine powder in a food processor.
', 'Step 12: Cook and stir walnuts in a skillet over medium heat until fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir walnuts into broth mixture; place duck legs in broth to cover in broth.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat and simmer until duck legs are tender, 3 to 4 hours.
', 'Step 15: Transfer duck to a serving dish.
', 'Step 16: Bring broth mixture to a boil; cook until reduced and desired sauce consistency is reached.
', 'Step 17: Season with salt.
', 'Step 18: Ladle sauce over duck legs.
']

Title: Cilantro and Garlic Potatoes

Title: Fatoosh

Title: Turkish Meatballs (Kofta)
Ingredients: ['2 slices slightly stale whole wheat bread', '1 pound lean ground lamb', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried mint', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil']

', 'Step 2: Add ground lamb and egg; process until blended.
', 'Step 3: Add parsley, garlic, cumin, mint, allspice, salt, and pepper; process until evenly combined.

', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook meatballs in batches, turning occasionally, until browned on all sides, 4 to 5 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate using a slotted spoon.
']

Title: Lebanese Zaatar (Za'atar) Bread

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

", 'Step 5: Shape dough, about 1/4 cup per piece, into rounds on a floured work surface.

Title: Chard Lentil Soup, Lebanese-Style
Ingredients: ['8 cups water', '1 cup large brown lentils, rinsed', '4 cups thinly sliced Swiss chard', '4 large potatoes, cut into cubes', '1 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '6 cloves garlic, crushed (or more to taste)', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '½ cup olive oil']

', 'Step 2: Cook lentils in boiling water until beginning to soften, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add chard; continue cooking until wilted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add potatoes to the boiling water, reduce heat to medium-low, cover the pot, and cook until the potatoes are completely cooked, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix lemon juice, crushed garlic, and salt together in a bowl; add to the pot.
', 'Step 6: Continue to cook at a simmer another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir olive oil into the mixture.
', 'Step 8: Increase heat to high and cook another 1 to 2 minutes.

Title: Easy Lamb Gyros
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '3 pounds ground lamb', '½ cup Greek seasoning', '1 large egg', '12 (6 inch) pita breads, warmed', '1 head iceberg lettuce, finely shredded', '5 medium Roma tomatoes, diced', '1 medium red onion, diced', '½ cup tzatziki sauce, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a large loaf pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Combine lamb, Greek seasoning, and egg in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix until ingredients are very well combined (overmixing is preferable here.
', 'Step 5: ) Firmly press mixture into the prepared loaf pan, making sure there are no air pockets under the meat.
', 'Step 6: Cover with foil.
', 'Step 7: Cook in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Remove from the oven and let rest, covered, until all the grease on top is absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove meat from the pan and cut into thin slices.
', 'Step 10: Load meat into the center of warmed pitas.
', 'Step 11: Top with lettuce, tomatoes, onion, and tzatziki sauce.
', 'Step 12: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Lavash Cracker Bread
Ingredients: ['1 cup lukewarm water', '¼ cup whole wheat flour', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, stir together the water, whole wheat flour, and yeast until moistened.
', 'Step 2: Mix in the salt and 1 cup of all-purpose flour.
', 'Step 3: Gradually mix in the rest of the flour using a mixer with a dough hook attachment or wooden spoon.
', 'Step 4: When the dough comes together, knead in your mixer or on a floured surface for 8 to 10 minutes to make an elastic ball.
', 'Step 5: Add more flour or water if needed to keep dough from getting sticky or too stiff.
', 'Step 6: Pour a little bit of oil in the bowl and turn the dough to coat.
', 'Step 7: Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Punch down the dough and divide into 30 pieces about the size of small walnuts.
', 'Step 9: Rolling the dough into a long log helps to divide it evenly.
', 'Step 10: Roll each piece into a ball and cover with a damp kitchen towel for 30 minutes to rest.
', 'Step 11: Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Place a baking sheet on the center rack of the oven so it can preheat at the same time.
', 'Step 13: Do not grease.
', 'Step 14: Roll each ball into a circle about 8 inches across.
', 'Step 15: The dough should be paper thin, almost translucent.
', 'Step 16: If they are too thick, they will bubble up like pita breads.
', 'Step 17: Pull out the oven shelf and place as many crackers on your baking sheet as you can fit, 2 or 3.
', 'Step 18: Close the oven and bake for about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 19: The crackers should be lightly browned on the top with small bubbles.
', 'Step 20: You may have to adjust your thickness for the next batch.
']

Title: Turkish Kebabs
Ingredients: ['2 large onions, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '½ cup olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 pinch curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pound beef flank steak, thinly sliced', '8 ounces sour cream', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '6 pita bread rounds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the chopped onions in a large ceramic bowl and crush with the bottom of a glass until juice is rendered and onions look translucent.
', 'Step 2: Stir in 2 crushed garlic cloves, 1/2 cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, oregano, 1 teaspoon black pepper, turmeric, curry powder, and 1 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 3: Mix well; add the sliced beef and toss to coat.
', 'Step 4: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator overnight.
', 'Step 5: Combine the sour cream, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, dill, and 1 crushed clove of garlic.
', 'Step 6: Mix well; cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
', "Step 7: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source.
", 'Step 8: Remove the meat from the marinade mixture, brushing off extra onions.
', 'Step 9: Spread the slices on a baking sheet without overlapping, and salt to taste.
', 'Step 10: Broil about 3 minutes per side or until browned and crispy, turning halfway through cooking.
', 'Step 11: Divide the cooked meat between the pita breads, and drizzle with tzatziki sauce to serve.
']

Title: Za'atar Bread

['Step 1: Dissolve yeast in warm water.
', 'Step 2: Add 3 cups flour and salt.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 4: Turn dough out on a lightly floured work surface.
', 'Step 5: Knead until smooth, about 10 minutes.

', "Step 13: Mix za'atar and olive oil together in a small bowl.
", 'Step 14: Spread over circles.

']

Title: Asparagus Cashew Rice Pilaf

', 'Step 2: Increase heat to medium, and stir in spaghetti, cooking until coated with the melted butter and lightly browned.

', 'Step 4: Stir in jasmine rice, and cook about 5 minutes.

', 'Step 6: Season mixture with salt and pepper.

', 'Step 8: Place asparagus in a separate medium saucepan with enough water to cover.

Title: Jujeh Kabob (Persian Chicken Kabobs)
Ingredients: ['1 medium onion, sliced thin', '1 lime, juiced', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '⅓ teaspoon crushed saffron', '¼ cup olive oil', '3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes', 'metal skewers']

', 'Step 2: Mix in olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Press chicken into the bowl lightly and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 4: Let marinate for 6 hours to overnight, mixing every few hours to make sure chicken is coated.
', 'Step 5: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 6: Remove chicken from the bowl, shake off excess marinade, and discard marinade left in the bowl.
', "Step 7: Place chicken onto metal skewers, making sure it's not too tightly packed.
", 'Step 8: Cook skewers on the preheated grill until chicken is browned and no longer pink in the center, turning as needed, 10 to 15 minutes total.
']

Title: Semolina Turmeric Cake (Sfoof)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups semolina flour', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 ⅛ cups white sugar', '1 cup milk', '½ cup vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon pine nuts']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9 inch round baking pan.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, mix semolina, flour, turmeric and baking powder.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: In a large bowl, stir milk and sugar until sugar is dissolved.
', 'Step 6: Add flour mixture and oil and beat with an electric beater at medium speed for 5 minutes.

Title: Lebanese Donair
Ingredients: ['3 ¼ pounds boneless top round steak, sliced very thin', '½ cup red wine vinegar', '½ cup olive oil', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon allspice', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon cardamom', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', 'salt, to taste', '2 large tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 bunch finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 large sweet onion, finely chopped', '⅓ cup olive oil', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '3 large tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup tahini (sesame-seed paste)', '½ cup fresh lemon juice', '½ cup water', 'salt, to taste', '7 (6 inch) pita bread rounds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the sliced beef into a flat, ovenproof dish.
', 'Step 2: Stir the red wine vinegar, 1/2 cup olive oil, lemon juice, allspice, cinnamon, cardamom, black pepper, salt, tomatoes and garlic together in a bowl until well blended.
', 'Step 3: Pour over the beef, turning slices to coat evenly.
', 'Step 4: Cover, and refrigerate 4 hours.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Remove the cover from the dish with the beef, and cook in preheated oven until the meat is no longer pink, about 50 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Cool slightly.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, make the parsley sauce by mixing the parsley, sweet onion, and 1/2 cup olive oil together in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Place the tomatoes in a bowl, and set aside until needed.
', 'Step 10: Make the tahini sauce by mixing the garlic, tahini, lemon juice, and water together in a bowl.
', 'Step 11: Season to taste with salt.
', 'Step 12: To serve, place the pita bread rounds on serving plates.
', 'Step 13: Spoon some of the meat mixture down the center of each pita round.
', 'Step 14: Top with the parsley mix, tomatoes, and tahini sauce.
', 'Step 15: Roll up the sides of the pita bread around the filling, and serve.
']

Title: Adeni Tea
Ingredients: ['3 orange pekoe tea bags', '3 cups water', '¼ cup white sugar', '10 cardamom seeds, or to taste', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk']

['Step 1: Cut tea bags open and empty into a small bowl; discard tea bags.
', 'Step 2: n Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add loose tea.
', 'Step 3: Boil tea until water becomes dark red, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir sugar into tea.
', 'Step 5: n Grind cardamom seeds in an electric grinder or using a mortar and pestle.
', 'Step 6: Stir ground cardamom, cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger into tea; boil until flavors are infused, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: n Stir milk into tea and bring back to a boil for about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour tea through a sieve to separate out solids.
', 'Step 9: Serve hot.

Title: Sun-Dried Tomato Hummus
Ingredients: ['4 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons tahini paste', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '2 (15.5 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained', '½ cup olive oil', '½ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained', '¼ cup finely shredded fresh basil', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '⅛ teaspoon paprika']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place garlic, salt, tahini, and lemon juice into a food processor; process until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Pour in the garbanzo beans and 1/2 cup olive oil; process until smooth again, scraping the sides of the bowl occasionally.
', 'Step 3: Once smooth, add the sun-dried tomatoes, and pulse until they have been chopped to very small pieces and are incorporated into the hummus.
', 'Step 4: Finally, add the basil, and pulse a few times until mixed in.
', 'Step 5: Spread the hummus into a shallow serving dish, and make a few decorative grooves on top.
', 'Step 6: Refrigerate at least 1 hour, then drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil and sprinkle with paprika before serving.
']

Title: Ekmek Turkish Bread
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups bread flour, divided', '¾ cup water, divided', '5 teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '6 cups bread flour', '2 teaspoons salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To make the starter: Place 1/2 cup flour and 1/4 cup water in a coverable bowl; stir well.
', 'Step 2: Cover and let sit at room temperature overnight.
', 'Step 3: The next day, add 1/2 cup flour and 1/4 cup water to the bowl.
', 'Step 4: Cover and let sit at room temperature overnight.
', 'Step 5: On the third day, add 1/2 cup flour and 1/4 cup water to the bowl.
', 'Step 6: Cover and let sit at room temperature overnight.
', 'Step 7: To make the dough: In a large bowl, dissolve the yeast and sugar in the warm water.
', 'Step 8: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Break the starter into small pieces and add it to the yeast mixture.
', 'Step 10: Stir in 4 cups of flour and the salt.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 12: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle a little flour over the dough and then cover it with a dry cloth.
', 'Step 14: Let it raise until double in size.
', 'Step 15: Put the dough back onto a lightly floured work surface and punch out the air.
', 'Step 16: Divide the dough in half and knead each piece for 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Shape each piece into a tight oval loaf.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle two sheet pans with corn meal.
', 'Step 19: Roll and stretch two loaf until they are 15x12 inch ovals.
', 'Step 20: Dust the tops of the loaves with flour.
', 'Step 21: Cover with a dry cloth and let raise in a warm place until doubled in size.
', 'Step 22: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 23: Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Mist with water 3 times in the first 15 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Loaves are done when their bottoms sound hollow when tapped.
', 'Step 26: Let cool on wire racks before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '6.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '1 g', 'fatContent': '0.1 g', 'fiberContent': '0.4 g', 'proteinContent': '0.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '390 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.3 g'}

Title: Moroccan Shabbat Fish
Ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper, cut into thin strips', '3 tomatoes, sliced', '6 (6 ounce) tilapia fillets', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 tablespoon chicken bouillon granules', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt and pepper to taste', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 cup water', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Layer the sliced red peppers and sliced tomatoes in the bottom of a baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Arrange the tilapia fillets on top of the vegetables.
', 'Step 4: Combine the paprika, chicken bouillon, cayenne, salt, pepper, olive oil, and water and mix well.
', 'Step 5: Pour the seasoning mixture over the fish.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle with parsley.
', 'Step 7: Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven until the fish flakes easily with a fork and the vegetables are tender, about 1 hour.
']

Title: Afghan Beef Raviolis (Mantwo)
Ingredients: ['¾ cup plain yogurt', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint leaves', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 pound ground beef', '1 ½ cups chopped onion', '1 cup water', '1 carrot, grated', '¾ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '26 wonton wrappers', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons water', '½ cup dried yellow split peas', '⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 cube chicken bouillon', '1 ½ cups water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, stir together yogurt, mint, and garlic.
', 'Step 2: Refrigerate.
', 'Step 3: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook ground beef and onions until meat is browned, stirring occasionally to crumble; drain fat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in 1 cup water, carrot, salt, black pepper, 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, and 1/2 teaspoon cumin; simmer uncovered for 30 minutes or until water evaporates.
', 'Step 5: Lay out wonton wrappers on aluminum foil.
', 'Step 6: Mound two large spoonfuls of beef mixture in the center of one wrapper.
', 'Step 7: Dip a finger in water and trace it around all four edges.
', 'Step 8: Lay a second wonton wrapper on top of the first, and press on all edges to seal.
', 'Step 9: Roll up the edges to create a round, hat-shaped ravioli.
', 'Step 10: Repeat, making 13 ravioli.
', 'Step 11: Place ravioli in steamer and steam 40 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, mix together the yellow split peas, 1/8 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon coriander, 1/4 teaspoon cumin, chicken bouillon, and 1 1/2 cups of water in a saucepan.
', 'Step 13: Bring to a boil, then simmer over medium-low heat for about 45 minutes, or until it reaches a thick slurry-like consistency.
', 'Step 14: Meanwhile, in the large skillet, mix remaining beef mixture with 2 tablespoons water, tomato paste, and 1/8 teaspoon red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 15: Simmer over low heat until liquid has evaporated, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: To serve, spread yogurt on a serving plate.
', 'Step 17: Top with ravioli, and top again with split pea mixture.
', 'Step 18: Finally, top with tomato and beef mixture.
', 'Step 19: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Lebanese Lemon Lentil Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large yellow onion, diced', '2 stalks celery with leaves, diced', '2 carrots, diced', '1 ½ teaspoons minced garlic', '6 cups water', '2 cups French green lentils', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon salt, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ cup butter', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 lemon, cut into wedges', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'freshly ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir onion, celery, and carrots until slightly tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, 30 seconds.
', 'Step 4: Add water, lentils, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, salt, coriander, cumin, black pepper, and cayenne pepper; stir to incorporate.
', 'Step 5: Cover and simmer until lentils are tender, stirring occasionally, 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 6: Whisk butter and flour together in a small saucepan over medium-low heat; stir constantly until thickened and paste-like, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low, stirring every 2 to 3 minutes, until light brown, about 20 more minutes.
', 'Step 8: Whisk flour paste into finished soup, a spoonful at a time, until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 9: Serve with lemon wedges, 2 tablespoons parsley, and a sprinkle of freshly ground pepper.
']

Title: Authentic Homemade Yogurt
Ingredients: ['¾ cup plain yogurt, preferably Greek-style, with live cultures', '1 quart whole milk', '1 quart half-and-half', '1 pint heavy whipping cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: On a work surface, lay four clean cotton towels in a cross pattern, each with one end overlapping a few inches in the center.
', 'Step 2: Position a large baking dish or glass mixing bowl in the center of the towels.
', 'Step 3: Set the plain yogurt on the counter to warm to room temperature while preparing milk mixture.
', 'Step 4: Combine milk and half-and-half in a large, heavy, non-aluminum pot.
', 'Step 5: Heat over low to moderate heat, stirring constantly, until mixture just comes to the boil.
', 'Step 6: Immediately remove from heat and pour mixture into the waiting bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add 1 pint whipping cream, if desired, for added richness.
', 'Step 8: Allow mixture to cool to 112 degrees F (44 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Gradually pour 1 cup of the warm milk into the yogurt, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 10: Return the yogurt-milk mixture to the bowl and stir well.
', 'Step 11: Cover bowl with plastic wrap; wrap kitchen towels up and over bowl, covering completely.
', 'Step 12: Let stand at room temperature until firmly set, 8 to 12 hours.
', 'Step 13: Refrigerate yogurt several hours or overnight to chill completely.
']

Title: Company Couscous
Ingredients: ['1 cup couscous', '1 cup boiling water', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '¼ cup diced red bell pepper', '4 green onions, sliced', '1 cup cherry tomatoes', '1 cup fresh basil leaves', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '1 dash balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Stir couscous into boiling water and return water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cover and remove pot from heat.
', 'Step 4: Let stand 5 minutes, then fluff with a fork.
', 'Step 5: While the couscous is cooking, heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir in garlic, green onions and peppers; saute briefly.
', 'Step 7: Stir in tomatoes, basil, cooked couscous, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 8: Mix together and transfer to a 1 1/2 quart casserole dish.
', 'Step 9: Splash some balsamic vinegar on top.
', 'Step 10: Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese while still warm.
']

Title: Beghrir (Moroccan Pancakes)
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water (115 degrees F/46 degrees C)', '½ teaspoon active dry yeast', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '1 cup milk', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup semolina flour', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '6 tablespoons butter', '¾ cup honey', '1 teaspoon orange-flower water, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the water, yeast, and sugar in a blender, and let stand without blending for 5 minutes, until the yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam.
', 'Step 2: Add the milk, flour, semolina flour, eggs, baking powder, and salt.
', 'Step 3: Blend until the mixture is smooth, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Leave the mixture in the blender to rest for about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Heat a 5-inch nonstick skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 6: Blend the pancake mixture for about 10 seconds, to remix, and scoop 1/4 to 1/3 cup of batter into the heated skillet.
', 'Step 7: Cook the beghrir until bubbles have formed and popped, and the top of the pancake is no longer shiny, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Do not flip.
', 'Step 9: Adjust the heat as necessary so that the bottoms of the pancakes are just starting to brown when the tops are dry.
', 'Step 10: Blend the batter for 10 seconds or so after cooking 3 or 4 pancakes, to keep the batter fluffy.
', 'Step 11: To make the sauce, place the butter, honey, and flower-water flavoring in a microwave-safe bowl, and microwave on High setting until the butter is melted and the honey is hot, about 1 1/2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir the sauce, and drizzle about 1 tablespoon over each warm pancake to serve.
']

Title: Oven-Roasted Za'atar Chicken Breasts
Ingredients: ['4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts', "3 tablespoons za'atar seasoning, divided", '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'cooking spray', 'salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pound chicken breasts to a 1-inch thickness for even cooking.
', 'Step 2: Place in a large resealable plastic bag.
', "Step 3: Combine 2 tablespoons za'atar seasoning, lemon juice, olive oil, and garlic in a small bowl.
", 'Step 4: Pour mixture over the chicken and toss to coat evenly.
', 'Step 5: Seal the bag and refrigerate for 2 to 8 hours.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and coat with cooking spray.
', "Step 8: Place chicken breasts on the prepared baking sheet and sprinkle with remaining za'atar seasoning.
", 'Step 9: Roast in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 23 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Season with salt.
']

Title: Authentic Lebanese Fattoush
Ingredients: ['½ cup water', '1 teaspoon cornstarch', '⅓ cup lemon juice', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons sumac powder', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces', '1 medium cucumber, diced', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '4 green onions, chopped', '¼ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '¼ cup chopped fresh mint', '1 green bell pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 cup chopped purslane', '½ (5 ounce) package arugula', '4 pita rounds, toasted and torn into pieces']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix the water and cornstarch in a small saucepan over medium-high heat until thickened.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat, and mix in lemon juice, garlic, sumac, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Refrigerate until ready to use.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, toss together the lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, green onions, parsley, mint, bell pepper, purslane, and arugula.
', 'Step 5: Toss with the dressing, and serve with pita.
']

Title: Kalam Polo (Persian Cabbage and Rice)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups boiling water', '1 tablespoon saffron', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 pound ground beef', '1 teaspoon salt, divided', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '3 cups chopped cabbage', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground ginger', '2 cups basmati rice', '1 ½ cups cold water', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup hot water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour boiling water over ground saffron; let sit for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Reserve 1/4 cup for rice; save remaining brewed saffron for another use.
', 'Step 3: Heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Saute onion until light brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in ground beef, 1/2 teaspoon salt, black pepper, and turmeric.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Cover the pan and cook over low heat for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Heat remaining oil in another pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Saute cabbage until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add cinnamon and ginger.
', 'Step 11: Stir mixture into ground beef mixture and continue to cook over low heat, covered, for 5 minutes, adding 1 tablespoon of water if mixture is dry.
', 'Step 12: Rinse and drain rice; transfer to a pot.
', 'Step 13: Add cold water, butter, and remaining salt.
', 'Step 14: Bring mixture to a boil, uncovered.
', 'Step 15: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until rice is half-cooked and water has evaporated, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Fluff with a fork.
', 'Step 17: Add beef mixture to the rice and slowly mix to incorporate.
', 'Step 18: Turn the heat to low.
', 'Step 19: Add hot water and reserved 1/4 cup brewed saffron to the rice, cover the pot, and let cook until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '681.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '80.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '78.6 mg', 'fatContent': '28.1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.1 g', 'proteinContent': '27.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '688.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.3 g'}

Title: Noni Afghani
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups warm water', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '4 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt, or to taste', '¼ cup corn oil', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '1 tablespoon caraway seed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, stir together 1/2 cup warm water and sugar.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle the yeast over the top, and let stand for about 10 minutes, until foamy.
', 'Step 3: Place flour in a large bowl, and stir in salt.
', 'Step 4: Make a well in the center, and pour in the corn oil and yeast mixture.
', 'Step 5: Add the remaining water in small amounts until you have a soft moist dough that can be handled.
', 'Step 6: Turn out onto a floured surface, and knead for at least 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Return to the bowl, cover with a towel, and let rise until doubled in size, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Deflate the risen dough, and divide into 8 pieces.
', 'Step 10: Roll each piece into a ball.
', 'Step 11: On a lightly floured surface, roll each ball with a rolling pin so it is oval shaped, about 6 inches long, and 1/2 inch thick.
', 'Step 12: Use a fork or dull knife to draw three lines on the top of each loaf.
', 'Step 13: Place the loaves on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 14: Mix together the egg and remaining tablespoon of water; brush the tops of the loaves with the mixture.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle caraway seeds over the tops, if using.
', 'Step 16: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until the loaves are shiny and golden brown.
']

Title: Shish Tawook Marinated Chicken
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons plain low-fat yogurt', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '2 tablespoons prepared mustard', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons ground allspice', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon curry powder', '3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into bite-size pieces', '½ cup mayonnaise', '1 cup plain low-fat yogurt', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ teaspoon salt']

', 'Step 8: Transfer chicken pieces to a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Bake in a preheated oven 30 minutes.
']

Title: Mahalabia (Middle Eastern-Style Milk Pudding)

', 'Step 2: Whisk water and cornstarch together in a bowl until smooth; stir into boiling milk.

', 'Step 4: Remove saucepan from heat and stir cream, rose water, and cardamom into milk mixture.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate milk mixture until completely cooled, 2 to 4 hours.
']

Title: Mahi Sorkh Shodeh (Persian Fried Fish)
Ingredients: ['⅛ teaspoon saffron threads', '1 tablespoon boiling water', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, or more to taste', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon onion powder', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 ½ pounds skinless cod fillets, about 1-inch thick', '¼ cup grapeseed oil', '¼ orange, juiced', '1 orange, cut into wedges', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Crush saffron threads to a powder in a small mortar and pestle.
', 'Step 2: Transfer to a small bowl with 1 tablespoon boiling water.
', 'Step 3: Stir, cover, and set saffron water aside.
', 'Step 4: Combine flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, turmeric, pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder on a large plate.
', 'Step 5: Dry fish well with paper towels.
', 'Step 6: Cut into 3-inch long pieces and season with salt.
', 'Step 7: Dredge fish in the flour mixture on all sides.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a large pan over medium to medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: Add fish and fry on one side until nice and golden, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Flip fish, drizzle saffron water over top, and fry the other side until golden and fish flakes easily with a fork, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer fish to a serving platter.
', 'Step 12: Squeeze orange juice over top and serve with orange and lime wedges.
']

', 'Step 2: Add the boiling water, mix and cover with a towel; Let stand for 1 hour.

Title: Lubia Polo (Green Bean Rice)
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 jalapeno pepper, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '5 cups chicken broth', '1 cup tomato sauce', '1 pound fresh green beans, cut into 1 inch pieces', '3 cups uncooked basmati rice, rinsed and drained', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large nonstick pan (one that has a lid) over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir beef until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 3: Stir in onion and jalapeno, and cook until tender.
', 'Step 4: Season with curry powder; stir in chicken broth and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil, and stir in green beans.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium and simmer until beans are tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in rice, and cover the pan.
', 'Step 8: Cook on medium heat for 10 to 15 minutes, or until much of the liquid is absorbed.
', 'Step 9: (Be careful not to overcook rice at this point or the dish will be mushy; the rice should be firm.
', 'Step 10: ) Transfer everything in the pan to a bowl or heatproof container, and return pot to the stove.
', 'Step 11: Heat the oil in the nonstick pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Carefully dump the cooked rice mixture back into the pan.
', "Step 13: Wrap a clean dish towel around the inside of the pot's lid (the ends of the dish towel will be folded over the edges on top of the lid,) and put the lid on the pot.
", 'Step 14: Cook over medium-low heat for 35 minutes, without uncovering or stirring.
', 'Step 15: Remove lid and place a tray on top of the pot, then carefully flip it over.
', "Step 16: The rice will hold the shape of the pot and have a nice crust on top called 'tah digh.
"]

Title: Bechamel Chicken Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package dried penne pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, diced', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed', '½ cup frozen peas', '1 bunch cilantro', '3 sprigs fresh dill weed, chopped', '1 (6 ounce) can Italian-flavored tomato paste', '½ cup water', 'salt and pepper to taste', '5 tablespoons butter', '1 cube chicken bouillon', '5 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '3 cups milk', 'pepper to taste', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil, cook the penne pasta 10 to 12 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and saute the onion, green bell pepper, and garlic until tender.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the chicken, and cook until almost done.
', 'Step 5: Mix in the peas, cilantro, dill, tomato paste, and enough water to make a thick sauce.
', 'Step 6: Continue to cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear, and all the ingredients are heated through.
', 'Step 7: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 8: To prepare the bechamel sauce, melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Dissolve the chicken bouillon cube in the melted butter.
', 'Step 10: Stirring constantly, blend in the flour until smooth.
', 'Step 11: Mix in the milk, season with pepper, and continue to cook and stir until the sauce is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon.
', 'Step 12: In a bowl, mix the cooked pasta with 1/2 the bechamel sauce.
', 'Step 13: Place 1/2 the pasta in a baking dish, layer with 1/2 the chicken mixture, and 1/2 the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 14: Layer with the remaining pasta, remaining chicken mixture, and remaining bechamel sauce.
', 'Step 15: Top with remaining mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 16: Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly.
']

Title: Baharat Chicken and Rice
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons strong paprika', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon cumin', '¾ tablespoon ground coriander', '¾ tablespoon ground loomi (dried lime)', '½ tablespoon sumac powder', '¼ tablespoon ground cinnamon', '¼ tablespoon ground cloves', '¼ tablespoon ground nutmeg', '5 green cardamom pods, crushed', '2 black cardamom pods, crushed', '½ bunch fresh cilantro', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ fresh lemon, juiced', '2 chicken thighs', '2 chicken legs', '1 chicken breast', '1 ½ cups brown basmati rice', '¼ cup raw cashews', '¼ cup shelled raw almonds', '¼ cup golden raisins', '⅛ cup shelled raw pistachio nuts', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 shallot, diced', '1 cup chicken broth']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix paprika, black pepper, cumin, coriander, loomi, sumac, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, green cardamom, and black cardamom together to make baharat spice mixture.
', 'Step 2: Set baharat blend aside.
', 'Step 3: Combine cilantro, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and lemon juice in a resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 4: Add 1 tablespoon baharat blend.
', 'Step 5: Add chicken pieces, seal, and shake.
', 'Step 6: Marinate in the refrigerator at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, place rice in a large bowl and cover with fresh water.
', 'Step 8: Soak at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Rinse and drain and return to the bowl.
', 'Step 10: Add cashews, almonds, raising, and pistachios.
', 'Step 11: Stir in 1 tablespoon baharat blend.
', 'Step 12: Mix well and set aside.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Heat 2 teaspoons olive oil in a Dutch oven or tagine over medium heat.
', 'Step 15: Add shallot and cook until translucent, 1 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Turn off heat.
', 'Step 17: Add rice mixture and toss to coat.
', 'Step 18: Remove cilantro from the bag with the chicken.
', 'Step 19: Pour marinated chicken on top of the rice in the Dutch oven; reserve bag.
', 'Step 20: Pour broth into the bag and shake gently; pour over the chicken and rice.
', 'Step 21: Cover Dutch oven.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven until rice is soft and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 75 minutes.
', 'Step 23: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Eggless Date Cake
Ingredients: ['¾ cup milk', '18 dates, pitted and left whole', '½ cup brown sugar', '½ cup vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ cup chopped walnuts']

', 'Step 8: Pulse flour mixture, about 1/4 cup at a time, into the date paste until batter is smooth; do not overmix.
', 'Step 9: Stir walnuts into batter with a fork and transfer to the prepared loaf pan.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the middle of the cake comes out clean, about 40 minutes.
']

Title: Middle Eastern Kibbeh
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup medium coarse bulgur', '1 cup fresh mint leaves', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ pounds lean ground lamb', '3 tablespoons olive oil']

Title: Mama's Oh-So-Savory Lamb and Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) eggplant, cut into 1-inch cubes', 'salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large sweet onion, coarsely chopped', '2 large stalks celery, sliced', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '2 pinches dried oregano', '2 pinches ground dried rosemary', '2 pinches paprika', '⅛ teaspoon dried mint', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic, minced', '3 tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 pound ground lamb', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place eggplant in a colander set in a bowl or the sink; sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and toss to coat.
', 'Step 2: Let eggplant stand for at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Rinse off the bitter liquid and excess salt and drain well.
', 'Step 4: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Stir in onion and celery; cook and stir until onion has softened and turned translucent and celery is fragrant, about 5 minutes.
', "Step 6: While vegetables are cooking, combine ground cumin, oregano, rosemary, paprika, mint, salt, and black pepper in a small bowl or mortar and pestle and mix well; this is the lamb seasoning (see Cook's Note).
", 'Step 7: Set seasoning aside.
', 'Step 8: Stir eggplant cubes and garlic into the vegetables in the skillet, mixing well, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add chopped tomatoes and sprinkle with half of the lamb seasoning mixture.
', 'Step 10: Reserve remaining seasoning.
', 'Step 11: Stir gently and cook for 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Grease a 2-quart casserole dish.
', 'Step 14: Pour chicken broth and half the can of tomato sauce into the skillet and simmer for 10 minutes; add a little water if the sauce starts to get dry.
', 'Step 15: Transfer the sauce to the prepared casserole dish.
', 'Step 16: Return the skillet to the stove over medium-high heat and heat the reserved tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 17: Place ground lamb into skillet and sprinkle with remaining seasoning mixture.
', 'Step 18: Brown lamb in the hot oil, stirring frequently, until the meat is evenly browned; it should look like imperfect meatballs.
', 'Step 19: Gently transfer the lamb to the casserole dish, pushing it down into the vegetable mixture so that it is at least partially submerged.
', 'Step 20: Stir fresh lemon juice into the remaining tomato sauce and pour the sauce over the casserole.
', 'Step 21: Bake uncovered for 45 minutes to 1 hour, depending upon how tender you like your vegetables.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '384.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '77.2 mg', 'fatContent': '23.2 g', 'fiberContent': '8.4 g', 'proteinContent': '24 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '1471.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.2 g'}

Title: Instant Pot® Lebanese Lentil Soup (Shorbat Adas)
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 Yukon Gold potato, peeled and diced', '1 carrot, peeled and diced', '1 tomato, diced', '2 celery ribs, diced', '1 clove garlic, chopped, or more to taste', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '¾ teaspoon ground cumin', '⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '⅛ teaspoon allspice', '4 cups low-sodium vegetable broth', '2 cups water', '1 ½ cups red lentils', '2 lemons', '2 pita bread, cut into squares', 'cooking spray', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in the pot.
', 'Step 4: Add onion, potato, carrot, tomato, celery, and garlic; cook and stir until starting to soften, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle salt, cumin, cinnamon, and allspice over the vegetables and stir until fragrant.
', 'Step 6: Pour in stock, water, and lentils.
', 'Step 7: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 8: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes.
", 'Step 9: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, spread pita squares on a lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: Spray with cooking spray and season with salt.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until toasted, about 8 minutes.
', "Step 13: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 15: Puree soup using an immersion blender.
', 'Step 16: Stir in juice of 1 lemon.
', 'Step 17: Divide soup among bowls and scatter a handful of pita chips over each.
', 'Step 18: Cut the second lemon into wedges and serve alongside.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '456.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '76.7 g', 'fatContent': '8.9 g', 'fiberContent': '15.4 g', 'proteinContent': '23.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1 g', 'sodiumContent': '1139.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.8 g'}

Title: Middle Eastern White Beans
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups dried white kidney beans, soaked overnight', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 tablespoon red pimento sauce', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '3 medium onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a slow cooker combine the beans, tomato paste, pimento sauce, garlic, onions, cumin, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 2: Mix until the beans are coated.
', 'Step 3: Pour in beef broth, and top off with enough water to completely cover the beans.
', 'Step 4: Cover, and cook on High for 6 hours, or until the beans are tender and the liquid is thickened.
', 'Step 5: It should not be soupy.
']

Title: Easy Shakshuka
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 onion, cut into 2 inch pieces', '1 green bell pepper, cut into 2 inch pieces', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled plum tomatoes with juice', '1 teaspoon paprika, or to taste', '2 slices pickled jalapeno pepper, finely chopped', '4 eggs', '4 (6 inch) pita bread']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the vegetable oil in a deep skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the garlic, onion, and bell pepper; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add the canned tomatoes, paprika and jalapenos; stir, using the back of a spoon to break up the tomatoes.
', 'Step 4: Simmer for about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Crack an egg into a small bowl, then gently slip the egg into the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 6: Repeat with the remaining eggs.
', 'Step 7: Cook the eggs until the whites are firm and the yolks have thickened but are not hard, 2 1/2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: If the tomato sauce gets dry, add a few tablespoons of water.
', 'Step 9: Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon, place onto a warm plate, and serve with the tomato sauce and pita bread.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '293.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '40.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '186 mg', 'fatContent': '9.4 g', 'fiberContent': '4.3 g', 'proteinContent': '13.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '654.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.7 g'}

Title: Easy Curry Couscous
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups couscous', '3 cups chicken stock', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ cup raisins', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '½ cup slivered almonds, toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour couscous into a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix chicken stock, curry powder, salt, pepper, olive oil, and raisins in a saucepan and bring to a boil; remove from heat.
', 'Step 3: Pour the boiling liquid over the couscous.
', 'Step 4: Seal the bowl with plastic wrap and allow to sit for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Fluff couscous with a fork.
', 'Step 6: Top with cilantro and almonds.
']

Title: Yazdi Cakes
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '4 eggs', '1 ¼ cups white sugar', '1 ½ cups butter, melted', '1 cup plain yogurt', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cardamom', '1 tablespoon rose water', '½ cup blanched slivered almonds', '1 ½ tablespoons chopped pistachio nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Sift the flour and baking powder into a bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Grease the cups of a cupcake/muffin pan.
', 'Step 4: You will need 24 cups.
', 'Step 5: Combine the eggs and sugar in a large heatproof bowl and set on top of a pan of simmering water.
', 'Step 6: Beat constantly with a whisk or electric mixer until thick and pale, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from the heat and continue to beat until cooled, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Mix in the butter, yogurt, cardamom and rose water.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the flour mixture by hand and fold in the slivered almonds.
', 'Step 10: Spoon into the prepared cupcake molds, filling 3/4 full.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle some chopped pistachios over the tops.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until firm to the touch and golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '215.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '19.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '62.1 mg', 'fatContent': '14 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '3.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '121.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.4 g'}

Title: Malooba
Ingredients: ['1 (4 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces', '6 cups water', '1 medium onion, quartered', '2 tablespoons ground allspice', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '3 whole cardamom seeds', '4 whole cloves', '3 bay leaves', '2 ½ cups uncooked basmati rice, rinsed and drained', '2 tablespoons ground allspice', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 large potato, sliced into rounds', '1 large head cauliflower, separated into florets', '2 medium tomatoes, diced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken in a large pot with 6 cups water, onion, 2 tablespoons allspice, ground cardamom, cardamom seeds, whole cloves and bay leaves.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, and cook until chicken is tender, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove chicken, strain and reserve broth.
', 'Step 4: Soak the rice in water while waiting for the chicken to cook.
', 'Step 5: When the chicken is almost done, drain the water off, and stir in 1 1/2 tablespoons of allspice.
', 'Step 6: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Fry the potatoes and cauliflower in the hot oil until browned.
', 'Step 8: They do not need to fully cook.
', 'Step 9: In a separate pot, layer fried potatoes on the bottom.
', 'Step 10: This is done so that the rice will not stick to the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 11: Add the cauliflower and tomatoes, and sprinkle a handful of rice over the vegetables.
', 'Step 12: Remove the bones from the chicken and place the chicken in the pot.
', 'Step 13: Cover with the rest of the rice.
', 'Step 14: Pour in the reserved broth until it reaches a level about 1/2 inch above the level of the rice.
', 'Step 15: Cover the pot, and cook over medium-low heat for 1 hour, until rice is tender.
', 'Step 16: When the liquid has absorbed, have a large round tray ready.
', 'Step 17: Uncover the pot, and place the tray over the top.
', 'Step 18: Invert so that the pan is upside down on top of the tray.
', 'Step 19: Let stand for 5 minutes like this, then slowly remove the pot to let the food fall onto the tray.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '766.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '89.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '82 mg', 'fatContent': '27.8 g', 'fiberContent': '7.7 g', 'proteinContent': '39 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '131.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.1 g'}

Title: Chef John's Baba Ghanoush
Ingredients: ['4 large Italian eggplants', '2 cloves crushed garlic', '2 teaspoons kosher salt, or to taste', '1 lemon, juiced, or more to taste', '3 tablespoons tahini, or more to taste', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons plain Greek yogurt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 leaf fresh mint, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh Italian parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Prick the surface of the skin of eggplants several times with the tip of a knife.
', 'Step 3: Place eggplants directly on grill.
', 'Step 4: Turn frequently with tongs while skin chars.
', 'Step 5: Cook until eggplants have collapsed and are very soft, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to a bowl and cover tightly with aluminum foil and allow to cool, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: When eggplants are cool enough to handle, split them in half and scrape flesh into a colander placed over a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Drain 5 or 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer eggplant to mixing bowl.
', 'Step 10: Add crushed garlic and salt; mash until creamy but with a little texture, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Whisk in lemon juice, tahini, olive oil, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 12: Stir in yogurt.
', 'Step 13: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until completely chilled, 3 or 4 hours.
', 'Step 14: Taste to adjust seasonings.
', 'Step 15: Stir in mint and parsley.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '110.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '0.2 mg', 'fatContent': '5.9 g', 'fiberContent': '8.1 g', 'proteinContent': '3.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '331.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.6 g'}

Title: Adas bil Hamod (Lebanese Lentil Lemon Soup)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup chopped onions', '1 pound brown lentils', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen whole leaf spinach', '1 tablespoon dried mint, crushed', 'salt to taste', '¾ cup lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in large pot over high heat.
', 'Step 2: When oil is very hot, add onions and stir until onions begin to turn dark brown and caramelize, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Put the lentils, garlic, frozen spinach, and mint into the pot.
', 'Step 4: Pour in enough water so that it is about 2 inches deeper than the lentil mixture.
', 'Step 5: Stir well to loosen browned bits of onion on the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 7: Simmer, uncovered, until lentils are tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: If soup gets too thick, add a little more water.
', 'Step 9: Salt to taste.
', 'Step 10: Lower heat and stir in lemon juice.
']

Title: Easy Baked Falafel with Cucumber-Yogurt Sauce
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '¾ onion, diced', '¼ cup packed chopped fresh cilantro', '¼ cup packed chopped fresh parsley', '3 cloves garlic, smashed', '1 small lemon, zested', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '1 egg, beaten', '½ cup plain Greek yogurt', '¼ cup seeded and minced cucumber, squeezed dry', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', 'salt to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Coat a 9x13-inch metal baking pan with cooking spray and 1 tablespoon olive oil and place inside the oven.
', 'Step 2: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: C Combine chickpeas, onion, cilantro, parsley, garlic, lemon zest, cumin, salt, red pepper flakes, and baking powder in a food processor.
', 'Step 4: Pulse until minced but not yet pasty.
', 'Step 5: Transfer to a bowl and stir in flour and egg until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 6: Remove baking pan from the oven.
', 'Step 7: Drop golfball-sized portions of chickpea mixture onto the hot pan.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Brush falafel with remaining olive oil and flip over.
', 'Step 10: Continue baking until golden on both sides, 15 to 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, combine yogurt, cucumber, lemon juice, and garlic in a bowl.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 13: Store in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
', 'Step 14: Serve falafel with yogurt sauce.
']

Title: Thick-Style Lebanese Garlic Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 head garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon sea salt', '½ cup fresh lemon juice', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 cup olive oil (not extra virgin)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the garlic, salt, lemon juice, vegetable oil, and olive oil in a quart-sized jar.
', 'Step 2: Submerge an immersion blender in the mixture to the bottom of the jar.
', 'Step 3: Mix with the blender resting on the bottom of the jar until the ingredients thicken, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Angle the mixer to pull ingredients from the sides of the jar and lift it toward the top to better combine.
', 'Step 5: Continue blending until the mixture reaches a texture similar to mayonnaise.
']

Title: Middle Eastern Garlic Sauce
Ingredients: ['3 small russet potatoes, peeled', '1 head garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '⅓ cup lemon juice', '½ cup canola oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and transfer to a bowl; mash until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 5: n Put garlic, salt, and lemon juice in a blender or food processor; pour in enough oil to lightly coat garlic cloves.
', 'Step 6: Blend mixture on high; slowly stream remaining oil through the top opening of the blender or food processor until mixture is smooth.
', 'Step 7: Add mashed potatoes, about 2 to 3 tablespoons at a time, to the garlic mixture while blender is still running.
', 'Step 8: Continue adding potatoes until all are incorporated.
', 'Step 9: Transfer sauce to a bowl and refrigerate until chilled, 1 hour to overnight.
']

Title: Authentic Turkish Doner Kebab
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 ¼ pounds ground lamb']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine flour, oregano, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, Italian seasoning, black pepper, and cayenne pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Add ground lamb and thoroughly knead with the flour mixture until thoroughly mixed together, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Shape the seasoned ground lamb and place into a loaf pan; set on top of a baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven, turning the loaf halfway to ensure even browning, about 1 hour and 20 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Wrap loaf in aluminum foil and let rest, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Slice as thinly as possible to make the doner kebab pieces.
']

Title: Foolproof Potato Latkes
Ingredients: ['4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 onion, chopped', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ cup canola oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place 1/4 of the potatoes, onion, eggs, salt, flour, and baking powder in the work bowl of a food processor; pulse several times until the vegetables are finely chopped.
', 'Step 2: Add the rest of the potatoes, and pulse again until all the potatoes are finely chopped and the mixture is thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 3: Heat canola oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Scoop up about 1/3 cup of the potato mixture per latke, and place into the hot oil.
', 'Step 5: Fry the patty until brown and crisp on the bottom, flip it, and cook the other side until brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Repeat with the rest of the potato mixture, replenishing the oil as needed.
', 'Step 7: Serve hot.
']

Title: Ash-e Reshteh (Persian Legume Soup)
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup dry chickpeas (garbanzo beans)', '⅓ cup dry kidney beans', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or as needed', '1 large red onion, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon dried mint', '2 large yellow onions, thinly sliced', '6 cloves garlic, or to taste, minced', '2 teaspoons ground turmeric', '6 cups vegetable stock', '3 cups packed chopped fresh parsley', '2 cups packed chopped fresh cilantro', '2 cups packed chopped fresh mint', '3 bunches scallions, chopped (green parts only)', '½ cup dry lentils', '½ pound linguine pasta', '1 pound fresh spinach, chopped', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', 'salt and fresh ground pepper to taste', '1 cup Greek yogurt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the chickpeas and kidney beans into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water; let stand 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in red onion.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until onion has turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to low; continue cooking and stirring until onion is tender and golden brown, about 40 minutes more.
', 'Step 5: Stir in dried mint; cook until onions become dark brown and crisp, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Set aside for garnish.
', 'Step 7: Heat remaining olive oil in a stock pot; stir in yellow onions.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir until onion has turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add garlic and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Stir in chickpeas, kidney beans, and turmeric; toss to combine.
', 'Step 11: Stir in vegetable stock; simmer soup for 1 hour.
', 'Step 12: Stir parsley, cilantro, mint, scallions, and lentils into soup; simmer 30 minutes more.
', 'Step 13: Break linguine into 3 sections, stir into soup, and cook at a low boil until noodles are soft, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Stir 1/2 of the spinach to the soup until wilted, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 15: Stir in remaining spinach and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 16: Stir flour with 3 tablespoons of the soup liquid together in a small bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 17: Stir flour mixture back into soup.
', 'Step 18: Continue to simmer soup over low heat, stirring frequently, until thickened, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Serve soup with yogurt and fried red onions.
']

Title: Baba Ghanoush
Ingredients: ['1 eggplant', '¼ cup lemon juice', '¼ cup tahini', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Place eggplant on baking sheet, and make holes in the skin with a fork.
', 'Step 4: Roast it for 30 to 40 minutes, turning occasionally, or until soft.
', 'Step 5: Remove from oven, and place into a large bowl of cold water.
', 'Step 6: Remove from water, and peel skin off.
', 'Step 7: Place eggplant, lemon juice, tahini, sesame seeds, and garlic in an electric blender, and puree.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 9: Transfer eggplant mixture to a medium size mixing bowl, and slowly mix in olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate for 3 hours before serving.

Title: Kabob Koobideh (Persian Ground Meat Kabobs)

Title: Uzbek Plov (Lamb and Rice Pilaf)
Ingredients: ['2 cups basmati rice', '4 heads garlic, whole', '½ cup vegetable oil', '2 pounds boneless leg of lamb, cut into 3-inch pieces', '2 large onions, thinly sliced', '5 large carrots, coarsely grated', '2 tablespoons cumin seeds', '2 tablespoons coriander seed', '½ cup fresh barberries', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorns', '2 cups boiling water to cover', '2 tablespoons salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place basmati rice in a large bowl and cover with warm water.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: Wash heads of garlic.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Heat vegetable oil in a dutch oven or large skillet over high heat until smoking, then add lamb, turning occasionally until the lamb is evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the onions; cook and stir until the onion has softened and browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the carrots; cook and stir until the carrots have softened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with cumin, coriander, barberries, and peppercorns.
', 'Step 9: Drop whole garlic heads into the mixture, stirring to evenly distribute ingredients.
', 'Step 10: Reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 11: Cover and cook for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Wash and drain basmati rice with hot water.
', 'Step 13: Pour cleaned rice over the lamb mixture in an even layer.
', 'Step 14: Slowly pour in the boiling water.
', 'Step 15: The rice should be covered with about 3/4 inch of water.
', 'Step 16: Do not stir.
', 'Step 17: Season with salt, and reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 18: Cover and cook until rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Stir rice and lamb together, and serve with the garlic heads on top.
']

Title: Air Fryer Falafel
Ingredients: ['1 cup dry garbanzo beans', '1 ½ cups fresh cilantro, stems removed', '¾ cup fresh flat-leafed parsley, stems removed', '1 small red onion, quartered', '1 clove garlic', '2 tablespoons chickpea flour', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon sriracha sauce', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', 'cooking spray']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak chickpeas in a large amount of cool water for 24 hours.
', 'Step 2: Rub the soaked chickpeas with your fingers to help loosen and remove skins.
', 'Step 3: Rinse and drain well.
', 'Step 4: Spread chickpeas on a large clean dish towel to dry.
', 'Step 5: Blend chickpeas, cilantro, parsley, onion, and garlic in a food processor until a rough paste forms.
', 'Step 6: Transfer mixture to a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add chickpea flour, coriander, cumin, sriracha, salt, and pepper and mix well.
', 'Step 8: Cover bowl and let mixture rest for 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Preheat an air fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Add baking powder and baking soda to the chickpea mixture.
', 'Step 11: Mix using your hands until just combined.
', 'Step 12: Form 15 equal-sized balls and press slightly to form patties.
', 'Step 13: Spray falafel patties with cooking spray.
', 'Step 14: Place 7 falafel patties in the preheated air fryer and cook for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Transfer cooked falafel to a plate and repeat with remaining 8 falafel, cooking for 10 to 12 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '59.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '9.9 g', 'fatContent': '1.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '3.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '97.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.8 g'}

Title: Authentic Middle Eastern Hummus (Chummus)
Ingredients: ['3 cups dry garbanzo beans, soaked overnight', '1 pinch baking soda', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '¾ cup tahini paste', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice, or more to taste', '1 large clove garlic, minced, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse the garbanzo beans and and place in a pot.
', 'Step 2: Fill with enough water to cover by at least 1 inch.
', 'Step 3: Add baking soda, if using.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil and then simmer over medium heat until the beans are very soft, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Drain the beans, reserving some of the water to use later.
', 'Step 6: Reserve a small handful of the whole beans for a garnish.
', 'Step 7: Transfer the rest to a blender or if you have a hand blender, a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Blend the beans until smooth, adding 1/2 cup of olive oil gradually.
', 'Step 9: Add some of the reserved water if needed to help it blend.
', 'Step 10: Add the tahini and blend in along with the lemon juice.
', 'Step 11: Blend in the garlic, cumin and salt.
', 'Step 12: Spread the hummus into a flat serving dish and garnish with the reserved beans and a drizzle of olive oil.
']

Title: Lebanese Chicken Shawarma
Ingredients: ['1 cup plain yogurt', '¼ cup lemon juice', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch strips']

Title: Ash-e-jow (Iranian/Persian Barley Soup)
Ingredients: ['2 quarts chicken stock', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '1 cup uncooked pearl barley', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 lime, juiced', '¼ cup tomato paste', 'salt, to taste', 'ground black pepper, to taste', '1 cup diced carrots', '½ cup sour cream', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '8 lime wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the chicken stock in a pot to a gentle simmer.
', 'Step 2: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat and saute the onion until translucent.
', 'Step 3: Add the pearl barley to the pot and stir for one minute.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the hot chicken stock, turmeric, lime juice, tomato paste, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the carrots and continue simmering 30 minutes or until the soup has thickened and the carrots and barley are tender.
', 'Step 7: If the soup is too thick, add hot water, one tablespoon at a time.
', 'Step 8: Place the sour cream in a small bowl.
', 'Step 9: Slowly pour 1/2 cup of hot soup mixture into sour cream, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 10: Gradually add the sour cream mixture into the soup pot, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the fresh parsley.
', 'Step 12: Serve with fresh lime wedges.
']

Title: Lebanese Easter Cookies
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds butter', '4 cups white sugar', '1 cup water', '9 cups semolina flour', '8 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ tablespoons quick rise yeast', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon allspice', '1 teaspoon ground mahleb', '¼ cup black sesame seeds', '¼ cup rose water', '¼ cup orange flower water', '1 cup warm water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small saucepan, melt butter over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in sugar and water; continue stirring to dissolve sugar.
', 'Step 3: Do not boil.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and let cool slightly.
', 'Step 5: Measure flours into a large bowl.
', 'Step 6: Add melted butter, yeast, spices, and sesame seeds; stir slowly for about 10 minutes to thoroughly blend ingredients.
', 'Step 7: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and leave dough in bowl to rest for 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Prepare 3 baking sheets with cooking spray or parchment paper.
', 'Step 9: In a small bowl, pour the rose water and orange flower water.
', 'Step 10: Pour the warm water in to a second small bowl.
', 'Step 11: Working on a floured board, pull off about 1 cup of dough.
', 'Step 12: Dip your fingers first in the warm water and knead the dough a few minutes; then dip the dough in the flower water and knead it again until the dough is soft and pliable.
', 'Step 13: Use the palm of your hand to roll the ball of dough into a rope 12 inches long and 1 inch in diameter.
', 'Step 14: Cut the rope in half and make a wreath-shaped cookie with each one, pinching the ends together.
', 'Step 15: Place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 16: When you have filled a baking sheet, cover the cookies with a clean towel and refrigerate overnight to rest the dough.
', 'Step 17: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Remove baking sheets from the refrigerator to warm up while the oven preheats.
', 'Step 19: Bake cookies in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 15 minutes.
']
